2a1(brgyad stong): gcig / bcor ldan das rgyal po'i nga rgod kyi rung
2b1(brgyad stong): dri ba la/ dge sde snod nyis pargya sna gi / slong po dag 'dun char/ 
2b2(brgyad stong): de dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dag tshe
2b3(brgyad stong): rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cing shes pa/ glang po chen po/ 
3a1(brgyad stong): byung byas pa/ rnyed pa byas pa/ lung re dang / bdag
3a2(brgyad stong): gis de rjes su thob po/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad nga / yang
3a3(brgyad stong): dag pa'i shes sa sems shin tu rnam par brel pa/ sar
3a4(brgyad stong): kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha sngags// gang zag
3a5(brgyad stong): gcig ma gtogs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' de'o// de nas bcom
3b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
3b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bo rnams te/ ci nas byang
3b3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las// nges por
3b4(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ba zhin du/ khyod spobs par gyis shi go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
3b5(brgyad stong): ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor 'di bdag rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pa'i stob
3b6(brgyad stong): bskyed pas/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
4a1(brgyad stong): / phyin pa ston par 'gyur ram/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa dang // 
4a2(brgyad stong): nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du sems kyi rtog pas
4a3(brgyad stong): kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
4a4(brgyad stong): bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams gang ci smra ba dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / 'chad pa
4a5(brgyad stong): dang rab tu ston pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par rig par bya'o// de tsa
4a6(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na// de bzhin gshegs pas ches gang bstan pa de la bslabs nas/ de dag chos nyid de mngon
4a7(brgyad stong): sum du byed do// chos nyid de mngon sum du byas nas/ gang ci smra ba dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / 
4b1(brgyad stong): 'chad pa dang / rab tu ston pa de dag thams cad chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu de dag 'di ltar chos de sngon
4b2(brgyad stong): pa rnams/ chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang
4b3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ rab 'byor byang chub
4b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtsoms te/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' so mos dpa'
4b5(brgyad stong): chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bin no du/ khyod spobs par byos shig
4b6(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das
4b7(brgyad stong): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i'ang/ chos gang gi tshig bla dwags lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
4b8(brgyad stong): dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de dag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
5a1(brgyad stong): // pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang / bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
5a2(brgyad stong): dpa' 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang / bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha
5a3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa yong/ ma 'tshal ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpe' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol
5a4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing bstan pa ra bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang gal te 'di ltar bshad cing bstan pa la
5a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mi num/ mi 'god ste/ de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid mi
5a6(brgyad stong): sgrog/ mi dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
5a7(brgyad stong): pa la bstan pa lags so// de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// 
5a8(brgyad stong): de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ gdams pa lags so// gal te de ltar gnas na/ de nyid gdams pa dang bstan pa lags
5b1(brgyad stong): gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha
5b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la bsgrims pas ji ltar bslabs na// byang chub sems dpa'i sems des kyang / rlo mos sems su mi bgyid pa de ltar bslab
5b3(brgyad stong): par 'gyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems ni/ sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba lags
5b4(brgyad stong): so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab
5b5(brgyad stong): 'bor ci sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan
5b6(brgyad stong): pA shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ci sems med pa gang yin pa de la yod pa 'am/ med pa
5b7(brgyad stong): dmigs sam/ yod dmishA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
5b8(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gal te sems med pa de la yod pa'am/ medo pa med cing / mi gnos gang tshe
6a1(brgyad stong): // dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad du sems gang la sems med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer ba khyod kyis brgal ba de rung ngam/ de skad ces smras pa
6a2(brgyad stong): dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems med pa de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
6a3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems med pa de 'gyur ba med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la leg so zhes
6a4(brgyad stong): bya ba byin te tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar khyed bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so// 
6a5(brgyad stong): legaso// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' som ba' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par brtag par bya
6a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par 'dod pas kyang / 
6a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub por bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab
6a8(brgyad stong): par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi so la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya// gzung bar bya/ 
6b1(brgyad stong): bar ba/ klog par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob par 'dod
6b2(brgyad stong): bas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
6b3(brgyad stong): nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu sgrub pa'i phyir rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
6b4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos gang la bslab cing rnal 'byor du bya'i// byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rgyas parashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bstan to// / 
6b5(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa 'di nyid la mnyar bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ 
6b6(brgyad stong): bcang bar ba/ klog par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
6b7(brgyad stong): bsgrub pa'i phyir/ rnal 'bor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab pa
6b8(brgyad stong): dang rnal 'byor du bya bo'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rgyas par bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'ongs la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
7a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di nyid bdag gi ma 'tshal ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal
7a2(brgyad stong): dmigs/ yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' ming de yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / shes
7a3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal mi dmigs/ yang dag par rje su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang gangams shing bstan
7a4(brgyad stong): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ ming tsam gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'dub
7a5(brgyad stong): dang / 'jig par 'gyid pa ni bdag gi blo ba la bags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ming de yang mi gan sa shing / mi gnas pa yang ma lags la/ rnam
7a6(brgyad stong): bar gnas pa yang ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pa'i slad du/ de ltar ming de mi gnas shing / mi gnas pa yang ma lags la/ rnam par mi gam
7a7(brgyad stong): ba sted bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa la/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ma num ma gong yi ma
7a8(brgyad stong): bsang / yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyi/ me skrag mi dong / dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 9/ 
7b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnaso// bcom ldan 'das
7b2(brgyad stong): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pas/ gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ tsher ba la ma lags/ 'du shes lam
7b3(brgyad stong): lags/ 'odu byed rnams la ma lags/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te gzugs la gnas na gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa
7b4(brgyad stong): la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa pa lags so// gal te de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa
7b5(brgyad stong): la gnas na/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// de ci'i phyir na na/ 'du byed rnams la spyod
7b6(brgyad stong): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yong su 'dzin pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa ma lagaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa
7b7(brgyad stong): ma gyur na/ yongasu mi gzung ba/ yongs su gzung bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
7b8(brgyad stong): la gzugs yongasu bzung ba mchi so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung
8a1(brgyad stong): / pa ma mchi so// gzugs yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang
8a2(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang yongasu gzung ba ma mchi so// de
8a3(brgyad stong): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod par bgyi'o// 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thas
8a4(brgyad stong): cad yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ yongs pa mdun du ma bgyis pa/ chang ma nges po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
8a5(brgyad stong): dang thun mongs ma lags pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa ste/ mtshan mar gzung ba ma lag so// gal te mtshan mar gzung
8a6(brgyad stong): gyur na/ kun tu rgyu gzo sbyangs 'di la dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ kun tu rgyu gzo sbyangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas dad pa'i rje su 'brang zhing phyogs ba
8a7(brgyad stong): ba'i ye shes kyis nigaso// de zhugs nas kyang gzugs yong su mi 'dzin te/ de bzhin du tshor ba ma 'gros/ 'du shes ma lags/ 'du byed rnams ma legs// rnam pa
8a8(brgyad stong): shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin to// de la shes pa de dag ra ba dang / bde bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang dge bar rdza su mi mthong / shes par
8b1(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs las gzhan na yang yang dag pa/ 
8b2(brgyad stong): rjesu mi mthong / de bzhin du shes pa de tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi nang dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang na yang yang dag par rjesasu mi mthong ngo // shes pa de
8b3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'di la
8b4(brgyad stong): kun tu rgyu gze sbyangs mes so// de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la thams cad du dad pas rjesu 'brang zhing chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/ mos pa zhes bgyi'o// des chos
8b5(brgyad stong): gang yang yongs su ma bzung // gang bzung ba la ma/ btang bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma dmig so// de ma ngan las 'das par yang rlom sems mi
8b6(brgyad stong): bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs gang lags pa yang
8b7(brgyad stong): yongasu mi 'dzin// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa yongasu mi 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs
8b8(brgyad stong): nga'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu ma rdzogs par bar ma der yengasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ bcom ldan
9a1(brgyad stong): / 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
9a2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pas 'di ltar brtag cing 'di ltar bsapa ste/ shes rab kyi pha
9a3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong gang gi yis ci chos gang med pa dang / mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin dang zhes/ gal
9a4(brgyad stong): te nge ltar bsams dam zhus ma gong yi mi gsod / ya~M gsad par mi 'gyid// de'i yid phyir pags par mi bgyid / mi skrag mi dang / dang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chu
9a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bo
9a6(brgyad stong): lA 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du
9b1(brgyad stong): ma bral bar rig par ba/ de skad ces spras pa dang // tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer gyis// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu// de de bzhi do// de de bzhin te
9b2(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu/ gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid kyang / tshe dang
9b3(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid da
9b4(brgyad stong): bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhar ba'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang gi mtshan nga
9b5(brgyad stong): bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo 'ang dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi 'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid
9b6(brgyad stong): kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// de skad ces sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor la 'di skad ces smraso// cha dang ldan pa rab 'ber ci bang chub sems dpa' sem
9b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'di la sleb par 'gyur ba de// thams cad mkhan pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'bar gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu de de bzhin// de ba'i
9b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la sleb par 'gyur ba de// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// de ci'i pir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
10a1(brgyad stong): bu ces thams cad rim byung ba skyes pa ste/ de ltar sbed mtshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin re/ 
10a2(brgyad stong): yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin// gzhan yang tshe
10a3(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brtsams te/ 'di skad ces spraso// gal te gzugs la spyod na/ mtshan ma la skyed de// gal te gcu
10a4(brgyad stong): kyi mtshan ma la spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// gal de gzugs pachar ma med pa'o// snyam du spyad ma/ mtshan ma la spyod// gal te gzugs 'byung ba la spyod ma mam
10a5(brgyad stong): ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs 'gag pa la spyod na/ mtshan ma la sbeng ngo // gal te gzugs 'jigs pa la spyod ma mtshan pa la spyod// gal te gzugs stong
10a6(brgyad stong): pa'o snyam du skyed na mtshan ma la spyod// bdag spyod de snyam na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa' snyam na// dmigs pa la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang
10a7(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la sbed na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la spyad na/ mtshan pa la spyad do// gal
10a8(brgyad stong): dernam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'o snyam du spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyong ngo // gal te rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// gal te rnam par shes pa 'ag
10b1(brgyad stong): pa la spyod na/ mtshan pa la sbed ngo // gal te rnam par shes pa 'jig pa la spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod na/ mtshan pa la spyod// bdag
10b2(brgyad stong): sbeng ngo snyam na/ mtshan pa la spyod de// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na/ dmigs pa la spyod do// gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// 
10b3(brgyad stong): snyam du sems na/ mtshan ma la spong // bang chub sems dpa' 'di ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
10b4(brgyad stong): skad ces sba se// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor bang chub sems dpa' chen po ji ltar spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pin pa la spyod pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang // tshe dang
10b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces spras// bal te gzugs la mi spyod/ ga/ thugs kyi mtshan ma la pi spyod/ gzugs mtsha
10b6(brgyad stong): med pa'i snyam du mi spyod/ gzugs 'byung ba la mi spyod/ gzugs 'gags pa la mi sbed/ gzugs 'jigs pa la mi spyod/ gzugs stong pa'o snyam du mi spong / de
10b7(brgyad stong): du gal te tshor ba ba la pa yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mtshan pa
10b8(brgyad stong): pa'i snyam du mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa sdang
11a1(brgyad stong): / pa'i snyam du mi sprid de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po re lngar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyong ngo // de spyod kyang spyod do snyam du nye bar mi
11a2(brgyad stong): 'gro mi spyod kyang mi spyod snyam dubya par mi 'gro/ spred kyang spyad la mi spyod kyang mi spyod de snyam du'i bA'i 'gro'o// spyod pa nyid kyang ma yin la/ mi skyed pa yang ma yin pa snyam du nye
11a3(brgyad stong): mi 'gro/ spyod par bya'o snyam du nye bar mi 'gro/ spyad par mi ba'o snyam du yang nye bar mi 'gro/ spyad par yang ba la mi spyad par yang bya'o snyam du nye bar mi 'gro/ spyad par bya ba 'ing
11a4(brgyad stong): kyang ma yin/ mi spyod par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin pa snyam du nye bar mi 'gre'o// de ci'i pir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni rjes su nye bar ma song ba/ ma blangs pa ste/ 'di ni byang
11a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin chos thams cad len pa mer zhes bya ste/ yangs pa bdu na du ma byas pa/ tshang ma nges pa nyan thos dang / rang
11a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ ring 'dzin 'di la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
11a7(brgyad stong): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer gyis 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das ti
11a8(brgyad stong): 'di la spong ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na
11b1(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ de ni tinge 'dzin de yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong // ting 'dzin des kyang rlom sems mi bgyid/ bdag ni mnyam par ga
11b2(brgyad stong): pa ste/ bdag tingange 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug/ bdag ding 'dzin la mnyam par gzhago// bdag ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o snyam pa de lta bu de la thams cad du thams cad
11b3(brgyad stong): rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis// de skad ces gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
11b4(brgyad stong): ting 'dzin gang la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na
11b5(brgyad stong): mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ngang chub tu lung bstar pa'i ting 'dzin de bstan du rung ngam/ rab 'bar gyis sA sa pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bu ma 'i no// 
11b6(brgyad stong): pir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ting 'dzin do yang mi shes/ yang dag par mi shes// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar mi shes/ yang dag par mi shes/ zhes zer ram/ rab
11b7(brgyad stong): 'bor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tinge 'dzin du med pas ram shes yang dag par ming she'o// ring
11b8(brgyad stong): mi shes/ yang dag par mi sheso// de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber la logaso zhes pa ba bin te/ 'di lngar khong sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs dang / sangs
12a1(brgyad stong): / rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis ston pa legs so lags// de de bzhi no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin du 'di
12a2(brgyad stong): la bslab par bya'o// ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsngo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe
12a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri ri bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rjo pa mas ya ska
12a4(brgyad stong): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tsha dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA riri bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga
12a5(brgyad stong): slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan ngas la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gso
12a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa chos gang la slob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
12a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de lngar slob pa ni// chos gang la yang mi slo'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos de dag ni ji ltar byis so so'i skye bo dza ltar mngon par zhen pa de bzhin du
12a8(brgyad stong): yong ba ma yino// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bur mochis/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar yod pa de bzhin du med/ de lder med pa de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// 
12b1(brgyad stong): de dag la bris pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnam mngon par zhen te/ de dag ni ches thams cad med pa la rtags pa'o// de dag gis brtags nas// mtha' gnyis la zhen pas chos
12b2(brgyad stong): de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ de'i phyir ches thams cad la rtogo// brtags nas mtha' gnyis la mngon par zhen te/ de'i gzhis dmigs pa la gnas nas/ 'das pa'i chos la rjeg
12b3(brgyad stong): ma 'ongs pa'i tshes la rtogo/ da ltar byung ba'i chos la rtog go// de dag gis brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa'i chos thams cad la brdags
12b4(brgyad stong): de dag gis med pa'i ches de dag thams cad la brtags pas/ lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes mi mthong ngo // lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes mi mthong bas/ 
12b5(brgyad stong): khams gsum nas nges par mi 'byung / yang dag pa'i mtha' khong du mi chu de/ de'i phyir de dag byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag ches bden pa la yid mi
12b6(brgyad stong): ches so// yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par mi pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
12b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slo'o// bcom ldan
12b8(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang mi sleb ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa
13a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ltar sleb na/ ches thams cad la sle'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sleb na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob
13a2(brgyad stong): ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gas
13a3(brgyad stong): to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig 'di skadadu// ci smra ba'i skyes bu 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur ram/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur ba yin nas/ thams
13a4(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes de skad du 'drin/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
13a5(brgyad stong): 'das kyis/ tshedang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor nga bas na/ 'di pa nyid la dri bar byas/ khyed kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du
13a6(brgyad stong): sngon cig ces pa' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la leg se nas gsol ngas/ mdong ldan parab 'byung bcom ldan 'das kyi lngar na pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
13a7(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgra ma'i gzhan la/ gzugs de gzhan nom/ sgyu ma de gzhan la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed de/ 
13a8(brgyad stong): gzhan nam/ sgyu ma de gzhan la/ rnam par shes pa de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la/ gzugs de yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
13b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid sgyu ma lags// sgyu ma nyid gzugs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la/ tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed de gzhan yang ma lags/ bcom
13b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la/ rnam par shes pa gzhan yang ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid sgyu ma lag so// sgyu ma nyid rnam par shes pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/ 
13b3(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ de la len pa'i phung po lnga la byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa pa 'di ni/ 'du shes kun shes pa brtags pa'i tha snyad yino// de skad ces
13b4(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
13b5(brgyad stong): pa la slob pa des sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ phung po
13b6(brgyad stong): lnga po nga nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'ongs kyis/ gzugs ni sgyu ma lnga bur gsungs te/ gzugs gang lags pa de yang dbang po
13b7(brgyad stong): drug dang phung po lnga po de dag lags te/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyang sgyum lnga bu'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang sgyu ma lta bu zhes/ btsa
13b8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis gsung na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa de yang dbang po drug dang / phung po lnga po de dag lags na/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems pa
14a1(brgyad stong): sangs ngornams na pa sanas/ skyugs ba dang / rang par 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis paka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor reg pa
14a2(brgyad stong): gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag du song bar gyur na ni/ skragacing dngang ba dang / dang bar 'gyur// rab 'byor gal te ba
14a3(brgyad stong): sems ripa sa kyichen po dag pa'i bshes gnyer gyi lag tus par gyu ro// sa d+hAg sa / bang bar mi 'gyur// ji skad ces pag 'ayul pado / btsamatho
14a4(brgyad stong): la tshe bldan pa rang 'byor gyis 'di skad ces latshal so// ma ldan sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po'i dge ba'i bshes gzhin rnams lags pa
14a5(brgyad stong): rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ston cing 'dom sa pa rnams dang / gang de la bdud kyis nyes pani
14a6(brgyad stong): 'di lta bur rig par bya/ bdud kyi zhes pa 'di dag yin/ bdud kyi las ni 'di ngag yon par rig par bya/ bdud gyi las 'di dag chag nas spang bar bya'ogs/ bdud kyi la
14a7(brgyad stong): ston pa ngas ni/ rob 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga ma chen po bzhes pa/ thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge bo'i ga shes gnanas
14a8(brgyad stong): su rig par bya'o// de skad ceso bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du
14b1(brgyad stong): 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
14b2(brgyad stong): zhes bgyi ba 'di/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed
14b3(brgyad stong): chu led med pa 'i ma pang shA la me byor byang chub sed se chen po ni/ chos thams cad chags pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rjed
14b4(brgyad stong): bar 'chang rgya ste/ rab 'byer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gang 'di skad/ byang chub sems da
14b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slong/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpachen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
14b6(brgyad stong): sprul pa/ sems can gyi phung po dang / sems can gyi ris chen po'i gtso bo bang par 'gyur bas na/ de'i pir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes pa'o// de nas
14b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gong gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spongs
14b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de'i dus la bab par shes na slebs par byos shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol ba/ bdag tu lta ba dang / sems cad du lta ba dang
15a1(brgyad stong): srog tu lnga ba dang / gang zag tu lnga pa dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lnga ba dang / chang par lnga ba dang / rtag par lnga ba dang / rang gi lus la lnga pa chen po'o
15a2(brgyad stong): bu la sogs pa'i lta ba de dag spang ba'i slad du chos bstan to snyam pas// don de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes 'gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tsha
15a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'ber gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnyed pa zhes bgyi bar spobs// bcom ldan 'das
15a4(brgyad stong): kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'ber de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
15a5(brgyad stong): baM zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa mas/ zag po med pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang
15a6(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mongs ma legs pa'i sems/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ mi mnyam pa dang pa'am pa'i sems te/ sems de la yang ma chags/ yo
15a7(brgyad stong): ma zin no// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems do ni zag pa ma mchis pa/ yongasu ma zin pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de yang zag pa ma mchis
15a8(brgyad stong): yongasu ma zin te// sems de yang ma chags shing yongasu ma zin pas na/ de'i slang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas che nga lnga
15b1(brgyad stong): pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'khor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i pir sems de la ma chags shing yongasu ma zin/ rab 'bor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
15b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems med pa'i pir/ sems de la yang ma chags shing yongasu ma zin to// shA ri'iri bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci sems gang sems med pa'i sem
15b3(brgyad stong): de yeng ngam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci sems med pa de la song pa 'am/ med pa zhes bya ba de yod dam/ darigs sam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
15b4(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'bar de lta ma yino// rab 'bor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de gal te sems med pa de la yod pa 'am/ med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang lda
15b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i btsi pir/ 'di skad sems gang med pa'i sems de yong ngam// zhes zer/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar khod bcom ldan
15b6(brgyad stong): 'das kyis// nyen mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legaso lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol
15b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ sems dpa' de go ma chen po bgos pa/ semos dpa' de theg pa chen po la yang dag par
15b8(brgyad stong): 'tshal ba lags pas na/ de'i srad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangasu mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar gyi
16a1(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol la// bcom ldan 'das go mchen po bags pa zhes bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das mim gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
16a2(brgyad stong): can po bges pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'bor 'di la bang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du/ bdag gi sems can dpag tu med pa yongasu mya
16a3(brgyad stong): nga mas brje'o// bdag gis sems can grangs med pa yongs mya ngan la sa bzla'o// sems can de dag de snyed cig yongs mya ngan las 'das kyang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das
16a4(brgyad stong): ba'i sems can gang yang med snyam du sems// de tsal pir 'an/ rab 'ber ches rnams kyi chas cing nga yin te/ rab 'bor dbar na// sbrum mkhan nam/ sbrum mkhan gyi rma
16a5(brgyad stong): ma mkhas pa/ lam po che'i ba'i mngor/ skye ba'igos chen po mngon par sprul te// mngon par sprul nas/ skye ba'i tshigs chen po de mi snang bar byas pa
16a6(brgyad stong): 'byor de ji snyam du sems// de la ches gang yang bsad pa 'am/ shi ba 'am/ bshig pa 'am/ mi snang bar gyur pa ye nga ngos/ rab 'byer gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
16a7(brgyad stong): ngos don mtsha so// yom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byer ra bzhin te/ sems can dag tu meng ba/ grangs med pa/ gongal du med pa mas mengs rgya
16a8(brgyad stong): las 'das kyang / chos gang yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos gong yang meng // gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di lta bur bstan pa'i zas
16b1(brgyad stong): na/ pi skrag mi dngang / dang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri go mchen po bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa
16b2(brgyad stong): 'bor gyis 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa'i der bdag gis 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de na
16b3(brgyad stong): gau cha ma mchis pa bgos par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na
16b4(brgyad stong): ge cha med pa bges par rig par ba'o// de ci'i pir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa 'di rim bas pa/ mngon pa ra 'dus ma bas pa'o// sems can gang dag gi ngon
16b5(brgyad stong): du go ra 'di bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma hA sa/ mngon par 'dus pa'o// de skadabaces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
16b6(brgyad stong): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ri ma bcas
16b7(brgyad stong): ma grel ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/ rnam par shes pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bcom ldan
16b8(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba la// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i de bzhin ring dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi nga bzhi di
17a1(brgyad stong): / dpa rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber la 'di skad ces spras
17a2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams // rnam par shes pa
17a3(brgyad stong): ma bcings ma grol po zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nying / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par shes
17a4(brgyad stong): ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar gzugs gang ma bcings ma grel zhes zer ba'i// gzugs de gang yin/ mdang ldan pa
17a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin/ rnam por shes pa gang ma bcings pa grol ba'i rnam par shes pa de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa
17a6(brgyad stong): rab 'bar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol zhes zer ba'i/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ tsher ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes
17a7(brgyad stong): kyi ngo bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i/ rnam par shes
17a8(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis// me dang ldan pa khams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces spraso// tshe dang ldan pa gang po
17b1(brgyad stong): skyes bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes
17b2(brgyad stong): bu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu mi'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nying ma bcings ma grol po'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tsher po'i
17b3(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ging yin pa de ni ma bcings
17b4(brgyad stong): ma grel ba'i// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa ma yin pos nam bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pas nam bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pas napa bcings ma grol ba ste/ 
17b5(brgyad stong): 'dzi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tha ga pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gro ma chen po'o/ ma dzad pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / medang ldan pa bya
17b6(brgyad stong): ba'i bu gang pi cang mi smra bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sengs
17b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po go ra chen po bgos pas theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing / theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'tshal ba lags/ theg pa chen po dgeng lags/ theg pa
17b8(brgyad stong): be gang du yang dag par zhugs/ theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po de gang na gnas par gyur/ zag pa chen po gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
18a1(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor thag pa chen po zhes pa pa 'di ni/ dpag tu med pa'i
18a2(brgyad stong): tshig bla dag so// rab 'bor dpag tu med pa zhes pa ba 'di ni gzhal du med pa'i pir// rab 'byor gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ khamra
18a3(brgyad stong): gsung yangs pa gru gyu mi/ d+hA za lang bag na pa de mang gro par dum shi bams par dzin pa 'i la gangs par 'gyu theg parim gang
18a4(brgyad stong): mi 'byung / nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ byi can// gang nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gas nges par 'thung ba'i chos de gnyis ga yang med cing mi dmigs te/ 
18a5(brgyad stong): lhar chos rnams med cing mi dmigs pa la/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tsha
18a6(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
18a7(brgyad stong): man nus nges par 'thung bar 'gyu'o// rnam pa' mtha' yas pas na theg pa chen po mtha' yas pa ste/ ji ltar dmakha' lasems can grangs ma mchis dpag tum mchis
18a8(brgyad stong): go skabs mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la yang sems can grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i go skabs mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
18b1(brgyad stong): grangs 'dis na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// 'di la 'ongs pa yang mi ganga'/ 'di la nges par 'byung ba yang mi gang2/ de la gnas
18b2(brgyad stong): kyang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar theg pa chen po la/ sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni dus
18b3(brgyad stong): gsum du banya mo// da bsar theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rab 'byor legs se lag so// de
18b4(brgyad stong): bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la babs ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ce
18b5(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du gsol baba'ab bas/ 'di yang theg pa chen po bshad par se
18b6(brgyad stong): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyis 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po ste
18b7(brgyad stong): par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta ma yin te/ rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la theg pa chen po rjesu 'thur pa
18b8(brgyad stong): ston to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ljon pa rab 'ber gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sngon
19a1(brgyad stong): / gyi mtha' yang nye bar mi mchi/ byang chub sems dpa' bi ma'i mthar yang nye bar mi mchi/ byang chub sems dpa' babusu yang nye bar mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na// nye bar
19a2(brgyad stong): mi mchig ky-i ba 'di ni gzugs su ma mchis pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mu ma mchis par rig par 'argya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
19a3(brgyad stong): dang rnam par shes pa phul mchis pas// byang chub sems dpa' yang mu ma mchis par rig par 'gyi'o// gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes nye bar mi mchi ste/ 'di yang
19a4(brgyad stong): mchis mi dmig so// de bzhi du sa dang / 'du byung rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' nye bar mi mchi ste/ 'di yang ma mchis
19a5(brgyad stong): dmig sa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dri thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams kyi da du mi dmigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang
19a6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi po'i chos de yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par rjesu mi dmigs// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par
19a7(brgyad stong): d+hi su mi mthong mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos de dag thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yang dag par rjesu mi mthong zhing mi dmigs na/ 
19a8(brgyad stong): chos gang zhig chos gang gis chos gang la gdams shing bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming rgyamo/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpal na
19b1(brgyad stong): bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsa mo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang ming tsam ste/ ji ltar bdag ces bgyi ba bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub de bzhin du// chos rnams ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa
19b2(brgyad stong): la gang gzung du ma mchis/ mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ de bzhin du tsher ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed gang lags/ gang gzung du ma mchis mngon pa/ 
19b3(brgyad stong): ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ de ltar chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa'o// gang chos rnams kyi mngon par ma grub pa de ni chos ma
19b4(brgyad stong): lags na/ ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par ma grub pas/ mngon par ma grub pa la gdams shing ba snyan par bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma
19b5(brgyad stong): grub pa las gud na/ ches thams cad ngapo/ bang nu ba sems dpa'i chos sam/ byang chub tu spyod pa yang mi da mig so// gal te de ltar bshad cing bstan pa la/ byang chu
19b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong / yi mi gsod/ yi gsod par mi bgyid// de'i yid phyir pags par mi bgyid/ mi skrag mi dngang / dngang bar
19b7(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ shes rab
19b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o zhes de ltar rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi ba
20a1(brgyad stong): ral tu phyin pa la chos 'di dag rab tu rnam par rdeg pa de'i tshe/ gzugs la nye bar mi 'gro// gzugs la nye bar mi rig/ gzugs 'gag par yang dag pa rjesu mi
20a2(brgyad stong): mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi 'gro/ rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi rig/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par
20a3(brgyad stong): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du na na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ gzugs pa lags/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa gang lags
20a4(brgyad stong): rgyas / bzu sa rnaMs rgya dzi gnasum mchis shing banas bgyid ma mchis/ 'jig pa dang 'jugs zhes
20a5(brgyad stong): bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyis bgyir mchis te/ gang yang gzugs shes bgyi bar ngir/ gnyisu ma mchis pa'i grangasu gtog so// de ban/ 
20a6(brgyad stong): du 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa
20a7(brgyad stong): ma lag s+ho// rnam par shes pa'i 'jigs pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ga
20a8(brgyad stong): su ma mchis shing gnyi su bgyir ma mchiso// 'jig pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyisu bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang rnam
20b1(brgyad stong): par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyisu ma mchis pa'i grangasu gtog so zhes de ltar yongasu rtogs na/ de'i tshe gzugs la nye bar mi 'gro// gzugs la nye bar mi rig/ gzugs 'a
20b2(brgyad stong): par yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi 'gro/ rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi rig
20b3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang yang dag par rje su mi mtho'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lag so// gzug
20b4(brgyad stong): kyi 'jig pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ 'thung ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyisu bgyir ma mchis
20b5(brgyad stong): 'jig pa dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni/ ga su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni/ gnyisu ma mchis pa'i grangasu gtog so// de
20b6(brgyad stong): bzhin du 'di ltar char ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam
20b7(brgyad stong): shes pa ma lags te/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyisu ma mchis te/ gnyi su bgyir ma mchi so// 'jig pa dang rnam par shes pa
20b8(brgyad stong): zhes bgyi ba 'di yang / gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyi su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi su ma mchis pa'i grangasu gtog so// 
21a1(brgyad stong): shes rabakyi la tu phyin pa brgyad spong ba/ bam pa gas pa// des pa dang ldan pa shAnga'i dus/ me nga ldan pa ra 'byung la 'di nang ces smraso// 
21a2(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rang 'byor gyis/ ji ltar bshad pa'i ngon po bas shes de/ byang chub sangs dpa' yang 'byung ba med pa yid// tshe dang ldan po rab 'byer gas de byang chub sems
21a3(brgyad stong): dpa' 'byung ba meng pa yid na/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyang po ci'i por spyod/ sems cad rnams kyi phyir sdug bsngal gang yod pa de dag bzed par bang cing myong bar
21a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe deng ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ be bo ro byang chub sems
21a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po da'ab spyad pa spyod pa ri po 'dod de/ gang dka' ba byed pa 'du shes pas spyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yino// de ci'i
21a6(brgyad stong): phyir zhen/ chongang ldan par shAng bu bde bar 'du shes pa nyid du byas shing / sems can thams cad la phar 'du shes pa dang par 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes padang / 
21a7(brgyad stong): bu mor 'du shes pa byas pa ma gangags par/ sems can grongs med dpag tu med pa'i ngad pa par mi nuso// de ldar skyes pa dang / bud med dag la 'du shes byas shing / bya
21b1(brgyad stong): pa dang / mar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mer 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// bdag nyid kyi bar du yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag thams cad thams cad
21b2(brgyad stong): rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la yang 'du shes 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems
21b3(brgyad stong): can 'di dag thams cad yongasu mi gtang ngo // bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu med pa las thar par ba'o// bang gi gi lus brgyar gtu
21b4(brgyad stong): kyang tha na 'di dag la bdag gi gnang sems kyang mi bskye snyam du// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de lngar
21b5(brgyad stong): gnas na/ da' ba byed pa'i 'du shes gnas pa pa yin// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji nas kyang
21b6(brgyad stong): thams cad du thams cang dam po thams cad kyi thams cad med cing mi ripags pa de ltar sems bskyod par byas te/ de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la 'du shes ba
21b7(brgyad stong): par bya'o// gal sems de ltar gnas na/ dka' ba bang ba'i 'du shesu gnas pa ba yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
21b8(brgyad stong): nges oM rdzinas kyang bdag ni thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de lder sems bskyed por byas te/ de bzhin du rang rang byi'i chos
22a1(brgyad stong): / dmas la 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// gal de sems de ltar spyod na/ dga' ba'i 'du shes cad du mi spyod de/ mengang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gang 'di skad/ byang chub sems
22a2(brgyad stong): dpa' ni 'byung ba med pa'o 'as smras pa de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri ri bu de re bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ri 'byung ba med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe da
22a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'bor ci byang chub sems dpa' nyid 'byung ba med pa 'am/ 'on te bang dub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa yin// rab 'bor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
22a4(brgyad stong): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'o ches rnams kyang 'byung ba medapa
22a5(brgyad stong): 'on te thams cid mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba med/ ba 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshedang ldan pa shA ri'i du thab so co mayin pa nyid kyang 'byung ba med// shA ri'i bus spras
22a6(brgyad stong): tshe nga ldan pa rab 'byor ci thams cad mkhyen pa 'ang 'byung ba medongs/ 'on 'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang 'byung po med // rab 'byor gyis sbas pa tshe dang ldan pa
22a7(brgyad stong): ri'i bu// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dkyi cho so rnams kyang 'byung ba med// shI ri'i bus smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci thams cad pa khyed pa nyid kyi chas dmas kyi 'byung
22a8(brgyad stong): ming ngam/ 'on te so so'i skye bo yang 'byung ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu so so yang 'byung ba me'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ me dang ldan pa
22b1(brgyad stong): 'byer ci se so'i skye bo nying 'byung ba med dam/ 'on te sa~M so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu so so'i skye ba'i chos rnam
22b2(brgyad stong): kyang 'byung ba me // de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor la 'di skad smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor byang chub sems dpa' yang 'byu
22b3(brgyad stong): ba red pa/ bang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba mang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa/ 
22b4(brgyad stong): so so'i skye bo yang 'byung ba med pa// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba meng na// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ thams
22b5(brgyad stong): mngon pa nyid rjesu theb pa ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
22b6(brgyad stong): mi byung ba'i chos la thob par kho bo mi 'dong de/ mngon par rtog pa yang me // ma byung ba'i chos kyis pa byung ba thob par mi 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
22b7(brgyad stong): 'bar cis byang ba'i chos kyis/ ma byung ba thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te byung ba'i chos kyis thob par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'iri bu ci ma byung
22b8(brgyad stong): 'on de byung po'i chos nyid ma byung / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci byung ba nyid/ 'byung ba med pa 'am/ 'on te ma byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ rab
23a1(brgyad stong): // gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'byung ba med pa'i chos/ 'byung ba med pa'i ches shes smra bar mi slebs// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'a
23a2(brgyad stong): 'thung ba med pa'i chos la smra bar khyod po spobs sapa/ rang 'byor gyis smras pa/  dang ldan pa shA ri ri'u 'byung ba med pa'ing spro ba yin la/ mdang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
23a3(brgyad stong): ba med pa nyid spobs par byed/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'byung po rang pa nyid spobs pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la'ing
23a4(brgyad stong): skad ces smraso// ma dang ldan pa rab 'byor no/ chos ston pa'i nang na mchog tu banag par bya'o// de tso phyir zhe na/ 'di lngar gnas brjon che dang ldan pa rab 'byor na/ gang ngong ga
23a5(brgyad stong): yangs dris pa/ debang da las 'byung bar 'gyu dang / chos 'ad las bya gams// na sasmras pa da/ tshe dang ldan parang 'byor byas/ mdang
23a6(brgyad stong): bul gang dus sbas// tshe ldan pa shAng du ma ldan tho pags sa can dpas ra nga rig las gang ba gang gis dris 'i de nga la
23a7(brgyad stong): par 'thung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid las kyang 'gal bar mi bye // chos nyid las kyang mi 'ang 'o// de ci'i phyir nam/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la gnas pa med de'i phyir/ sa
23a8(brgyad stong): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ljon pa rab 'bor legs leg so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
23b1(brgyad stong): chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ches thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir/ theg pa thams
23b2(brgyad stong): cad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di lnga bur bshad cing bstan pa
23b3(brgyad stong): nem nur du mi 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ gnas pa 'di lta bur gnas shing yid la bad pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin/ 
23b4(brgyad stong): nga ras tshe bong ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byir la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorabyang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po gang / shes
23b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu par ba la gnas na// ji ltar yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ang ra~M ga le te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23b6(brgyad stong): la bad pa dang ma grol bar gyur na/ de yang de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral por 'gyur zhing / tshe dnge ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub se
23b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral na/ de bzhin du yid la bad pa dang yang ma bral bar 'gyur la/ tshe dang ldan po rab byo
23b8(brgyad stong): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang la byed pa dang ma bral na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral ba'i du 'gyur te/ de lnga yin du
24a1(brgyad stong): zin na/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur// de ci'i bar zhen// sems can thams cad kyang yid la byed pa
24a2(brgyad stong): ma bral bar gan so// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyis// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu legaso// khong la ris te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus den 'di nyid yang dag
24a3(brgyad stong): pa'i tshig tu brjod pas yongasu brdu // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldano pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can ngo bo nyid med pason/ yid la byed pa de ba nyid rid pa rig par bya'o// cha
24a4(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can dngos po meng pos na/ yi nga la bad pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o// sems can dben pas na/ yid la byed pa dben par rig pa
24a5(brgyad stong): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub pas na/ yid la byed pa ma ngan par rdzogs par byang ma chub par rig par bya'o// 
24a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la bang pa 'di lta bu dang / gnas pa 'di wa bus gnas par 'dod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
24a7(brgyad stong): la sbyang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba rab 'byor gyi le'u ste dang por// yang po riche lnga'i dbang po brgya bying sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyis lnga'i bu bzhi khri dang ldan cig 'o
24a8(brgyad stong): ngo nyid du 'dus te 'khong par gyur to// 'jig rten spong ba bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhir ris kyi lho khro ma khrir bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag pa tshangs pa yang tshangs
24b1(brgyad stong): pa'i ris kyi lnga'i bu khrir bcas pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu lnga sdong 'khor de nyidang du 'dus de 'khong ngo // lnga'i bu rnams kyi rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa la skyes pa'i 'od ci yod pa
24b2(brgyad stong): de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang / sangs rgyas kyi bon gyis brlabs kyis zil gyis mnan no// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan
24b3(brgyad stong): pa rab 'bar la 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa rab 'bor lha'i bu stong phrag mang po 'khor 'dir 'dus te 'khod pa rnams/ 'phags pa rab 'bor las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
24b4(brgyad stong): pa dang / bang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi man ngag dang gdams pa dang bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab
24b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar rnal 'byor du bgyi/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ shi ka re'i bir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas
24b6(brgyad stong): kyi byir gyis brlabs kyis khyod la bstan par bya ste/ lde'i bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyong ba de dag gis kyang / bla na med pa yang
24b7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs pa ngag ni blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bsrud pa
24b8(brgyad stong): bsal pa med/ de ci'i phyir ring/  ngag gis 'khor po'i rgyun gyi mtshams gcang bas yang 'ang yang du 'khor zhing de ngag bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tus pas
25a1(brgyad stong): // bskyed pa'i bskal pa med med kyi/ 'on kyang gal te de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na rje su yid rang bar bya'o// khyad par du'ang
25a2(brgyad stong): nga'i chos rnams las ches khyang bar du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya ste/ de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs la kho bo bar chad mi bdo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
25a3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lo bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor leg so leg so// gang khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro bar byed pa leg so legs// de skad ces
25a4(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang lnga na pa rab 'byor gyis 'ang skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gos ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin brtse
25a5(brgyad stong): bar bgyis te/ mi bzo bar mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sngon gyis de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
25a6(brgyad stong): kyi drung du/ sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur nas/ byang chub tu tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa la/ nyad thos gzhan dag gis pha rol tu yin pa rnams la gdams shing bstan seM la
25a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis spyod pas bla na med pa'i ye shes bskyed// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnapas rdza su gzung bar
25a8(brgyad stong): brgya'o// rjesu bskor bar bgyi'o// yang dag par yongasu gzung bar 'gyi'o// yang dag par yeng su bskor bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag cag
25b1(brgyad stong): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjesu gzung ba dang / rjesu bskor ba dang / yang dag par yongasu gzung ba dang / yang dag par yongasu bskor bas/ myur du bla
25b2(brgyad stong): dmed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ko 'uru shi ka de'i phyi
25b3(brgyad stong): shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bab kho bos khyod la bshad par
25b4(brgyad stong): ba'o// ke'u shi ka bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gnas par bste/ ko'u shi ka bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
25b5(brgyad stong): chen po ge cha chen po bgos pa nges gzugs la gnas par mi ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byung rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi
25b6(brgyad stong): bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi pa'o// de bzhin du phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang pir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// / 
25b7(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas nying la gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du gzugs shes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tsher ba'o zhes/ 'du shesau we/ 
25b8(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnam so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'o zhes gnas por mi bya'o// de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du
26a1(brgyad stong): la cig pir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu le gas bya ba dang / de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du
26a2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du sangs rgyas zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
26a3(brgyad stong): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi ba'o// gzugs bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du
26a4(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'o/ zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bdag dang / bangag med pa'o
26a5(brgyad stong): gnas par mi dag// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par she/ sa pa bad ga dang / bdag ring ba'i 'as gdas par mi bya'o// 
26a6(brgyad stong): sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas
26a7(brgyad stong): mi bya'o// gzugs zhi ba 'am ma zhi ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba 'am ma zhi zhes gnas
26a8(brgyad stong): b.ro ma bya'o// gzugs steng pa'am dmigs pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa 'am/ 
26b1(brgyad stong): sdong ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus ma bas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du lan cig par 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / pir mi ye
26b2(brgyad stong): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus ma pas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma bas kyis rab tu bo ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs
26b3(brgyad stong): rgyas 'di 'dus la byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i 'oso gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa sbyin pa'i gnasu shes bya bar gnas por mi ba'o// rgyu du zhugs pa ji lngar thog kyong sring pa
26b4(brgyad stong): lan bdun pa'o zhes gnas par mi ba'o// lan cig pir 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gnas shes pa bar gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba yongs mthar ma phyin pa'i bir/ 'jig rten 'di
26b5(brgyad stong): lar cig par 'ongs nas/ sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyu ro zhes gnas par mi ba'o// pir mi 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gnaso zhes gnas par mi bya'o// pir mi 'ong ba 'jig
26b6(brgyad stong): rten 'dir po ri mi 'ong bar de nyid yongasu ma nganau las 'da' zhes gnas par mi pa'o// dgra bcom pa sbyin pa'i gnas zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom po 'di nyid phung po'i lha
26b7(brgyad stong): ma dang po'i ma ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gan so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs
26b8(brgyad stong): rgyas ni nyan thos kyis las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma thob par yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyuro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni sbyid pa'i bar so 'as
27a1(brgyad stong): / gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni se sa skye ba ris dang / nyan thos deng / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ grangs med dpag tu meng pa'i sems can rnams kyido// 
27a2(brgyad stong): mdzad/ grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can yongasu mya ngan las 'das/ grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams/ rang sangs rgyasu nges par mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi
27a3(brgyad stong): sa la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o zhes nges 'di lngar yang gnas par mi ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems
27a4(brgyad stong): te/ gal te sangs rgyas kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ grangs song dpag tu med pa'i sems can gyi nga mdzad nas
27a5(brgyad stong): me dpag tu med pa'i sems can yongasu mya ngan las 'da' sde sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas/ sangs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhes/ ngas de
27a6(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya na/ des ji ltar gnas par bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi rdeg pa
27a7(brgyad stong): sems kyis shis nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
27a8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci la yang gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
27b1(brgyad stong): zhen tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni mi gnas pa ste/ de ni 'dus pas kyi khams la yang mi gaH
27b2(brgyad stong): la/ 'dus ma bas kyi khams la mi gnas te/ de las bzhengs pa yang ma yi no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa
27b3(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu/ bang chab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci la yang
27b4(brgyad stong): mi gnas shing mi gnas pa yang ma yin/ rnam par mi gnas pa de bzhin du/ des de ltar bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par bya
27b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshe gas pa'i gnas pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gnas pa ra bya'o snyam pa ni/ mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs
27b6(brgyad stong): par gnas pa yin te/ de ltar 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o// de nas 'khor de'i nang na lci'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 
27b7(brgyad stong): gdong sbyir rnams kyi gang/ gnod sbyin gyis bshad pa'i gnod sbyin gyi tshig de dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi brjed pa de dag sma na shes par rung gi/ gnas
27b8(brgyad stong): badz+rad tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber gang spro zhing brjod pa dang / ston cing 'chad pa 'di ni shes par mi rung snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lnga'i
28a1(brgyad stong): / bu de dag gi sems kyi rdeg pa sems kyis shes nas/ lnga'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lnga'i bu de dag shes par mi 'dra sa bya ba dza/ 'di lngar 'di la cung zad
28a2(brgyad stong): pa dang / cung zad kyang theb par mi rung ras bla'i bu dag 'di snyam du sems te/ e mtsho 'phags pa rab 'khyer 'dzi na gsal bar ba'i pa'o// sem sa 'phags pa rab 'byor
28a3(brgyad stong): ni gsal bar byed pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ni/ ring babs kyang ches ring du 'ju// pra ba bas kyang ras phra bar 'jug zab pa bas kyang ches zab tu 'jug ste/ ston
28a4(brgyad stong): chang ngas so// de sa sangs rgyas kyi nus/ tsho nga lnga/ pa rang 'byang gyis/ rje'i bung dag gi sems kyi pasams kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de ngag la 'angs
28a5(brgyad stong): ces smras// 'aM bung ba de rdza bas / ga rgyud du nusanga'i 'bros bu thob pa rang ba dang / d+hAn tu tham pa'i 'bras yul gnas par 'dod bu dang / gang
28a6(brgyad stong): sa phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bul gnas par 'dzid pa dang / gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dong ba dang / phyi
28a7(brgyad stong): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu le gnas par 'dong ba dang / gang dgra btsor ba nyid thob par 'dong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnos par 'dod pa dang / gang rang byang chub thob par 'ong/ 
28a8(brgyad stong): pa dang / rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod na yang / bzod pa 'di la mngon par mi 'gru'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod cing / bla na med pa
28b1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod na yang / bzod pa la ma brten par mi 'gru'o// de nas yang lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas brtan rab 'bor 'di la
28b2(brgyad stong): chos mnyan pa ji lta bu dag btsal bar ba snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyi shos nas/ 
28b3(brgyad stong): bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu kho ba la chos nyan pa ni/ sgyu ma dang sprul pa lta bu dag btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i pir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni nyan par mi 'gyur/ mngon du byed par
28b4(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur ba/ lde'i bu dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor la 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa rab 'byor ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin nam/ rmi lam lta bu yin na
28b5(brgyad stong): rab 'bar gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu/ sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ lha'i bu dag de ltar sgyu ma dang / sems can de
28b6(brgyad stong): ngag ni gnyi su med de gnyisu byar medo// de ltar rmi lam dang / sems can de dag ni gnyi su med gnyisu byar medo// lha'i bu dag chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'o// rmi lam lnga
28b7(brgyad stong): bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang sgyu ma lta bu'o// rmi lam lta bu'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan
28b8(brgyad stong): cig par 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lnga bu rmi lam lnga bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgra
29a1(brgyad stong): / ma lnga bu/ rmi lam lnga bu'o// sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o// rmi lam lta bu/ rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyum lnga bu/ rmi lam lnga bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
29a2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lnga bu/ zi lam lnga bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs ri'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbrum lta bu/ zi lapa rdzi du'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer
29a3(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smras// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyum lte bu/ rmi lam lnga bu'o zhes zer ram/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
29a4(brgyad stong): nyid kyang sgyu ma lnga buM/ rmi lam lnga bu'o// zhos zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ l-I'i bu dag mya ngan las 'ang sa pa yang sgyu ma lnga bu/ thilam lnga bur sma na/ chos
29a5(brgyad stong): gnar lnga ci spris/ lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyum lta bu/ rmi lam lnga bu'o zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras
29a6(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag kho bo nI gal te mya ngan las khengs pa las/ khyang bar du 'phogaso pa'i chos gnan zhig sung kyang / de yang sgra ma lnga bu// rmi lam lnga bu zhes smras// do ni 'di
29a7(brgyad stong): sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmilam lta bu dang / mya ngan las 'das po 'di ni gi nye su me gnyi su byar med// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa dngas ma'i bu gang po dang
29a8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma dang lha cig tu/ tshe
29b1(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la su dag yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang
29b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa kur dga' bo// gnas brtan de reg la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lba ba phur sus rog
29b3(brgyad stong): pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
29b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gnas brda nga ngag la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la/ yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang mi 'phrul/ 
29b5(brgyad stong): de ci'i par zhe na/ 'di ltar de la chos gang yang ma smos/ cho sa gang yang yongasu snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma bcas te/ de lta bas na ji ltar 'di la chos
29b6(brgyad stong): gang yang ma smos/ res gang yang yongs snang bar ma bas/ chos gang yang ma bcas pa de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa gang yang
29b7(brgyad stong): mi 'byung // de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis/ de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan na/ bdag gis kyang 'di lngar me dog dag
29b8(brgyad stong): mngon par sprul te/ 'phags pa rab 'bor la gangar ngo snya mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// de'i tshe me tog mngon par sprul nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la mngan pa
30a1(brgyad stong): gtor to// de nas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha'i dbang po brgya byin la rjesu brjod pa'i phyir 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
30a2(brgyad stong): mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni/ bdag gis sngon chad sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas na yang yod par ma mthong ste me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di lhor lha'i
30a3(brgyad stong): dbang pol mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni/ shing dang / gal pa dang / khri shing las smras pa ma yin gyi/ yid las byung ba'i mi rtog gas pa 'gro de ras lnga'i dbang pa
30a4(brgyad stong): byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rdog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras// btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma
30a5(brgyad stong): byung ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las skyes pa'i me tog ni gang yang med/ shing dang / gel ba dang / khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'a
30a6(brgyad stong): gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// ko'u shi ka da skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa ste/ me tog ring dag yid las skyes pa ma yin/ shing dang / gel po
30a7(brgyad stong): dang khri shing las skyes po yang ma yin nas zer na/ ka ru shi ka gang mi skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma
30a8(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor/ shes rab zab ste/ ming dang tshig tu brtags pa yang ston la/ de dang yang 'gal bar mi byed la de nyid gsal bar byed cing / de nye bar ston snyam te/ de nas lha'i
30b1(brgyad stong): po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor la 'di skad ces spraso// 'phags pa rab 'byor de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ji skad du ston pa de bzhin du/ byang chub
30b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de la bslab par bya'o// de skad ces sbas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dadang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras// kai'u
30b3(brgyad stong): shi ka de nga bzhino// de de bzhin te/ de lngar byang chub sems dpa' sems 'apa' chen pos de la bslab bar bya'o// kau'ashi ka byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de lnga
30b4(brgyad stong): bslob na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'o mi spro'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dong / dgra bcom pa nyid la mi slo'o// rang sangs
