30b5(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid la mi slo'o// sangs rgyas nyid la mi spong ste/ gang sa 'di la mi slob pa de ni sangs rgyas nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slo'o// gang sangs
30b6(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid dang / thams cad maben pa nyid la slob pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa tshad med pa la slob/ gang sangs rgyas kyi ches dpag tu med pa/ tshad med
30b7(brgyad stong): pa la slob pa de ni/ gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slo'o// de tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la pa yin/ ram pa
30b8(brgyad stong): pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par ba bo'i pir mi slobo// gang gzugs 'phel bar bya pa dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang / gang tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes
31a1(brgyad stong): // lam yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib pa rabya ba'i phyir slob pa de ni/ gzugs yongasasu gzung ba dang / ngo
31a2(brgyad stong): bya ba'i phyir mi slo'o// tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la mi ya/ rnam par shes pa yongasu gzung ba dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slobo// chos
31a3(brgyad stong): gang yang yongasu gzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i pir mi slob bo// gang chos gang yongasu gzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu
31a4(brgyad stong): gzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slo'o// de ltar slob pa 'byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing // thams cad
31a5(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la nges por 'byung // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shrI 'obus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces spraso// tshe dang ljon pa rab 'byor byang chub sems pa
31a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang chos gang la yongasu gzung ba dang // nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu gzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir
31a7(brgyad stong): mi slob ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
31a8(brgyad stong): nges par 'thung // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan paM shA ri'i bu de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan po shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31b1(brgyad stong): be gang / chos gang yang yengasu gzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongasu gzung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slob na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
31b2(brgyad stong): ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung // de nas lha'i dbang po
31b3(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan paM shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
31b4(brgyad stong): nas btsal bar bya/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshe dang pa rab 'bor gyi
31b5(brgyad stong): las btsal bar bya'o// de ska ces smras pa dang / lha'i de bang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu
31b6(brgyad stong): 'di lngar 'bags pa rab 'bor shes rab kyi pha rol tu pan pa 'chad pa 'di su'i mthu/ 'di su'i bani gyis rlabasu rig par bya/ shA ri'i bus sbas pa/ ko'u shi ka tshe dang
31b7(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang 'chad pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu sde/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabasu rig par bya'o// de na
31b8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smra so// ko'u shi ka gang 'di skad bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang ba 'di su'i mthu
32a1(brgyad stong): / 'di su'i byin gyis brlabasu rig par bzhes zer ba ni/ ko 'u shi ka bdag shes rab kyi le tu phyin pa 'chang pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhi/ 
32a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gang yang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas
32a3(brgyad stong): btsal bar bya zhos zer ba ni/ ke'u shig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' mi pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs las kyang btsal ba po bya/ gzugs
32a4(brgyad stong): las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya/ tshor ba la mi yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin// rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya'o// 
32a5(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko ru sha~M ka 'di ltar gzu gas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzug
32a6(brgyad stong): las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma // de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi
32a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ rnam par shes po las gud na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med// de skad ces smos pa dang / gli'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldanapa
32a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byoraro la 'di skad ces smra'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// 'dini pha rol tu phyin tsha
32b1(brgyad stong): be'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chang rang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
32b2(brgyad stong): 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin// ko ru shi ka de ngo bzhin te/ 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chang meng pa'i
32b3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ri mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa
32b4(brgyad stong): pir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu par pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byeng rnams dang / rnam par shes
32b5(brgyad stong): pi batha' yas pa'i phyir/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha ra la tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyi
32b6(brgyad stong): pa chen po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du tshang med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// zhes songang par chags par
32b7(brgyad stong): bya de// ke'u shi ka de lta bas ra 'di ste ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u ga ki dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir
32b8(brgyad stong): lnga sde/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ke'u shi ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
33a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// yang ko'u shi ka ji ltar dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
33a2(brgyad stong): 'dzin/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe na/ 'dushig 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi theg pa dang / dbus dang / tha po dmigs te/ de bas dge' shig shes pa
33a3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
33a4(brgyad stong): pa 'dzidi ni/ mthara' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi/ gzhan yang 'di ltar ris thams cad mtha' yas su meng / da ngog gi theg pa'i / dbus sam/ tha pa ya
33a5(brgyad stong): mi dmigs te/ de bas na ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi
33a6(brgyad stong): thog pa 'am/ dbus sam/ tha ma yang mi rimig so// kau'adun ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / dam par shes pa'o theg ma 'ang/ dbus
33a7(brgyad stong): sam/ tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs de lta bur 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu rin po 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau'u
33a8(brgyad stong): ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas su 'ang / de ci'i phyir zhen/ sems can la thog pa 'am/ dbums ma tha ma yang mi dmigs/ de wa bsod 'di lnga ste
33b1(brgyad stong): shig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de skad ces spras pa dang / bla'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'a
33b2(brgyad stong): skad ces smras// 'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/ sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras
33b3(brgyad stong): pa/ ke'u shi ka bgrang ba'i tshul lam/ bgrang ba mang po sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa yin/ brgya bir gyis smras pa
33b4(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'bor 'o na ji ltar sems can mtha' yas pa 'i phyir/ 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'o mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa/ rab
33b5(brgyad stong): gyis smras pa/ koTo shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste/ sems can nas bya ba 'di chos gang gi rig bla rlabs yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags
33b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ sems cad sems can zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ba yin/ chos med pa'i reg bla dgas kyang ma yin te/ ming du brdegs pa 'di ni blo
33b7(brgyad stong): du byung ba'o// mang du bdags pa 'di ni dngos po meng po'o// ming du btags pa 'di ni/ bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba medo// 'di lnga sde/ sems can sems can des ming du bad
33b8(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni dmigs par // gnas brdan rab 'bor gyis sbas bai/ ke'u shi ka 'di dza snyam du sems/ 'di la sems cad du yongs bsdar par byas pa gang yang ngas
34a1(brgyad stong): // smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko ru shi ga gang la sems can yongasu bstan par byas pa med pa de la/ sems can pa
34a2(brgyad stong): yas pa yed / kau'u shig gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bska pal cwo klung gi bye ma snyed du byin gyis @
34a3(brgyad stong): te/ dbyangs mtha' yas dgo bar byed pa dang / gsung dbyangs zab mos/ sems cad sems can zhes tshig tu brjed du zir kyang / de la sems can gang yang skyes pa 'ab/ skyeH
34a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod dam/ smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de lta ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems cad
34a5(brgyad stong): mnas dag pa'i phyir/ sems can thog ma nas yongasu dag pa'i phyiro// smras bko'u shi ka rnas grangs 'dis kyang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ 
34a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin pas/ na/ ko'u shi ka de ltar yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha'
34a7(brgyad stong): par rig par bya'o// de nis dbang po dang bcas pa lha dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag por bcas pa da / drang srong dang skyes pa dang / bud med kyi
34a8(brgyad stong): rnams kyis lon gsum du/ cheng du brjod pa ched du brjod/ kye mchos/ kye mchos rnams kyi chos nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags
34b1(brgyad stong): ba gnas brtan rab 'bar gyis legs par spras pas/ brjod cing bstan la rab tu gzhago// bcom ldan 'das nga slan chang bdag cag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
34b2(brgyad stong): po/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'di la gnas
34b3(brgyad stong): ba 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dbang por bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdas
34b4(brgyad stong): por bcas pa dang / drang srong dang bcas pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud med kyi tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin// lnga'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ lci'i bu dag
34b5(brgyad stong): gang gi cha rgyal po'i po drang 'khor na/ mar me can zhes bya ba'i tshong 'dus kyi dbusu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
34b6(brgyad stong): rgyas par me mdzad kyi drung du/ nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
34b7(brgyad stong): rgyas mar me mdzad kyi/ khyed ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa na/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
34b8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang ring bar ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ 
35a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasu 'gyu'o nas/  bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rung bsruran to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lnga'i bu de dag
35a2(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lngar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa
35a3(brgyad stong): nyi yongasu sdud cing rje su yongasu 'dzin pa ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu mtshar de nis 'dzer to// brgya byin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// shes ra
35a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad spong ba// bam po gsum @/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'khor de lho'i bu dag 'dus te 'khong par gyur pa dang / dge slong
35a5(brgyad stong): dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod bar gyur pa dang / 'khor bzhi pa thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa
35a6(brgyad stong): mkhyen nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / tshangs ras kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / 'od gsal gyi lnga'i bu rnams dbang du bzhag ste/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs
35a7(brgyad stong): pa/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lnga rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshungs ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'od gsal gyi lnga'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi
35a8(brgyad stong): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed dam/ rab tu 'don na// de la bdud dam/ 
35b1(brgyad stong): bdud kyi ris kyi lha glags lta ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la/ mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed par yang mi 'gyuraro// rigs
35b2(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyis bu mo de yang ba mi spong bas/ 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang lha'i bu dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
35b3(brgyad stong): yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gang dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung ba dang / ma bcang ba dang / ma klags pa dang / kun chub par ma
35b4(brgyad stong): byas pa dang / rab tu mi 'don pa'i lha'i bu de dag rig sa kyi bu de'i drung du 'ong 'dod par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa deng / 2
35b5(brgyad stong): ba dang / klog pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de la nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par
35b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
35b7(brgyad stong): chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de dag pas mtha' dgon par song yang rung / shing drung du song yang rung / khyim stong par song yang rung / lam du song yang rung / 
35b8(brgyad stong): lam gel bar song yang rung / 'brog dgon par song yang rung / nye bar song yang rung ste/ 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba mi 'byung mi skye'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom
36a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
36a2(brgyad stong): pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par bgyid pa de la bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / snga bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
36a3(brgyad stong): la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang
36a4(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par brjid ba dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de dag la ba srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom
36a5(brgyad stong): 'das la/ tshangs pa mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang / 
36a6(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'do par 'gyur
36a7(brgyad stong): ba de la/ bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po bdu byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
36a8(brgyad stong): rig kyi lu ma/ rigs kyi tshul gang gis rab kyi rol tu phyin pa ya 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub pa bgying bar dang / rib du 'angam pa
36b1(brgyad stong): tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag thob cing / yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung na/ pha rol tu
36b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka
36b3(brgyad stong): de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad bzung bar 'gyur/ ke'u shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi
36b4(brgyad stong): pha rol du byo pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kung chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ngas
36b5(brgyad stong): 'di la yon tan 'di dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba/ leg sa par rab tu nyin la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bsha // bcom ldan 'das la lho'i
36b6(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya bar gyis legs zhes gsol nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
36b7(brgyad stong): 'u shi ko de la gang la la zhig ches 'di la rtsod pa dang / rgod par 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed 'dod pa zhig byung na/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'ad
36b8(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'gal bar byeng 'dod pa de dag gi rtsod pa dang / rgol ba dang 'gal bar byeng pa gang byung zhing skyes pa med par gyur te/ rtsed par 'dod pa dang / 'gal hA
37a1(brgyad stong): // byed 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mi 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
37a2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'angon par 'gyur na/ de'i rtsong pa'i gzhi byung zhing skyes pa de dag med
37a3(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par mi 'gyuraro// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
37a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de rje 'ad
37a5(brgyad stong): yon tan 'a dag yong su 'dzin par 'gyu /  chu/ 'di sa ste dper na/ ci nang med ces bya ba du/ thams cing zhi bor byed pa zhis yod de/ de spyi bad+d+ha
37a6(brgyad stong): gdug pa bkres shing zas 'dod de/ zas tshol ba zhig gi srog chagasu gyur pa 'ga' zhig mthong ste// sbrul gdug pa des zas kyi phyir bza' bar 'dod nas/ srog chags
37a7(brgyad stong): gyur pa de'i dri phyogasu 'brang zhing brlags pa dang / srog chegasu gyur pa de/ rtsi nad med pa de gang na yod pa der song nas/ byin te 'dug pa dang / de nas sbrul de rtsi
37a8(brgyad stong): de dri tsam gyis phyir ldog/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ltar sbrul gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa de ni/ rtsi nad med de'i sman gyi yon tan de yin te/ ko'u shi ka rtsi
37b1(brgyad stong): de ri de ltar mthu che'o// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chu
37b2(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de la ni/ ko'u shi ka rtsod pa dang / rgol ba dang / 'gal bar byed pa gang dang gang byung ba de dag thams cad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
37b3(brgyad stong): pi'i gzi brjid dang mthus de dag med par 'gyur/ nye bar zhi zhing nub par 'gyur/ de gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid du nub par 'gyur zhing 'gags te 'phel por ma
37b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur// ko'u shi ka rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lci'i dab nga po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
37b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'a don pa de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / smra bar
37b6(brgyad stong): ko'u sho ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nges tshe 'di la yon tan de dag yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro// kai'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
37b7(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de'i tshig gzung bar 'gyur/ tshig
37b8(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ tshig 'tshal po mang par 'gyur/ khro bas zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur/ nga rgyal gyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar / 
38a1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ yongasu dul bar byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bsgyur te/ khro ba 'bel bar mi byed/ nga rgyal 'phel bar mi
38a2(brgyad stong): / khon du 'dzin yongasu mi 'chang / gnod semasu mi 'chang la/ bag la nyal ba mi 'dzin te/ rigs kyi bri 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ltar spyod pa la dran pa dang / byam
38a3(brgyad stong): skye bar 'gyur cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal 'i bdag gis gnod sams bskyed du sbyin na/ bdag gi dbang po rnams 'khrugs shing / ba'in gyi mdog kyang tshu
38a4(brgyad stong): bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yang dag par zhugs shing 'di la sled par 'a ded pa/ khro ba'i dbang du 'gro ba 'di ni mi rigs snyam
38a5(brgyad stong): de byur du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ ko'u sho ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
38a6(brgyad stong): ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba des/ tshe 'di la yon tan de dag yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dab
38a7(brgyad stong): brgya byiran gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa di de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
38a8(brgyad stong): po rnams yongasu dul ba dang / khengs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka
38b1(brgyad stong): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byeng bar 'gyur
38b2(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don par 'gyur na/ gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
38b3(brgyad stong): dang rab tu 'don pa dang / kha ton byed pa de/ thab mo g.yul 'gyeng ba'i tshe/ g.yul gyi thogs par byung // de thab mo g.yul du 'jug gam/ g.yul du zhugs sas
38b4(brgyad stong): gal te 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug pa la/ 'di lta bu'i gnas ma yin zhing skabs med/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
38b5(brgyad stong): yid la 'dzin pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ klog pa 'am// kun chub par byed pa 'am/ rab tu 'don pa la ma/ kha ton byed pa de'i srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba
38b6(brgyad stong): 2ma/ gzhan gyis gnod par byed pas/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba de 'i gnas ma yi'o// gal te de la mtshon 'phangs na/ lus la phog par mi 'gyuro// de ci'i phyi
38b7(brgyad stong): zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen po'o// ko 'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bla med pa
38b8(brgyad stong): rig sngagaso// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags te/ ke'u shi ka rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i ga
39a1(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo na pa ngag la gnod par bya bar yang mi sems/ gzhan la gdeng bar bya bar yang mi sems/ gci ga la gnod par bya bar mi sems
39a2(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya ba
39a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams
39a4(brgyad stong): cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rig sngags 'di la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang mtho
39a5(brgyad stong): pA 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ mngon sum du ma byas pa gang yang me // de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya ste/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
39a6(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub por byed pa dang / rab tu 'dzin por byed pa des/ ma 'di la yon tan de dag

39a8(brgyad stong): bzhag la bkur ba stir byas te/ mi 'dzin mi 'chang / mi glog/ kun chub par ma byed/ rab tu 'don par mi 'gyur yang / ko'u shi ka da~M la las kyi rnam par smin
39b1(brgyad stong): ma gtogs par/ mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags lnga ba dag gis/ glags bltas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de tshe 'di la yon
39b2(brgyad stong): tan 'di yang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i kho ra yug na 'dug pa dang / byang chub
39b3(brgyad stong): kyi snying po'i nang ra 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i drung na 'dug pa'i mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro yar chad kyang mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis/ kyal ka bya ba

39b5(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam so// mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs pa ra 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par
39b6(brgyad stong): 'chang rgyab/ sems can thams cad mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'khon pa dang / mi skrag pa ston cing brjod pa de bzhin du/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu re
39b7(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed pa de la las kyi dam par sman
39b8(brgyad stong): ma gshegs par/ mi 'pham sa yi pa dag gis kyal ka bya ba 'am/ sang pa 'am/ go ring bar byed mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
40a1(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid kyis/ sa sogs de sems can rnams kyi mchod rten du gyur par byas pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / bla ma
40a2(brgyad stong): ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / don gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi skyabs dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / dpung gnyen du byas par 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal pa 'a/

40a7(brgyad stong): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung dag mchod rten gyi nang du bstsal te/ yongasu 'dzin cing bcangs la/ de dag la yang de bzhin du lci'i me teg dang / bdug pa dang / 
40a8(brgyad stong): spos dang // phreng ba dang / thug po dang / phye ba dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / 
40b1(brgyad stong): mched pa rnam pa mang po ngag gis bkur stir bgyis/ bla mar bgyis/ ri mor bgyis/ mchod cing rje de gsol na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gnyis gang bsod

40b3(brgyad stong): nying la dri bar ba ste/ khyed kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems// gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs po'i

40b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
40b8(brgyad stong): nyid bsnyes shing / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de lta bas na/ sku de lta bu bsnyes pas na/ de bzhin go
41a1(brgyad stong): // pade bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grang su mi 'gro ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nying brnyes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gra
41a2(brgyad stong): 'gre'o// ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de yang // shes rab kyi pha rol
41a3(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa las byung ba yin pa ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi dngos po'i sku gdung du grub pa yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa las
41a4(brgyad stong): byung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sdig su gyur pa yi'o// de ltar gnas la badzin nas thams cang mkhyen pa'i yo shesu rab tu dbyel// sangs rgyas kyi sku
41a5(brgyad stong): gdung rab tu 'o// ma su rab tu 'byo'o// dge 'dun durab tu phye bar 'gyur// de mar bdag gi ras po'i sdug du du grub pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
41a6(brgyad stong): kyi rgyu las byung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur gyur pas na/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing / dge ba ba dang / bkur bsngor bya ba dang / 
41a7(brgyad stong): bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / gsol bar bya bar gyur pa yin// de lta bas na nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku
41a8(brgyad stong): gdung ngo dag la yang mamado pa de lta bur 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di bris nas/ glem
41b1(brgyad stong): bar du chung bar byas te/ 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / sdes dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
41b2(brgyad stong): mtshan dang / ba dan ngag dang / khor yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur bstir bad/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par
41b3(brgyad stong): byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skye // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des thams cad du
41b4(brgyad stong): po'i ye shes lo mchod par 'gyur ro// yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas/ glegs bam du chung par
41b5(brgyad stong): byas te/ bkur bstir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang // ri mor bya ba dang / mchong bar bya ba dang / rjed pa ra bya ba dang / gsol ba dang / mchod pa rnam parang
41b6(brgyad stong): nges ba na/ 'di nyid do ga ni las bsod rangs ches yang du bskyed// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par 'gyur ba des
41b7(brgyad stong): cang ro khyen pa'i ye shes la mchod par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan
41b8(brgyad stong): 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi gang dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ bkur bstir mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ ri mor mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid
42a1(brgyad stong): rjed par mi bgyid/ gsol ba mi bgying bde dag/ bcom ldan 'das 'chal bar 'gyur ram/ de ste 'tshal bar mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
42a2(brgyad stong): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ mchod pa 'i byas pa de ltar ngo che ba dang / sman mor che ba re dag mi rig sa 'tshal to// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'ad
42a3(brgyad stong): kyis lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko ru shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu gling gi pi re dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la shes nas dang pa rje
42a4(brgyad stong): gang dag chos la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la shes nas ngad pa dang ldan pa ji snyed cig yod/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
42a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di ska da ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi de dag las/ gang dag sangs rgyas la shes na
42a6(brgyad stong): dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag chos la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo // de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
42a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ 'dzem bu'i gling gi ming dag las gang dag sa
42a8(brgyad stong): rgyas la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag chos la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyu // ga
42b1(brgyad stong): ngag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung // gang dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / gang dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ni/ 3
42b2(brgyad stong): ba de bas kyang kyis 'a'o// gang dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa ni// nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyu // gang dag rang byang chub mngon du byed pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // 
42b3(brgyad stong): gang dag bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa da/ nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung // gang dag bla na phreng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
42b4(brgyad stong): sems bskyed nas/ sems bskyed pa de rab tu rgyas par byed pa de ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung // gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
42b5(brgyad stong): tra sems bskyed/ sems bskyed pa rgyas par byas nas/ brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa de ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyu // gang dag shes rab tu
42b6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung // gang dag
42b7(brgyad stong): rung kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa de ni nyung ba de bas kyang ches nyung ngo // ke'u shi ka gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
42b8(brgyad stong): spyod cing 'bad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
43a1(brgyad stong): / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas te/ bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
43a2(brgyad stong): mo lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pir bra la slob cing 'bong ba rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar ston cing / 'dzin du
43a3(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'chang du 'jug pa dang / klog tu 'jug pa dang / kun chub pa bang du 'jug pa dang / rab tu 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la lnga'i me tog da
43a4(brgyad stong): bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / no bza'i dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshon dang / ba ngan rnams dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang
43a5(brgyad stong): mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur bstir bya/ nga du 'jug/ bla mar byeng du 'jug/ ri mor byed du 'jug/ mchod du 'jug/ rjed du 'jug/ gsol du 'ju
43a6(brgyad stong): pa ni nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung // ko ru shi ka gang dag byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyeng nas/ byang chub kyi sems rgyas par byed cing / byang chub
43a7(brgyad stong): kyi sems rab tu rgyas par byas te/ byang chub tu spyod po'i sems can grangs ming dpag tu med pa yod do// ko'u shi ka sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa byang chub la skye
43a8(brgyad stong): pa de dag las gal te na gocig gam/ gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang
43b1(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/ brtson 'grus nan pa dang / le lo can dang / sems sdebs zhan pa dang / 'du shes dman pa dang / dad pa dman pa dang / shes rab dben pa rnams
43b2(brgyad stong): kyis bsgrub par dka'o// kai re shi ka de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang myur du bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
43b3(brgyad stong): 'chang rgya bar 'dod pas rgyun mi 'chang bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// rab
43b4(brgyad stong): tu 'don par bya'o// yongasu dri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'dri lta bu shes te/ de bzhin gsheg
43b5(brgyad stong): pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe yang / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs kyis/ bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjesu bsla
43b6(brgyad stong): par bgyi'o// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bdag cag gi smon pa'o snyam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
43b7(brgyad stong): rgyas bzhugs kyang rung / yongasu mya ngan las 'ongs kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten pa
43b8(brgyad stong): bya'o// ko'u shi ka de bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 
44a1(brgyad stong): su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod brten/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can byed du 'acun
44a2(brgyad stong): ste/ byas nas kyang des de la ji srid 'tshe'i bar du rtswa me ga dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / 
44a3(brgyad stong): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag dang / khor yug tu mar mo'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bsngor byed/ bla mang byed/ ri mor byed / mchod
44a4(brgyad stong): par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ ke'u shi ke de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed
44a5(brgyad stong): dam brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma ngango // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u sh-i/ 
44a6(brgyad stong): de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dang te/ rtog cing mos la sems dpabs/ byang chub tu sems
44a7(brgyad stong): bskyed nas lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / ston pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dzin pa dang /

44b1(brgyad stong): ba kyis yongasu dbyed par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyur chad par ma gyur cig/ ram pa'i chos rub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i ches yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang
44b2(brgyad stong): la bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bas/ thar glegs bam du chung bar byas te/ 'chang ngam/ bzhag la de la rigs
44b3(brgyad stong): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me nges lha'i me dog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / be ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba

44b6(brgyad stong): gyi snying po can lnga zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me gang la las 'jam+bu'i gling 'di kun tu rin po che'i mchod rten gyi gang bar byed du bcug ste/ byas
44b7(brgyad stong): kyang nga ngag la ji srid 'tshe'i bar du lba'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba ring / byug po dang / bai ra dang / bza' dang / gdugs dang/ rgyal
44b8(brgyad stong): rang bdang ngag dang / khor yub tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa dam pa reng ba dag gis/ bkur ba stir byed / bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mcheng ba
45a1(brgyad stong): / byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed nga

48a2(brgyad stong): pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta zhog gi/ kau'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
48a3(brgyad stong): las sems cad de dag so so nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can byed du bcug ste/ de dag la ji srid 'che'i bar du
48a4(brgyad stong): lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / da bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan ngag dang / khor yu
48a5(brgyad stong): tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa med po ngag gis bkur po ster byed/ bla bar byed/ ri ma byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed// gsol
48a6(brgyad stong): byed na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems// sems can/ de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du ba skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a
48a7(brgyad stong): mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol
48a8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing mos la/ sems dang bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 
48b1(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang // rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'dzi
48b2(brgyad stong): den rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rje su rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongasu dpod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chang bar ma gyur cig/ da
48b3(brgyad stong): pa'i ches nub par ma gyur cig ces/ das pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang sa bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub pa bas
48b4(brgyad stong): par 'gyur bar/ thar grags pas du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam po dag la/ de la lnga'i me dog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug po
48b5(brgyad stong): pa ma dang / na bza' dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar ma'i phreng ba ngag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur
48b6(brgyad stong): bsngar bad// bla mar byed/ ri mer byed / mched par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed pa lnga zhig gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
48b7(brgyad stong): khar sa na/ sems can gang su dag yod pa de dag thams cad brdeg pa yongasu bzung sde/ snga pi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de dag kyang sems can so so nas
48b8(brgyad stong): rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bskul gyi snying po can re re bang du bcug ste/ byed du bcug nas kyang sems can so so nas mchod rte/ 
49a1(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad la bskal pa 'am/ bskal ba las lhag par sil snyan thams cad dang / glu dbyangs thams cad dang / gar thams cad dang / rnga dang / pheg
49a2(brgyad stong): rdob pa thams cad dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag
49a3(brgyad stong): dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur bstir byed/ bla bar byed/ ri mor byed// mchod par byed rjed par byed/ gsol
49a4(brgyad stong): bar byed la/ sems can de dag thams cad de lta bu'i ba sod nams bya ba des/ mchod rten tshad med gang sa med dpag tu med pa dag byed du bcug ste/ de lnga
49a5(brgyad stong): bur mchod pa dag kyang byed du bcug na/ ko ru shi ka 'dzi snyam du sems/ sems can de dag de'i gni las bsod nams mang du spyod dam/ brgya byin gyis
49a6(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
49a7(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de// rtog cing mes la sems dang bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 
49a8(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang da
49b1(brgyad stong): par ston pa dang / de'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyi rjesu rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongasu dpyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma
49b2(brgyad stong): par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la / 
49b3(brgyad stong): gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar/ the na glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam bzhag5/ de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba
49b4(brgyad stong): dang / byug pa dang / be ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang
49b5(brgyad stong): de dag gis/ bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed// mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed na/ 'di nyid de bas ches mang du skyed // de skad
49b6(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la ldi'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de nge bzhi no// de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'ad
49b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa la bkur stir bgyid pa dang // bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / rjed par bgyid pa dang / gsol
49b8(brgyad stong): bar bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyis yongasu ma
50a1(brgyad stong): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa rnams la/ shin tu bkur bstir bgyis pa dang / bla mar bgyis pa dang / ri mor bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis pa
50a2(brgyad stong): dang rjed pa dang / gsol bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'di lta bus/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lnga zhog gi/ bcom lda/ 
50a3(brgyad stong): 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang la'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad so so nas rin po che sna bdun gyi mtshang rten de bzhin gshegs pa
50a4(brgyad stong): ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re bgyid du stsal lo// sems can de dag so so nas mchod rten de dag thams cad las bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sil
50a5(brgyad stong): snyad thams cad dang / glu dbyangs thams cad dang / gar tha mas cad dang / rnga dang pheg rdib pa thams cad dang / lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 
50a6(brgyad stong): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang // phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu bar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis
50a7(brgyad stong): bkur bstir bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ rjed par bgyid// gsol bar bgyid pa bas/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bum
50a8(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa
50b1(brgyad stong): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ten bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa
50b2(brgyad stong): dang 'dir don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rje su rtog pa dang / ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongasu dpyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyu

50b4(brgyad stong): bsgrub pa bgyis par 'gyur/ tha na glegs bam du chud par bgyis te/ 'chang ngam/ bzhag la/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des lha'i me tog dang / 'dus

50b6(brgyad stong): ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur stir bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mer bgyid/ mched par bgyid/ rjed par bgyid/ gsol bar bgyid na/ 'di nyid
50b7(brgyad stong): ngo'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du skyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// de de bzhino// ke'u shi ka de de bzhin
50b8(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gni las bsod nams mang du skye // ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nga de'i gzhi las bsad nams
51a1(brgyad stong): / dpag tu med pa skyed// ko ru shi ka rigs kyi ru'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams grangs med pa skye // ko'u shi ka rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu me
51a2(brgyad stong): de'i gzhi las bsod nams bsam gyis mi khab pa skyed// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mtshungs pa med pa skye// ko'u shi ka rig
51a3(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams gzhal du med par skyed// ko'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
51a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skye so// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa ni thams cad da
51a5(brgyad stong): pa nyid las byung ste/ ko'u shi ka de lta bas na rigs kyi bu la ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa 'di la mngon par dang de/ rtog cing mes la som
51a6(brgyad stong): ngang bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang
51a7(brgyad stong): lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel ba dang / yid kyis rje su rtog pa dang / ji lta bu
51a8(brgyad stong): grub pa'i shes rab kyis yongasu dpyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i ches rung bar ma gyur cig ces/ dam pa'i chos yun ri
51b1(brgyad stong): du gnas par bya pa dang / tshul dang ma bral bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar/ tha na glegs bam du chung
51b2(brgyad stong): par byas te/ 'chang ngam bzhag la/ de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
51b3(brgyad stong): dang / ba dan ngag dang / kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/ bla bar byed/ ri mor byung / mchod par byed/ rjed par byed

51b5(brgyad stong): bkur stir byis pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma nges/ brgya'i char yang la bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bya ba'i char
51b6(brgyad stong): yang / be ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yong / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ grangasu yang / bgong bar yang
51b7(brgyad stong): dper yod / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas lha'i bu bzhi khri gang dag/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang bcas par 'khor der 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa de dag la/ lnga'i dbang po
51b8(brgyad stong): brgya bin gyis 'di skad ces smra so// grags pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bgyi'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bgyi'o// grogs
52a1(brgyad stong): khengag shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa klag par bgyil// grags po dag shes rab gro pha rol tu phyin pa kun chung bar 'gyi'o// glegs pa shes cab kyi ma
52a2(brgyad stong): rab tu gan par 'bya'o// grogs pa shes rab kyi rol du phying bu rung bad par brgyal// grags pa shes rib gro 'i'i byon pa la bas du brgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'a
52a3(brgyad stong): kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di ska sa bkra' stsal to// ko 'u shika khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzung shig/ ke' ga gi khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
52a4(brgyad stong): byin pa tshangs shig/ ni tshu shi ka khyod kyis shes bgyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhogs shig/ ko'u na ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub pa
52a5(brgyad stong): byos shig/ ko'u shi ka khyed kyis shes rab kyi bar la du phyin pa rab tu thon cig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lung zhes shig/ 2
52a6(brgyad stong): ko khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kha ton du byos shog/ de co'i phyir na na/ ke'u shi ka gang gi tshe lnga ma yin rnams 'di lta bu sems kyi rgyu ba byung ste/ 'a
52a7(brgyad stong): snam du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang 'thab par bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed par bya'o snyam ra/ de'i mako'u shi ki khyod kyis shes
52a8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran par byos shig/ kha ton du byos shig dang / lha ma yi de dag gi sems kyi rgyu ba de lta bu de dag nub par 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsa
52b1(brgyad stong): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen po'o
52b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sde/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bla na med pa'i rig sngagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
52b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
52b4(brgyad stong): 'u shi ka de de bzhin// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen po'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes
52b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na mang ba'i ga sngags// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
52b6(brgyad stong): rig sngagaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di la brten nas/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
52b7(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// ko'u shi
52b8(brgyad stong): 'di lnga ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par
53a1(brgyad stong): // rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di la bzhed nas/ bAn

53a6(brgyad stong): rig sngags 'od la brten nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / 
53a7(brgyad stong): byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i tshad med pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub rtsa
53a8(brgyad stong): yon log dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa drug rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byor// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten du rab tu 'bying / 
53b1(brgyad stong): mang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri ba ni sdeng yang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byeda'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / rang byung gi ye shes dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes byab
53b2(brgyad stong): rten du rab tu 'byeda'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa

53b7(brgyad stong): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi yon log dang mi ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed // ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla
53b8(brgyad stong): dkyil 'khor la brten nas sman dang skar ma rnams stebs ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta bar kun tu snang bar byed/ rgyo skar rnams kyang sdebs dzaM lba ba dang
54a1(brgyad stong): lta ba bzhin du snang bar byed// ke'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das nas/ dam pa'i ches nub
54a2(brgyad stong): gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba na/ chos spyod pa dang / mtshungs par spyod pa
54a3(brgyad stong): dang / dge ba'i spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten du snang ba dang / rab tu 'byed pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' las skyes shing / byang chub sems dpas ral
54a4(brgyad stong): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs me kha sa pa de yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon paM las skyes para'i rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang shes

54a6(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yid la byed pa dang / dran par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me rnams de'i gzhi las/ tshe 'di la yon tan mang
54a7(brgyad stong): rnams re bar bya'o// de ska ces bka' stsal po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs
54a8(brgyad stong): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bum de dag tshe 'di la yon tan gang dag dang ldan por 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
54b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo de dag ni yang ba ri spong bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur
54b2(brgyad stong): mes 'chi ba'i dus bde par mi 'gyur/ dbyig pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ ngo dag la rgyal po dang / 
54b3(brgyad stong): blon po dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag gis gtse bar byung zhing skyes na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed pa dag la phyir mi snang bar 'gyuraro// 
54b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dang yang kha ton bad pa de dag la der glags lnga pa dang / glags tshol ba gang dag nye bar 'ongs par gyur na/ 'di ltar shes
54b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i phyir de ngag gis glags rnying par mi 'gyuraro// rgyal po 'am blon po 'am// rgyal po'i blon po dag nye bar 'ongs na yang smra bar 'ang
54b6(brgyad stong): cing gtam zer bar 'dod de/ yang dag par dga' bar bya'o snyam du sems par yang 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ni/ sems
54b7(brgyad stong): can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis byams pa nyo bar sgrub pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyis snying rje 'bar sgrub pa la gnas par 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka de lba ba
54b8(brgyad stong): ma rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gtson zar dang / grog sbur dang / dgon pa'i nang du song ba nga dag la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa glags lnga pa dang / grags tsho
55a1(brgyad stong): / bde dag gis kyang / de dag la sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs pa glags rnyed par mi 'gyur// de nas mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba brgya klan ka tshol
55a2(brgyad stong): ba'i bsam pas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ong ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byir gyis/ gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong nas
55a3(brgyad stong): dngag gi sems la kun tu brtags te/ 'di snyam du gsan du stegs ca kun tu rdzu 'di ga kun patshal ba'i bsas pas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba dang 'ong gis/ 2
55a4(brgyad stong): cag gis ci nas kyang gnad mu sngags cad kun tu rlung dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar mi 'ong bar bya'o// de ltar byas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
55a5(brgyad stong): bshad pa la bar chad du mi 'gyuraro// snyam nas bcom lda na 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin po de ji tsam bzung ba de tsam blos dran par bya/ kha ta/ 
55a6(brgyad stong): du rab tu mngon par bya'o snyam du bsam so// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa ji tsam bzung ba de tsam dran pa
55a7(brgyad stong): bsams te/ kha ton du byas shing rab tu 'don pa dang // nges las gnon mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag rgyang ring ba bas kyang chos ring ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
55a8(brgyad stong): bskor ba byas te/ sgo nga nyid dang lam de nyid nas phyir log ste ngo // de nas tsha dang ldan pa shA ri bu'adi snyam du sems te/ de ci'i phyir ji skar bu sngags can ku
55b1(brgyad stong): rdzu deng ba rgyang ring ba bas kyang ches ring ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ sgo de nyid dang las de nyid nas slar ngong snya mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tsha
55b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa de sems kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gzhan du
55b3(brgyad stong): sngags can kun tu rgyu glan ka tshol ba'i bsam pa can de dag gi sems ngag mthong nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa la bar chad byed par gyur na mi rudro zhes/ 
55b4(brgyad stong): na ras shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa la gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag mi 'ong bar gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rtsod par 'dod pa de dag
55b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa 'di dran pas bsams te/ kha tan du byas shing rab tu bton to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar nges kyang gnang // de ci'i bya
55b6(brgyad stong): den shA ri'i bu gzhan yang mu sngags can kun tu rgyu de dag la/ chos dkar po gcig kyang yod par nges pa mthong ste/ de dag thams cad ni glan ka tshel ba'i bsam pa
55b7(brgyad stong): 'gres pa'i sems kyis 'ong bar 'do par gyur to// de nas bdud sdug can 'di snyam du sengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
55b8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag tshogs shing 'khod/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur cing / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lnga'i bu 'jingag
56a1(brgyad stong): // kyang mngon du gyur pa lags na/ 'dir ni nges par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
56a2(brgyad stong): lung ston par 'gyur gyis/ mig gis mi rtsol bar bya pa'i phyir/ bodag nye bar 'gro'o sna po// de nas bdud sdigs gyis yang lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs mngon pa
56a3(brgyad stong): sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de nas lho'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te/ yan lag bzhi pa'i
56a4(brgyad stong): dpung gi tshogs mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ong ba yin gyi/ yan la ga bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi g.yul gang yin pa 'di na
56a5(brgyad stong): rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i yan lag bani pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi g.yul yang ma yin no// shAkya rnams kyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs
56a6(brgyad stong): kyi g.yul yang ma yin// litsa byi rnams kyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi g.yul yang ma yin// 'di na bdud sdig can gyis mngon par sprul pa yin te/ 
56a7(brgyad stong): bdud sdig can ni yun ring po naso// com ldan 'das la glags sde ba dang / rmugs tshol ba dang / sems can rnam sa mi sem pa'i bsam pas rjes 'brub/ 
56a8(brgyad stong): bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang dran pas bsam par bya/ kha ton du bya/ rab tu gdon par bya'o snyamo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes
56b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dran pas bsams shing / kha ton du byas te/ rab tu bton pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dran pa
56b2(brgyad stong): bsams shing kha ton du byas te/ rab tu bton pa de lta de lta bur bdud sdig can lam de nyid nas slar log sde song bar gyur to// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu
56b3(brgyad stong): rnams kyis/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag mngon par sprul te/ bar snang gi na mkha' la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mngon par gtor cing mngon par ra
56b4(brgyad stong): tu gtor te/ 'di skad du kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yun ring mo zhig nas 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nang du byung zhes che du brjod pa che du
56b5(brgyad stong): nas/ yang lha'i me tog rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mngon par gtor/ mngon pa ra rab tu gtor te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
56b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa de dag ni/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lnga
56b7(brgyad stong): rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
56b8(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyidu rnal 'byor du bgyid
57a1(brgyad stong): gsangs cad dag ni ngang ngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ gang dag gi na lam du grag par gyu
57a2(brgyad stong): pa'i sems cad de dag gis kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bgyi ba bgyis pa lags ra/ gang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par 'gying pa dang / 
57a3(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang / lung 'ong ba dang / kha kon du bgying pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin nying du rnal 'byor du bgying
57a4(brgyad stong): 'chi smos te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can drang gi gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bku bkris pa lag so// de ci'i slad ben/ 'od wa ste/ shes
57a5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis thams cad mkhyen panyid rab tu 'byed// 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
57a6(brgyad stong): ste/ dper na rin po che gang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/ rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu bye ba lags// de dag ni rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar bgyi ba lags te/ ba
57a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das nga bzhin du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes
57a8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka
57b1(brgyad stong): sul te// 'u shi ka nge bzhin// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ring pa
57b2(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgya mtsho chen po 'di las skye so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcos lngar
57b3(brgyad stong): 'das de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pin pa'i yon ngan pa gsung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi gsung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ri gsung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
57b4(brgyad stong): pin pa'i mi gsung / bcom ldan 'das ri bsam ga tan gyi pha rol tu rin po'i bsngags pa mi gsung mi brjod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
57b5(brgyad stong): gcig pu'i ring brjed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ 'astsal pa// de de bzhi no// kun dga' ba de de bzhi/ te/ nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa'i bsngags pa ste
57b6(brgyad stong): cing sba ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan mi brjed do// de ci'i phyir zher/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// kun dga'i bo 'di ji snyam du sesa?/ 
57b7(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yengasu ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dga' bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
57b8(brgyad stong): ngo ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du yongs pa bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang / yengs ma bsngos pa'i bzed pa dang / yongasu pa bsngos bI
58a1(brgyad stong): 'grus dang / yengasu pa bsngos pa'i bsam gtan dang / kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu ma bsngos pa'i shes rab kyi pha ro
58a2(brgyad stong): du phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de nas lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo 'di
58a3(brgyad stong): snyam du sems// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su bsto bas yongasu bsngos pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ri/ bsam gyis mi khye'o// kun dga' bas
58a4(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin de/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsde bas/ yongasu bsngo ba'i shre
58a5(brgyad stong): rang gang lags pa don/ bsam gyis mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ dam pa yin pa'i pir/ pha rol tu phyin
58a6(brgyad stong): pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos bi'i byir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa lnga
58a7(brgyad stong): sngon du 'gro ba'o// rdul 'dis pa rol tu po bldan/ shes rab kyi pa rol du byed pa'i rang du 'ongs// 'di rje ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas bya ba 'o// pa
58a8(brgyad stong): du phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs pa'i tshig bla dag sa// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi po rol tu phyin pa brjod na// pha rol tu phyin pa drug po tham so cang brjod par
58b1(brgyad stong): 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper// sa chen po la sa bon btab pa tshogs pa dang phrad na skye bar 'gyur te/ sa chen po ni sa bon de dag gi gni yin pas sa chen po la
58b2(brgyad stong): brjen nas/ sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur// kun dga' bo de bzhin du/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yang dag par bzung zhing / thams cad pa/ 
58b3(brgyad stong): pa 'ad la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gnas pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa lta skye bar 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu gzung ba'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa
58b4(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ming theb par 'gyur// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lnga'i sngon du 'gre zhing yongasu 'dre na// de nas
58b5(brgyad stong): com ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / klags
58b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung mnos pa dang / kha ton bgyis pa nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo de yon tan gang dag yongasu 'dzin
58b7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i legs/ bcom ldan 'das las gang blangs zhing rab tu bton pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan de dag pa
58b8(brgyad stong): dadung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma brjod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau'u shi ka legaso legs
59a1(brgyad stong): ke ru shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa 'dzin pa dang / 'arang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung dod pa dang
59a2(brgyad stong): 'cher byed pa de dga'i tshal/ yon tan 'di dag 'byung ba ma yid gyi/ ko ru shi gzirigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bri pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi rdul rgyun tshang bar ma gyur
59a3(brgyad stong): cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces/ das pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / rdul dang ma bral bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags
59a4(brgyad stong): pa bsgrubs pa byas par 'gyur bar// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas/ glegs bam dri chung bar byas te/ bzhag la de la lnga'i me tog dang / bdug pa
59a5(brgyad stong): dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / kho ra yug tu mar
59a6(brgyad stong): po'i phreng ba dag dang / mched pa rnam pa yang ba dag gis/ bkur stir byed/ thal byed// ri mor bang / mchong par byed/ brjed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ 
59a7(brgyad stong): ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu me da'i cha 'di nyid kyi yon tan nges bshod par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
59a8(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub pa
59b1(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / lha'i me tog dang / bdag pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' da
59b2(brgyad stong): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar mo'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ ri mer
59b3(brgyad stong): bgyid / mched par bgyid/ rjed par 'gyid / gsol bar bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan
59b4(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa da/ lha'i bu brgya phrag mang ba dang / lha'i bu stong
59b5(brgyad stong): phrag mang po dang / lha'i bu brgya steng phrag mang po rnams/ ches nyan pa'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar 'gyuraro// l+li'i buM de dag ches nyan pa na/ chos smra ba de'i spongs pa nye bar
59b6(brgyad stong): bsgrub snyam du sems par 'gyur// gang gi tshe chos smra ba de mi smra bar ba 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ lha'i bu de dag gis chos la gus pa de nyid kyis spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par
59b7(brgyad stong): sems// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ji ltar smra bar 'ding por 'gyur ba/ ke'u shi ka de yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang
59b8(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha tor byed par 'gyur ba dag tshe 'di la yon tan 'a
60a1(brgyad stong): ngag yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang ba la/ glan gatshol ba la
60a2(brgyad stong): la rgal na mi rung snyam du sems zhus par mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba bar byed/ shes rab kyi pha
60a3(brgyad stong): rol 'byin pa la gnas pa'i glan ka tshol ba yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi
60a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pas yengasu bzung ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ gas kyi gu mo la rnam grangs de lta bur rgol ba gang yang mi 'byung // mi skrag mi dang dngang bar mi byed/ 
60a5(brgyad stong): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha ra la tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don

60a8(brgyad stong): ba byung zhing skyes pa dang / chos dang ldan pas tshar gcod nus par 'gyur/ mthu yod par 'gyur te/ pha rol gyis brgal kyang brgal ba la lan 'debs nus pa
60b1(brgyad stong): 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dod

60b3(brgyad stong): bris nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mi des glegs bam du chud par byas te/ bzhag par gyur pa der/ ko'u shi ka rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag gi nang na/ lha'i
60b4(brgyad stong): bu gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dge der 'ong bar sem sa te// der 'ong nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
60b5(brgyad stong): glegs bar du chud par bas pa la blta bar 'gyur/ phog 'tshal bar 'gyur/ 'dud pa bang bar 'gyur// 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog
60b6(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur/ lung nang par 'gyur/ kha ton byed par 'gyur te/ bltas shing bag byas nas/ 'dud pa byas/

60b8(brgyad stong): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dag gi nang na/ lnga'i bu gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag der 'ong bar sems
61a1(brgyad stong): der 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas pa la blta bar 'gyur/ phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur/ 'dud pa byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin pa
61a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'angon par 'gyur/ lung nod par 'gyur/ kha ton byed par 'gyur te/ bltas shi
61a3(brgyad stong): phyag byas nas 'dud pa byas/ gzung ba byas/ bcang po byas// klag pa byes/ kun chub par byas/ rab tu 'dzin par byas/ lung mnos shing kha ton pas te/ yang phyir
61a4(brgyad stong): 'gro bar semaso// ke'u shi ka 'thaba' bral gyi lhag gi nang na/ lha'i bu gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa

61a6(brgyad stong): 'dud pa byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur/ lung meng par 'gyu

61a8(brgyad stong): mnos shing kha ton byas te yang phyir 'gro bar soms// ko'u shi ka dga' ldan gyi lha dag gi nang na/ lha'i bu gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
61b1(brgyad stong): tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag der 'ong bar sems te/ der 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas pa la lta bar 'gyur/ phag 'tshal
61b2(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ 'dud pa byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur/

61b4(brgyad stong): rab tu gdon pa byas/ lung mnos shing kha ton byasate/ yang phyiri 'gro bar semaso// ko'u shi ka 'phrul ngaga'i lnga dag gis nang nau lha'i bu gang su dag
61b5(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang nga ga par zhugs pa de dag der 'ong bar sems te/ der 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

62a1(brgyad stong): / shig gas 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rag gi rang ra/ lha'i bu gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag der 'ong

62a5(brgyad stong): phyir 'gro bor sems// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dag gi reng ni/ lci'i bu gang sung ga yod pa las/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na cha

62b2(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha dag gi nang na/ lha'i bu gang su dag yod pa dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'ong chung dang / tshad med 'ang dang / 'ang

63a2(brgyad stong): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham yin dang / namakha' lding dang / ma 'am ci dang / lto 'ape chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag glegs pas 'di wa
63a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes shig/ pa gcol cig/ 'dud pa gyis shig/ zung shig/ tshangs shig/ lcogs shig/ kum chub par gyis shig/ rab tu thon cig/

63a6(brgyad stong): bskyed par bya'o// ko'u shi ka khyod 'di snyam du/ glong bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dred pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lnga'i bu gang dag bla na med pa yang
63a7(brgyad stong): dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag nyi tshe der 'ong ba snyam du sems par gyur ni mi rung ste/ ko'u shi ka de ltar mi blta'o// ko'u shi ka
63a8(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu/ bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

63b8(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nges 'dir lha 'am/ kla 'am
64a1(brgyad stong): sbyin nas/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nas/ nama'ab lding ngam/ mi 'amachi 'am/ lde 'phye chen po 'am/ mi 'amam pa lags pa rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

64a5(brgyad stong): 'am gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin dam/ nam kha' lding ngam/ mi 'am tsa 'am/ lto 'phye chen pa 'am/ mi 'am mi ma yin pa dag 'dir 'ongs
64a6(brgyad stong): lhagaso snyam du rtogs par bya'o// gzhan yang ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me nges mi ma yin pa'i dri sngan chad ma bsnams pa bro bar gyur na/ rig kyi bu 'am/ 
64a7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo nges lnga 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nas/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi 'am
64a8(brgyad stong): ma yin pa 'dir 'ongs shing lpags par rtogs par bya'o// gzhan yang ko ru shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de tsha phyeng bar 'gyur/ gtsang sbra byed par
64b1(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ tsha pad pa dang / gtsang sbra byed pa nges/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte 'ape chen

65a7(brgyad stong): ngag mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
65a8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po mang po ngag 'di lngar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu gzung bar bya// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs sbyang bar ba zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
65b1(brgyad stong): 'di nyid dge ba byung ba mthong bar 'gyur// sa legs ga ge mo zhig na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge me zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
