93a7(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la byin te
93a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob cing rnal 'byor du byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la de ltar lpags par sgom pa 'phel zhing sgyeng po dang / 
93b1(brgyad stong): ba dang yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhes btang na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo nga bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
93b2(brgyad stong): ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyuraro// gzhan
93b3(brgyad stong): yang ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las par mi ldog par gyur pa
93b4(brgyad stong): la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du zis shing byas te/ byin zhing nye bar btang / ngan pa
93b5(brgyad stong): po rig 'bru bzang pos ster na/ ko'u shi ka 'di rdzi snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du
93b6(brgyad stong): skyeng ngam/ brgya bin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mdo// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de'i grangs gzung bar yA
93b7(brgyad stong): snga ba ma lags to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de bgrang bar yang / dper yang rgyur yang bgyi sla ba ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
93b8(brgyad stong): spel pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na med pa yang
94a1(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pa de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byin ning nye bar btang / gang
94a2(brgyad stong): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ing gdams shing bstan na/ de bas 'di ches bsod nams rang du skye 'o// ya ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad
94a3(brgyad stong): phyir mi ldeg par gyur pa lo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtang ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lnga zheg/ ke' shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa
94a4(brgyad stong): 'dzeg rjer rtse 'ams na/ sems can ji snyed me ba de ga thams cad bla na reng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub las par mi ldeg par 'gyur la
94a5(brgyad stong): ngag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu pa la la zhig gis/ sa rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa 'di glegs pas la hri sa nas/ byir zhing nye bar gtang la ngan bza
94a6(brgyad stong): po tshig 'bru bzang pos rab tu ston na/ ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur la/ shes rab kyi
94a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'ang nye bar gtang ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhig/ ko'u shi ka stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod ba de
94a8(brgyad stong): ngag thamos cad blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub laso phyir mi ldog par gyur la/ ngi si la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi lub la la zhig gis
94b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha lel du phyin pa 'di glegs pas la bris nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad la don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang pos rab tu stedan/ kro'u shi ka stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten
94b2(brgyad stong): gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad par mi ldog par gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod napas mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u
94b3(brgyad stong): shi ka steng gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
94b4(brgyad stong): gyur la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la dris shing nye bar gtang la den bzang po/ che
94b5(brgyad stong): 'bru bzang pos sten na/ ke'u shi ka steng gnyis pa bar mi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la/ shes rab kyi pha
94b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhig ke'u shi ka steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams da/ sems cad ji snyed yod
94b7(brgyad stong): pa de dgo thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las par ma ldeg par gyur la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol
94b8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/ byin zhing nye bor gtad la don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang pos rab tu ston na// ke'u shi ka steng gsum gyi sdang chen po'i
95a1(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtang ba'i bsed nams mngon pa
95a2(brgyad stong): 'du byed pa lta zhig gi/ ko'u shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi
95a3(brgyad stong): mi ldog par 'gyur la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi rmi la lo zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bris nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtang
95a4(brgyad stong): den bzang po tshig 'bru bzang pos rab tu ston na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu bo de de'i gzhi les bseng nabs mang du skyed da
95a5(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das bsod nangs de'i grangs kyang gzung bar sla ba
95a6(brgyad stong): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la bgrang bar yang / dper yang rgyur yang bgyi ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas
95a7(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mi gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma
95a8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dong po de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du dri sa te /  byin zhing nye bar gtang la don bzang po/ tshig 'phru
95b1(brgyad stong): bes rab tu ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'joms shing snod na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ches bsod nams mang du spyod // ke'u shig bya
95b2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan zhig byung ba de/ 'di skad bdag ni 'di dag thams cad pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
95b3(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ba'o zhes zer ba la/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis mngon par shes pa shin tu myur ba'i byang chub
95b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstan cing bstabs na// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de bas bso
95b5(brgyad stong): rnams mang du skye // de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
95b6(brgyad stong): ji lta ji lta bu'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lha de lta bur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bstan cing bstabs na/ 
95b7(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid la nye bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin nyid la nye bar gyur ni de dag gis gros dang bsod snyems dang / mal cha dang bro 'tshal ba'i gsas srang dang / 
95b8(brgyad stong): rnams songasu spyad na/ 'bras bu chen par bgyid sman yon chen por bgyid// de'i bsod nams shin tu bang du skyed// de ci'i slad ne na/ 'di ltar byang chub seMng
96a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de bla ra red pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa lags// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lnga'i dbang po brgya
96a2(brgyad stong): byin la 'di skad ces spras// ke'u shi ka khyod 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa can dmas la spro ba sbyin zhing phran 'dogs pa dang / ri mo gro byad pa leg so lag so// 
96a3(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka khyod kyis de ltar byas te 'phags pa nyan thos gang sems cad thams cad la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa nges/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
96a4(brgyad stong): rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub tu spro ba 'phel bar byed cing par 'dogs pa dang / rim gre ba pa de ltar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir / 
96a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa ya nga rig par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'di las skyes te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen
96a6(brgyad stong): rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sems 'dis bsrung du zinan/ byang chub sems dba'i sems dpa' chen po rnams/ blan meng yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
96a7(brgyad stong): yang mi slob pha rol tu byon pa drug la yang dri sleb par 'gyur// mi bslabs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya
96a8(brgyad stong): bar mi 'gyur zhig na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslob pa pha rol tu phyin pa dag la slob ste/ de'i
96b1(brgyad stong): phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// bsod dmas kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u ste lnga po'o// / de nas byang chub
96b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bams pas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'bor bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes
96b3(brgyad stong): yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos po gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod dmas bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims dang sgra
96b4(brgyad stong): pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod rnams
96b5(brgyad stong): bya ba'i dngos po 'di mchog ces pa'o// da pa zhes pa'o// gtso bo zhes pa'o// rab ces pa/ mche ga rab ces bya'o// gya rnam pa zhes byab// bla ma
96b6(brgyad stong): bya'o// bla na med pa zhes pa'o// gang na med pa zhes pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
96b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po bams pa lo 'di skad ces smras// byamos pa bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad das thams
96b8(brgyad stong): cadu nges 'jog rten gyi khams dpag tu meng po'i yang dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa'i yang grangs bong pa/ bsapa kyis ma khyab pa'i yang bsam gyis mi
97a1(brgyad stong): pa/ gzhal du med pa'i yang gzhal du med pa/ mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'das pa'i dus na/ dpag tu med
97a2(brgyad stong): ba'i yang dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang bsam gyis mi khab pa/ gzhal du med pa'i yang gzhal du med
97a3(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ lam mang ba/ 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang / srid par 'dren pa chad pa/ phung po ldan
97a4(brgyad stong): ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying su yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa/ de dag gi sems dang po bskyed baM nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
97a5(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa'o bar dang / phung po lha ga ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbang su yongasu ma ngan las 'das pa'i bar da
97a6(brgyad stong): dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar dang / de dag gis ba ra gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin gyi pu
97a7(brgyad stong): dang shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa
97a8(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa
97b1(brgyad stong): rang mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu byin pa dang ldan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / thams
97b2(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin
97b3(brgyad stong): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med dpag tu med pa gang yi na pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag pa
97b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba gang yin pa dang / chos tham sa cad la dbang phyug gi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa dpag tu med
97b5(brgyad stong): pa dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i mchog gang yin pa dang / stobs kyi na ngan de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdebs yang
97b6(brgyad stong): dag pa ji lta ba sgrib pa med cing ma chags pa ma thigs pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dpag tu med pa ci yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa
97b7(brgyad stong): dang / stobs dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mchog tu legs par rdzogs par khong du chud pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad
97b8(brgyad stong): don dam par mngon par bsgrub pas chos khong du chud pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma thogs pa dang / chos
98a1(brgyad stong): kyi rnga brdung ba dang / chos kyi dung 'bud pa dang // chos kyi rgyal mtshar sgreng ba dang / chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / chos kyi mchod sbyid sbyin pa dang / chos
98a2(brgyad stong): kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshims par mdzad pa dang / stobs dang ches bstan pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas dmas sam/ 1na
98a3(brgyad stong): zas kyi ches de dag la gang dag btul ba dang / bslabs pa dang / mos pa dang / nges par gyur pa dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas
98a4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod
98a5(brgyad stong): pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / gang zag rang sang sa rgyas kyi theg pa can rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lu
98a6(brgyad stong): bstan pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dngos po dang / tshul khris
98a7(brgyad stong): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ci yod pa dang / slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
98a8(brgyad stong): bci yang ba dang / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / so so'i skye bo gang dag gis chos de la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas
98b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ba rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bstad pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsed
98b2(brgyad stong): rnams ba ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnams dang / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos ston pa de dag la lha dang klu dang / 
98b3(brgyad stong): gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / dri za dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'pho chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag dang / dud 'gro'i skye gsu song ba'i sa
98b4(brgyad stong): can gang de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsku nga pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de da ga yengasu mya ngan las 'da' ba la gang gis dge ba'i
98b5(brgyad stong): ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongasu ma ngan las 'das pa la gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
98b6(brgyad stong): 'das la brten pa dang / ches la brten pa dang / dge 'dun la brten po dang / yid kyis bsgos pa'i gang zag la brten nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag thams
98b7(brgyad stong): cang lus pa red par gcig tu bsdus te/ bsdoms shing gzhal nas rje su yi rang ba'i mchog ngas pa/ gtso bo rab/ marbeg rab/ gya rnam pa/ bla ba bla meng ba
98b8(brgyad stong): gong na med pa'i rjes yi rang bas rjesu yi rang la/ rjesu yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
99a1(brgyad stong): tu yongasu bsngo'o zhes tshig 'di skad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu sdud par gyur cig ces zer ba de la/ gang zag byang chub sems
99a2(brgyad stong): theg pa can dag dngos po gang dag dang / rnam pa gang dag dang / dmigs pa gang dag gis rje su yi rang zhing sems de bskyed pa'i dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag
99a3(brgyad stong): dang rnam pa de dag ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin dung darigs sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnas brtan
99a4(brgyad stong): nga ldan pa rab 'phru la 'din cos smras/ nges par ga pa mam ze ba dag / papa ngag 'i lda ma par 'ong ba de 'an du
99a5(brgyad stong): so de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brten tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' se pas dpa' chen po bams pa la 'di skad ces smras// gal
99a6(brgyad stong): te dngos po yang med la/ dmigs pa med pa la dmigs par byed na/ ji ltar 'du shes pan ci log pa dang / sems pa ci log pa dang / lta ba pi ni ci log par
99a7(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags ni med pa'i dngos po yin te/ mi rtag pa la brdeg pa/ sdug bsngal po la bde ba/ bdag med pa la bdag mi sdu
99a8(brgyad stong): pa la sdug par rnam por brtags shing kun tu brtags nas/ 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba yin ci log pa 'byung // 'di
99b1(brgyad stong): dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems kyang de bzhin chos thams cad dang khams thams cad kyang de bzhin te// gal te dngos po
99b2(brgyad stong): lnga ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyang de bzhin sems kyang de bzhin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba'i sems de gang
99b3(brgyad stong): yon rjes yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams ba ba'i dngos pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo ba de gang yin/ de nas byang chub sems
99b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po bams pas tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
99b5(brgyad stong): dpa'i mdun du bshod par mi bya bstan par mi ba 'o// de ci'i bar zhe na/ de la gang dga' ba rtsam dang / dad pa tsam dang mas pa tsam dang / gus pa
99b6(brgyad stong): tsam yod pa de yang med par 'gyur du 'ong ngo // 'a pags pa rab 'bor par mi ldog pa'i bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du 'di ba shar ci
99b7(brgyad stong): bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nye bar bstan pa de yang zhum par mi 'gyur/ yi gsang bar
99b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ y-i gsad par mi byed/ ying phyir pogs par mi byed/ mi skrag mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
100a1(brgyad stong): / bos rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsed rnams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadu songasu bsngo bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad
100a2(brgyad stong): stong pa// bam po bdun pa/ de nas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bams pa la 'di skad ces smra so// byas
100a3(brgyad stong): pa sems gang gis rje su yi rang nas/ yongasu sngo bar byed pa'i sems de yang zad cing med par gyur te/ 'gags shing rnam par gyur// bla na med pa yang dag tu
100a4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i ngang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar 'gyur ba'i sems de gang yid rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yo
100a5(brgyad stong): su bsngos pa'i sems kyang gang yin/ 'di ltar sem sa gnyis kyang 'grogs pa med la/ sems kyi nga bzhin yang yongasu bsngo bar mi nus ni/ ji ltar
100a6(brgyad stong): sems kyis sems yongasu bsngo bar nus/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra sa// 'phags pa rab 'byor
100a7(brgyad stong): theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po de dag gis/ bstan pa 'di thos no skrag cing dbangs la dngang bar gyur na mi rung
100a8(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor ji byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nangs bya ba'i dngos po de/ bla na med pa yang dam
100b1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo bar bya// ji ltar rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongasu bzung na/ rje su yi ngang ba dang ldan pa'i sems
100b2(brgyad stong): yongasu gzung bar 'gyur/ de nas 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bams pa la brtsams shing byang chub sems dpa'
100b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po byams pa bzhir byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bams pa la spras po/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
100b4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa/ 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang sring bar 'dren pa chad pa/ mchi ma zad pa/ tsher ba rA
100b5(brgyad stong): pa/ khur shin tu bor ba// bdag gi don rjes ba ba/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad ba/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par gro
100b6(brgyad stong): ba sems thams cad kyi dbang dag pa'i pha rol tu son pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams grangs rang dpag tu med pa dag na/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang
100b7(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa yongasu su ngan las 'das pa de dag gi/ sems ring po bskyed pa ras nye bar bzung ste/ bla na med pa
100b8(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bde chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lpags pa med po'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yong
101a1(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / nges pa'i chos rung bar ma gyur pa'i bar du/ de'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pa
101a2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa
101a3(brgyad stong): ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsten pa de
101a4(brgyad stong): ngag gi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa ci yod pa dang / gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag/ rang bang chub tu
101a5(brgyad stong): lung bstan pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa da nga/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / 
101a6(brgyad stong): tshul khrims dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / slob pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / mi
101a7(brgyad stong): slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / tingange 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes
101a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po ci yod pa dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams
101b1(brgyad stong): pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos gang bshad pa dang / sa
101b2(brgyad stong): de la gang gis bslabs pa dang / lhag par mos pas/ gnas pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
101b3(brgyad stong): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte 'ape chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis chos de
101b4(brgyad stong): thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye ga nasu song ba'i sems can gang dag gis ches de thos la zos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / gang gis sa
101b5(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu ma ngan las 'das pa de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ de dag tharas cang gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing gzhal nas
101b6(brgyad stong): ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rje su yi rang la rjesu rang nas/ rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsed nams bya ba'i dngos po da/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
101b7(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ji ltar 'du shes pan ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba byin
101b8(brgyad stong): tsa log tu mi 'gyur/ de skad ces spros pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pi 'angs pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byer la 'di skad ces smraso// 'dzagro
102a1(brgyad stong): / pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched pos/ sems gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de la sems 'du shes par mi 'gyur na
102a2(brgyad stong): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
102a3(brgyad stong): yong su bsngos pa yino// nam sems de yang mi shes sems de 'di'o zhes bya bar yang mi shes na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du
102a4(brgyad stong): pin ci log par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lta ba phan ci log par mi 'gyuraro// de lho sems gang gi sems de yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de
102a5(brgyad stong): lo yang 'di ltar shes/ 'di ltar sem sa te sems de 'di'o// zhes sems 'du shes par gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan
102a6(brgyad stong): po'i 'du shes byin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyuraro// gal te byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po sems gang
102a7(brgyad stong): gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de yang 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar sems te/ sems bsams pa de yong de ltar zad pa yang zad par shes la// gang zad
102a8(brgyad stong): de yang yongasu bsngo bar mi nus// sems gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos
102b1(brgyad stong): nyid kyang de yin// chos gang dag la yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin zhes gal te de ltar yongasu bsngo na/ yang dag par yongasu bsngo ta log par
102b2(brgyad stong): yongasu mi bsngo'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsngo bar bya'o// gzhan yang 'phags pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
102b3(brgyad stong): bos pa ber pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa/ 'jug pa chad pa spro ba dang / srid par 'dren pa chad pa/ grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag sems dang po
102b4(brgyad stong): skyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang nga ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang brgya pa'i bar dang / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i ma ngan las 'das pa'i ngang
102b5(brgyad stong): su yongasu ma ngan las 'das pa'i bar da nga/ dam pa'i chos ma rlob pa'i bar dang / de dag gis bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi pha rol tu
102b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ngang chub sems dpa' gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chu
102b7(brgyad stong): tu lung bstan pa de dag gi pha rol tu zin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag rang sangs rgyas kyi 'a
102b8(brgyad stong): chub la lung ston pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang ba dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi thag pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos pa
103a1(brgyad stong): dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po tsa yod pa dang / slob pa'i
103a2(brgyad stong): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yid pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
103a3(brgyad stong): de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i
103a4(brgyad stong): phung po gang yin pa dang / phan par bya shed pa gang yin pa dang / khams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi smon
103a5(brgyad stong): dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas baHma ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / cho sa de la gang gis bslabs pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang
103a6(brgyad stong): gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
103a7(brgyad stong): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
103a8(brgyad stong): song ba'i sems can gang dag gis chos de thos la thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongasu ma ngan las
103b1(brgyad stong): rangs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rje su yi rang bar bya'o// 
103b2(brgyad stong): rjesu yi rang nas rjesu yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams ba ba'i dngos po da / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yengasu bsngos pa'i byang chub sems
103b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ji ltar 'du shes pan ci log tu mi 'gyur/ ji ltar sems pin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ ji ltar lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal
103b4(brgyad stong): de bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de la semasu 'du shes par mi 'gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems
103b5(brgyad stong): dpo' sems dpa' chen pos/ rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams pa ba'i dngos po bla na me da ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos
103b6(brgyad stong): pa yin no// nam sems de yang mi shes/ sems de 'di'o snyam du bya bar yang mi shes na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes phyin
103b7(brgyad stong): leg tu mi 'gyur/ sems bin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lte ba pi tsi log tu mi 'gyuraro// de ste sems gong gis sengasu bsngo ba'i sems de yang shes shing / sems
103b8(brgyad stong): de 'di'o zhes bya bar semasu 'du shes par gyur ni/ de ltar na byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes pan ci log pa dang / sems pad ci log
104a1(brgyad stong): pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyuraro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de yang de ltar shes
104a2(brgyad stong): shing 'di ltar sems te/ de ltar sems bsam pa de yang de lngar zad pa yang zad par shes la// gang zad pa de yang yongasu bsngo bar mi nus/ sems gang gis yongasu
104a3(brgyad stong): bsdus pa'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag la yongasu bsngo ba'i chos nyid kyang
104a4(brgyad stong): de yino// zhes gal te de ltar yongasu ba sde na// yang dag par yongasu bsngo snga/ log par yongasu mi bsngo'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
104a5(brgyad stong): pos yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// gzhan yang / 'phags pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen pos/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
104a6(brgyad stong): 'das lam chad pa 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chad pa dag/ grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes
104a7(brgyad stong): pa rnams sems dang po bskyed pa nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po'i lhag ma med
104a8(brgyad stong): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub pa'i bar dang / de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
104b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
104b2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa dag dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag rang sangs
104b3(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi byang chub la lung ston pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
104b4(brgyad stong): pe dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i ba sod nams bya ba'i dngos po ci yod pa dang / slob pa'i
104b5(brgyad stong): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas
104b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par brel pa
104b7(brgyad stong): phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying
104b8(brgyad stong): rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / chos de la
105a1(brgyad stong): // gang gis bslabs pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang gnas pa de dag gi dge ba ci yod pa dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
105a2(brgyad stong): lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lde 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis// chos ngo thos
105a3(brgyad stong): la thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang // dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba'i sems can gang dag gis ches de thos la thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / gang dag gis
105a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongasu ma ngan las 'anga' ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ bsdams shing
105a5(brgyad stong): gzhal nas pa lus par byas te/ ma lus pa lo rjes yi ra nga la rje su yi rang nas/ rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i ba sod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/ bla na
105a6(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ji ltar 'du shes pin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sangs byon
105a7(brgyad stong): ci log tu ma 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gol te byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po de sems gang giso yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de la sems
105a8(brgyad stong): 'du shes par mi 'gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/ bla na med pa yang
105b1(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngos pa yino// nam sems de la sems de 'dir snyam du bya bar yang mi shes na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'du shes pan ci log par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyuraro// gal te sems gang gis yongasu bsde ba'i sems
105b3(brgyad stong): de yang shes shing / sems de 'di'o zhes semasu 'du shes par gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes pan ci log pa dang / sems
105b4(brgyad stong): phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyur// ya nga gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i sems
105b5(brgyad stong): yong 'di ltar shes shing / 'di ltar sems te sems pa sems pa de yang de ltar zad pa yang zad par shes pa la gang zad pa de yang yongasu bsngo bar
105b6(brgyad stong): mi nus/ sems gang gis yongasu bsngos pa'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang gis yang su bsdu ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin// chos
105b7(brgyad stong): gang dag la yongasu bsngo ba'i ches de dag gi ches nyid kyang de yin zhes gal te de ltar yongasu bsten// yang dag par yongasu bsde ta log par yongasu mi bsngo'o//  lnga
105b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// gzhan yang 'phags pa rab 'bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'das
106a1(brgyad stong): // pa dang / mkhyen pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la pa/ 'jug pa chang pa/ spes pa dang srid par 'dren pa chad pa/ grangs med pa
106a2(brgyad stong): tu med pa dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'a
106a3(brgyad stong): rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar dang / phung po lhag mo med pa'i ma ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu ma ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba
106a4(brgyad stong): dang yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / nub par mo gyur pa'i bar dang / de dag gi bar gyi sangs
106a5(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba tsa yod pa dang / sangs rgyas baHma ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang ngag
106a6(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang nub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba co yod pa dang / gang zag rang sa
106a7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang bang chub laM lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi
106a8(brgyad stong): theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / slob pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang // zag pa med pa'i
106b1(brgyad stong): dge pa'i rtsa ba'i yong pa dang / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge
106b2(brgyad stong): gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dang / phan par bzhed pa
106b3(brgyad stong): yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
106b4(brgyad stong): ngab chos gang bshad pa dang / 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'chad pa dang / chos de la gang gis bslabs pa dang / slob par 'gyur pa dang / slob pa dang
106b5(brgyad stong): mos pa dang / mos par 'gyur ba dang / mos par byed ba dang / gnas pa dang / gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gnas par byed pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci sngo
106b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / ches de la so so'i skye bo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba dang / skyed pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
106b7(brgyad stong): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis ches de zos pa dang / thos par 'gyur ba dang / nyan pa dang
106b8(brgyad stong): nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrud pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba dang / sreng pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gan su skyes pa'i sems cad gang ngag gis dam pa'i chos de thos pa da
107a1(brgyad stong): thos par 'gyur ba dang / nyan pa dang thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / skyeng bar 'gyur ba dang / skyeng ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa ngag
107a2(brgyad stong): su mya ngan las 'das pa la gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sbyang bar 'gyur ba dang / skyed par ngag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te/ gzhalan
107a3(brgyad stong): ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rje su yi rang ba'i mchog dam pa/ gtso bo rab mchog/ gya nom po bla ma/ bla na med pa gong na med pa'i rje su yi rang bas/ rdza su yi rang
107a4(brgyad stong): la rje su yi rong nas/ rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nam sa ba ba'i dngos po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o zhes tshig
107a5(brgyad stong): 'di skad bur med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang so sdud par gyur cig ces zer na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes
107a6(brgyad stong): phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems pin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lnga ba pa de ci log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te 'od yongasu bsngo 'ang 'di sAm du ches de dag ni/ zad cing
107a7(brgyad stong): to/ med par gyur pa/ rnam par gyur pa ste/ chos de ni mi zad pa'i snyam du sems shing / de la yongasu bsngo na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu
107a8(brgyad stong): bsngos pa yin no// yang gal te 'di ltar chos ni chos la yongasu bsngo'o snyam du nye bar mi rtog na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa
107b1(brgyad stong): yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar yongasasu bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu
107b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ lta ba pin ci log tu mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i pir zhe na/ de ltar yongasu bsngo ba de la yang mngon par mi chag so// gal te 'di ltar shes te sems kyang sem su mi shes
107b3(brgyad stong): kyang cho su mi shes te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sde ba bla na med
107b4(brgyad stong): pa'o ngag yo te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ma na po bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de shes ra/ bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
107b5(brgyad stong): tu yongasu bsngos pa ma yido// de ci'i pir zhe na/ da ltar bsngo ba de la mngon par chags pa'i phyir ro// gal te ya nga nge la 'di snyam du bsod nams mengon
107b6(brgyad stong): par 'du byed pa de yang dben pa zhi ba'o// rje su yaM rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de yang dben pa zhi ba'o snyam du sems pa dang / gal te
107b7(brgyad stong): 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni dben pa'i ba'o// snyam du shes na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa'o// sangs rgyas
107b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'angs yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa bo gang yon pa de yang / bsde bci 'dra ba bzhin du dag pa'i rtsa ba'i yong de 'dra ste/ gang
108a1(brgyad stong): / yongasu bsngo ba de yang de'i rigs can de'i rigs can de'i mtshan nyid can/ de'i rig su gtogs pa de'i rang bzhin can no// gal te de ltar shes na bla na med ba
108a2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngos pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshar ma'i tshul gyis yongasu bsngo ba gnang bar mi
108a3(brgyad stong): mdzad // gang 'das pa de ni zad po med par gyur pa/ 'gags pa rna po par gyur pa'o// gang ma 'ongs pa de yang ma phyin pa'o// da ltar byung ba de yang gnas pa/ mi dmin
108a4(brgyad stong): te/ chos gang mi dmigs pa de ni mtshan ma ma yin yul yang ma yid// gal te de ltar mtshan mar 'dzin cing sa mas na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
108a5(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa ma yino// de ste dran pa dang bral bas mtshan mar mi 'dzin na// mi sems pa dang / dran pa dang bral ba 'am/ khong du ma chud pa
108a6(brgyad stong): yi la mi byeng de/ de ltar na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa ma yi'o// de ste mtshan ma de li mi sems shing / mtshan mar
108a7(brgyad stong): mi 'dzin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dag ba'i rtsa ba bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yin// de
108a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di la bslab par bya'o// thabs mkhas pa gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo bar byang chub sems dpa' sem
108b1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos/ thabs mkhas pa de las rig par bya ste/ thabs mkhas pa de la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi
108b2(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid rgyun mi 'chang pa sam glu zung bar bya/ btsong bar bya/ klag par bya// kun chub par bya// rab tu gdon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ 'khor duH/ yongasu bri bar bya'o// 
108b3(brgyad stong): de ci'i pir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par thos pa dang mi ldan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa 'di yongasu bsngo bar bya ba la 'jug mi nuso// de
108b4(brgyad stong): la gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma brten kyang // bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/ bla na bong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngor rung
108b5(brgyad stong): zhes zer na/ gal te de skad ma zer tsog ces pa bar 'gyur re// de ci'i pir zhe na/ lus de dag kyang 'gags/ 'du byed de dag kyang 'gegs shing ni
108b6(brgyad stong): ba dben pa dmigs pa dang bral ba yin na/ gang zag de ni mtshan mar bas to// yang dag pa ji lta bar rnam par brtags nas/ yang dag pa ji lta bar 'du shes pa
108b7(brgyad stong): dmigs pa dag/ mi dmigs pa la yang yongasu bsngo bar 'dong de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ji lta bur yongasu bsngos pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
108b8(brgyad stong): pa'i bang chub tu bsder gnang bar mi mdzad de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa gang yin pa la yang / mtshan mar byed cing rnam par rna
109a1(brgyad stong): pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la yang rnam pa dag gis dmigs ra/ de nyid de'i dmigs pa chen po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
109a2(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis yongasu bsngo ba don chen po bang pa'o zhes mi gsung ngo // de ci'i pir zhe na/ yongasu bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa/ zung
109a3(brgyad stong): rngu dang bcas pa ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ kha zas bzang po dug can zhig yod la kha dog dang / ro dang dri la sred par gyur po zhig yin na/ dug yod pa yin pas na mkhas pa rnam
109a4(brgyad stong): kyis yongasu spang bar bya ste/ yangasu longs spyad par bya ba ma yin no// skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can de de yongasu long sa spyad par sams te/ nges zas de zas na
109a5(brgyad stong): kha dog dang / dri dang ro yang myangs na/ zhu ba'i tsho de la ldog pa sbal ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ de de'i gzhi las shi ba 'am/ shi ba tsam gyi sdug bsngal du
109a6(brgyad stong): gyur pa de bzhin du// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la kha cig log par zin cing / log par rig pa dang / log par kha ton byas pas legs par spras pa'i don ma shes shing
109a7(brgyad stong): don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du mi chud pa dag/ 'di ltar 'doms shing 'di ltar ston te/ rigs kyi bu khed tshur sheg/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi
109a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba
109b1(brgyad stong): ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang // de dag gi nyan thos gang dag gis/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / 
109b2(brgyad stong): skyed par 'gyur ba dang / skyed pa rnams dang dam pa'i chos ma nub kyi bar du de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na
109b3(brgyad stong): meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom
109b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gong dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung so/ 
109b5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba dang / lung sngon pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba da nga/ lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i
109b6(brgyad stong): rtsa ba ci bskyed pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba dang / skyed pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / 
109b7(brgyad stong): ma khyen pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms
109b8(brgyad stong): gzhol nas/ rje su yi ring zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos na// de ltar yongasu bsngo ba yang mtshan mo'i tshul gyis yongasu
110a1(brgyad stong): bsngo bas yang dag par mi 'gyur te/ 'di lnga ste dper na kha zas dug dang bcas pa de bzhin du dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la yongasu bsngo ba mdo// de ci'i
110a2(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ dmigs pa ni dug dang bcas pa'o// de bas na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyis de ltar mi bslab kyi// nges 'dri lngar bslab par bya ste/ 'das
110a3(brgyad stong): po dang / mabyon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyam bcom ldan 'ongs rnams kyis ji ltar dag pa'i rtsa ba yong su gzung bar bya ba dang / ji slang meng su bzung na legs
110a4(brgyad stong): par yongasu bzung bar 'gyur zhing / ji ltar yongasu ba sngo bar bya ba dang / da ltar yongasu bsngos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs pa
110a5(brgyad stong): yongasu bsngos par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu me/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba mi
110a6(brgyad stong): gdab par 'dod pas 'di ltar yongasu bsngo bar bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye
110a7(brgyad stong): dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis ji ltar mkhyen po dang / gzugs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba dang / rigs gang yin pa dang / rigs gar gtogs pa dang / 
110a8(brgyad stong): ci 'dra ba dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang // mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du rje su yaM rang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang ji ltar de bzhin
110b1(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis ji ltar gnang ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
110b2(brgyad stong): yengasu bsngo'o snyam na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu bsngo na/ nyes pa med cing yang dag par yongasu bsngos pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
110b3(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la skur pa mi 'deb so// de ltar na de'i yongasu bsngo ba ni dag med pa'i yongasu bsngo ba yi // yongasu bsngo ba chen po
110b4(brgyad stong): yi/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yongasu bsngo ba yongasu rdzogs pa shin tu yongasu rdzogs pa yin// yongasu bsngo ba na lde ga pa'i bsam pas mes par byed pa'o// gzhan
110b5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa' theg pa can gyis 'di ltar tshul khrims gang yin/ pa dang / ting 'dzin gang yin pa dang / shes
110b6(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa dang ji ltar 'dod pa'i khamasu mi gtogs/ gzugs kyi
110b7(brgyad stong): khang su mi gtogs/ gzugs med pa'i khams mi gtogs 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de ltar yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// de ci'i phyi
110b8(brgyad stong): zhe na/ khams gsum du mi gtogs pa'i pi ro// de bzhin du yongasu bsngo ba yang ma gtogs pa'o// ches gang la yongasu bsdu ba nga yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de yang
111a1(brgyad stong): gtogs pa'o// gal te de ltar mos shing de ltar yongasu bsngo na/ de ltar yongasu bsngo ba'i bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yengasu bsde ba ni
111a2(brgyad stong): ma zos pa yin te/ ma gtogs pa yongasu bsngo ba chen po/ yongasu bsngo ba dug med pa la chos kyi dbyings kyi yongasu bsngo ba yongasu rdzogs pa legs par yongasu rdzogs pa
111a3(brgyad stong): yin// de ltar yong su bsngo ba de la mngon par chags shing mtshan mar 'dzin na log par yongasu bsngo ba yin// de la gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
111a4(brgyad stong): yongasu bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni// chos nyid kyi yongasu bsngo ba 'dis/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhan pa ro ltar yongasu bsngos na/ bla na med pa yang
111a5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yod su bsngos pa yino// 'di ni yang dag par yongasu bste bo yid gyis de ltar bdag gis yongasu bsngo'o sna
111a6(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yino// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bos te bka'
111a7(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyed sten pa'i bya ba byed pa rab 'byer leg so leg so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos sder
111a8(brgyad stong): phyir te/ rab 'byor yongasu bsngo bo gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o chos kyi dbyings kyis yongasu bsngo ba ste/ chos nyid 'di la sangs rgyas
111b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar gzigs pa dang / mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de rigs gang yin pa dang / rigs gar gtogs pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang rang bzhin gang yin
111b2(brgyad stong): pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / ches nyid gang gis yeng ba de bzhin du bdag kyang yongasu bsngo bo snyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa
111b3(brgyad stong): 'jig rngan gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snang dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gos/ dge ba
111b4(brgyad stong): las kyi lam la yang dag par bcud cing bkong ba 'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed yod pas de bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongasu bsdu
111b5(brgyad stong): ba 'di nyid mchog ces pa'o// dam pa zhes pa'o// rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya 2// bla na mang pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// 
111b6(brgyad stong): 'bor stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi be ma snyed dag ni sems can ji stod yod pa de dag thams cad dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam la ba
111b7(brgyad stong): po'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lha zhog/ rab 'bor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snad na// sems can ji snyed pa de
111b8(brgyad stong): ngag thams cad bsam gtan ba'i thob par gyur la/ de dog gi bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci yod pas// rab 'byor sems can de dag la yongasu bsngos pa dang ldan
112a1(brgyad stong): / pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni mchog ces pa'o// gtso bo zhes pa'o// dam pa zhes pa'o// rab ces pa'o// mchog rab
112a2(brgyad stong): ces bya'o// gya nor pa zhes pa'o// bla ma zhes pa'o// bla na med pa zhes pa'o// gang na med pa zhes pa'o// rab 'ber steng gsum gyi sdeng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
112a3(brgyad stong): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji skad yod pa de dag thams cad bsam gtan pa'i sgrub pa las byung ba'i bsod rams mngon par 'du byed ba lnga 'og/ rab 'byor sdong bcu
112a4(brgyad stong): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ba snyeng dag na/ sems car ji snyed yang ba de dag thams cad chang meng pa bzhi thob par gyur kyang rab
112a5(brgyad stong): 'byor stong gsum gyi sdang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha mos gang gi klung gi be ma snyed kyi sems can tham sa cang rang med pa bzhi thob pa'i bsod nams mngo
112a6(brgyad stong): par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ra/ sems can ji snyed yed pa de dab tha
112a7(brgyad stong): cad gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
112a8(brgyad stong): sems can thams cad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob po'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byes zhag/ rab 'byer steng gsum gi sdeng chen po
112b1(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyeng dag ni/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur kyang / rab 'ber steng gsum gyi steng chen
112b2(brgyad stong): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can ji snyed yeng ba de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lnga
112b3(brgyad stong): gas rab 'ber stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed dag na// sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur
112b4(brgyad stong): kyang / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi ngo ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon pa
112b5(brgyad stong): rang byed po lnga 'og gi/ rab 'bor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi ba pa snying dag na/ sems can ji snyed yeng ba de
112b6(brgyad stong): ngag thams cad lan cig par 'ong por gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad
112b7(brgyad stong): lan cig par 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i bsad nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi du ma
112b8(brgyad stong): steng dag no// sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur kyang / rab 'bar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi
113a1(brgyad stong): snyed kyi/ sems cad thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhig/ rab 'ber steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
113a2(brgyad stong): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom par gyur kyang / rab 'bor stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig na/ 
113a3(brgyad stong): gyi khams gang ga'i gling gi byom snad kyi/ sems can ji snyed yang pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa'i bsed dpos mngon par 'du byed pa lnga zhog/ ra
113a4(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyasu gyur kyang / 
113a5(brgyad stong): rab 'ber stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi ba ma snyed kyi sems can tham sa cad/ rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa'i bas
113a6(brgyad stong): nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rjen gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// sems can ji snyed yod
113a7(brgyad stong): pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs la// de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang
113a8(brgyad stong): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' re ras gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / 
113b1(brgyad stong): ba'i gsos sman dang / ye byang dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror bas te/ de
113b2(brgyad stong): yang dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis byin la/ rnam grangs de lta bur de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' re res bskal pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byed
113b3(brgyad stong): cing gos dang ral che dang na ba'i gsos spang dang / yo bang dang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis bkur stir bad/ bla mar byed
113b4(brgyad stong): ri por byang / mched par byed/ rjed par byed// gsol bar byed// de bzhin du re res kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la rnam grangs de lta bur sbyin pa
113b5(brgyad stong): bin na/ rab 'ber 'di dzaM snyam du semasau/ ci bang chub se mas dpa' de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ rab 'bar gyis gsal ba/ bcom
113b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchi so// bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams ni grang
113b7(brgyad stong): bzung bar sla ba pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams de la grangasu yang dper yang rgyur yang bgyi sla ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das ji ste bsod nams mngon pa
113b8(brgyad stong): 'du bgying ba de gzugs can zhig lags na ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams pang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang mi shong bar 'gyuraro// 
114a1(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas bcad de dang ldan pa rab 'bar la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'bar de ba'in// de de bzhin / 
114a2(brgyad stong): 'byer gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba gang / chos kyi dbyings kyis yongasu bsde ba 'dis yongasu bsngo ba
114a3(brgyad stong): na de'i bsod nams mang du skyed de/ rab 'byor ches kyi dbyings kyi yongasu bsngo ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams 'di lo ri dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi sbyin pa las byung
114a4(brgyad stong): ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga maso brgya'i char yong nye bang mi 'gro'o// snying gi tshor yang / brgya steng gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye bo brgya'i cha
114a5(brgyad stong): bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya stong gi char yang / be ba khrag khrig brgya steng gi char yang nye bar mi 'a go/ grangasu yang bgrang bar yang / dper yang rgyur
114a6(brgyad stong): yong mi bzod de// de ci'i phar zhe na/ 'di ltar snga ma do gas pa'i 'du shes can gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa zin pa ni yongasu chad pa yin no// de nas
114a7(brgyad stong): rgyal chen bzhi'i ldi'i bu stong phrag nyi shu rnams thal mo sbyar de phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
114a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yong su bzung ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
114b1(brgyad stong): chen po'i yengasu sngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ni 'di ltar dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du
114b2(brgyad stong): byed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnan pa lagaso// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu brgya phrag stong gis lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa
114b3(brgyad stong): pa ma rnams kyi char dang / lha'i rin po che'i char dang / lha'i na bza'i char gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor nas lnga'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan ngag gi
114b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir bas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor bas/ mched par byas/ rjed par byas/ gse la bar ngas lnga'i sil sAr rnams rab tu bkrol nas/ 
114b5(brgyad stong): tshig 'di skad ces gsol te// kye ma bcom ldan 'das dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yangasu bsdu ba 'di ni bsngo ba che de lag
114b6(brgyad stong): 'di ltar dmigs pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de snyed zil gyis pa dad pa lags te/ 'di lta
114b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu pir ba thabs sekhas pas yengasu bzung ba'i slang du 'di ni bsde ba chen po lags// de bzhin du lnga'i bu gzhan dag kyang lpags ras/ bcom ldan
114b8(brgyad stong): 'das la bkur bstir bo ba dam pa dang / bla ma rung ba dam pa dang / ri mer ba ba dam pa dang / mchod par bya ba dam pa dang / rjed par bab dam pa dang / gsol lnga
115a1(brgyad stong): dam pa rnams kyis bkur bstir byas rnga mar bas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ rjed par byas// gsol bar byas nas/ de sa du sgra 'byin cing // 
115a2(brgyad stong): de skad du dbyangs rje su sgeg/ de bzhin du 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang bang dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'kho
115a3(brgyad stong): dang tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang tshang med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / ngage chung dang / tshad med dag dang / dag rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 
115a4(brgyad stong): 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mche ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nas sdang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dag
115a5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang sems dpa' sems dpa'
115a6(brgyad stong): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigaso ba'i 'du shes can gyi yun ring
115a7(brgyad stong): bor de tsam gyi bsags pa dang / da ltar rgya cher yang dag par bsdus pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa yang zil gyis gnon pa ngo mtshar to// de nas
115a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang mi'i ris kyi lha'i bu la sogs te/ lho'i bu de dag thams cad la bka' stsol pa/ lha'i bu dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i dzi/ 
115b1(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed dag gi/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs la/ bla na med pa yang dag
115b2(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i bang chub tu zhugs nas sbyin pa ban pa lta zhog/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod
115b3(brgyad stong): pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par gyur la byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
115b4(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams gzhan gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed kyis mas can thams cad la gos dang / zas dang mel cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang 'a ba
115b5(brgyad stong): sbyar ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis bang chub sems dpa' re res kya nga/ bskal pa gang gi'i klung gi be ma snyed du 'dug ste/ 
115b6(brgyad stong): sbyin pa bin la de dag dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis sbyin pa dang / rnam grongs de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bskal ba gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
115b7(brgyad stong): snyang du 'dug ste// sems can de dag thams cad la gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na nga'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang bde ba la sbyar ba thams
115b8(brgyad stong): cang dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis rim gror byed cing / sbyin pa de yang dmigs pa'i 'du shes cir gyis byin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
116a1(brgyad stong): dbar chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu zin pa zhig gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
116a2(brgyad stong): kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung pa
116a3(brgyad stong): dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can de dag gi bar dang // de la sems can gzhan dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba dang / skyed par byeng pa de dag
116a4(brgyad stong): thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te/ gzhal nas ma lus bar byas te/ ma lus pa la rjesu yi rang nas rje su yi rang ba'i mchog/ dam pa gtso bo rig mchog

116a6(brgyad stong): khyab pa'i rjesu yi rang nas// rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sdud par gyur cig
116a7(brgyad stong): chos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngon/ rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'ong lo/ byang chub sems dpa' ri

116b2(brgyad stong): yang rgyur yang mi bzed // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dag spyod pa sbyin par byed pa'i phyir// // shes rab kyi pha rol

119a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la// byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can ngag gi tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod

119b3(brgyad stong): thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas bskal ba gang ga'i

120a2(brgyad stong): dpa' so so nas kyang / bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug cing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rden gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thas

120b1(brgyad stong): lus pa la rje su yi rang ba'i mchog dam pa/ gtse bo rab mchog rang / gya nom pa/ bla ma bla na med pa/ gong na med pa/ gong ma'i yang ga ma/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang
