126a1(brgyad stong): byas pa pa yod/ rang sangs rgyas nyid yong su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas nyid yong su gsal bar byas pa ma yin// gnas banan rab 'byer gyis
126a2(brgyad stong): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor 'dzi
126a3(brgyad stong): skam du sems// rnam grangs gang gis 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di po rol tu phyin pa chen po yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol paM/ bcom ldan 'das
126a4(brgyad stong): gzugs chen zar pa bgyid / rlung ngudu pa \u0f7fda/ gzugs snang bar mi bgyid / g.yengs par mi bgying // de bzhin du tshor ba lam lags/ 'du shes las
126a5(brgyad stong): lags/ 'du byed rnams la logs te/ btsam ldan 'das rnam par shes pa chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid / rnam par shes pa sdud par mi
126a6(brgyad stong): bgyid/ g.yengs par mi bgyid// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang lags pa de dag kyang // stobs dang ldan par yang mi bgyid
126a7(brgyad stong): stobs ma mchis par yang mi bgyid// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ sdud par mi 'gyid g.yengs par mi bgyid// 
126a8(brgyad stong): sla zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma sdus ma g.yengs pa lagaso// gal te de ltar yang 'tshal bar bgyid na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
126b1(brgyad stong): pa ma lags// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can 'di dag yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o snyam pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ma lags te/ 'di nyid de'i dmigs pa
126b2(brgyad stong): chen por 'gyuraro// de ci'i sra zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/ sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pas na/ 
126b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can dben pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par rig par 'gyi'o// sems cad
126b4(brgyad stong): bsam gyis mi khyab pasau ra/ shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o// sems can mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid lags pas na
126b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du rig par bgyi'o// sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
126b6(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can don ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ngon/ 
126b7(brgyad stong): ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can stobs yang dag par bsgrubs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yang dag par
126b8(brgyad stong): bsgrubs par rig bar bgyi sde/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs de lnga bur 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lag so// de nas
127a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang / shes rab kyi pha
127a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos shing / nem nur mi bgyid/ the tsom mi 'tshal/ rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes
127a3(brgyad stong): par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang / chos nyid dang // den gyi tshul dang / chos kyi tshul bzhin du 'tshal bar bgyid cing / 
127a4(brgyad stong): rjesu rtogs par bgying pa'i byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po de yun ji srid cig tu spyad par ra ga par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
127a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sangs rgyas
127a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing yengasu dris nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams ngag nas// shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
127a7(brgyad stong): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing yongasu dris nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kan+da
127a8(brgyad stong): ngag nas 'dir skyes pa des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan te thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snyan par 'du shes skye // bdag ston pa mngon sum
127b1(brgyad stong): du gyur te bdag gis ston pa mngon sum du mthong ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa la rna ba blags te gus par nyan to// gtam gyi bar
127b2(brgyad stong): ma ma bde/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring por spyad pa de lta bur rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni
127b3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes
127b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa 'am/ rdegs pa 'am/ bsam pa 'am/ bskyed par nus sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'o zhe'am/ shes rab kyi pha
127b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'i 'di na'o zhes 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa de gang na zhes rnam pa dang rtags dang / mtshan ma gang gis kyang bstan par nus sam/ bcom
127b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta ma yin// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phung po 'am/ khams sam skye mche du bstan cing / nye bar gzung bar
127b7(brgyad stong): mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'ber chos thams cad dben pa dang shin tu dben po'i phyir shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yang bstan pa 'am/ nye bar bzung ba 'am
127b8(brgyad stong): rtogs par mi nus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po dang // khams dang skye mched las gzhan na yang med par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
128a1(brgyad stong): 'byor phung po dang / khams dang skye mched nying sbeng pa dben pa ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang skye mched 'di ni gnyis
128a2(brgyad stong): mdzo stong zhing dben pa dang ni ba'i phyir dmig su med/ chos thams cad kyi mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// nam 'du shes dang / 
128a3(brgyad stong): kun shes pa dang / btags pa dang tha snyad mi 'byung ba de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gnas brdan rab 'byor gyis gsolo pa/ bcom ldan 'das bya
128a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di la rnal 'byor du ba bying ba de yun ji srid cig sprad par rig par bgyi/ bcom
128a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ dbang po'i rim pa yod pas 'di ni rnam par phye ste lung bstan
128a6(brgyad stong): par bya ba yin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs gong gos byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po ngag mthong nas/ de dag rga
128a7(brgyad stong): drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyod kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma dang ma mes par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs kyang yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yang sangs rgyas
128a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa dang / bshad pa la ma gus pas nyan mo 'dod de// nyan mi 'dod pas
128b1(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur mi byed // bsnyen bkur mi bdade pas yongasu mi 'dri'o// yongasu mi 'dri bas ma dad do// ma dad pas 'khor de nas 'bol te/ de dag do pir ches kyis phongs par 'gyur
128b2(brgyad stong): bi'i las bsags shing kun nas bsags te/ nye bar bsdus pas nga ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad cing ston pa dang / nye bar stong pa lnga 'a
128b3(brgyad stong): zhing ma gus ma dang bas mos par mi byed/ lus dang sems kyis kyang 'thun par mi byed/ 'thun par mi byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi shes mi rig 'a
128b4(brgyad stong): du mi chud de// de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma dang bar 'gyur ro// ma dad pas mi nyan te mau nyan pas mi shes// mi shes pas mi mthong mi mthong bas khong
128b5(brgyad stong): du mi rung // khong du ma chud pas chos kyis pa nges par 'gyur ba'i las sogs shing nye bar snga de/ de dag chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las de
128b6(brgyad stong): bsags shing nye bar bsdus pas shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyu ro// de dag shes rab 'chal ba'i las mngon par 'dus
128b7(brgyad stong): byas shing bsags pa dang / kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsdus pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston
128b8(brgyad stong): lo spong shing dbang za bar 'gyur te/ dbang bzas nas 'byol bar 'gyuraro// rab 'ber yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spong zhing dbang bzas te/ 
129a1(brgyad stong): snyan par brjed pas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs par 'gyur/ dbang bcwa
129a2(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur/ de dag gi rgyud ma rung bar byas shing bsregs nas gzhan blo chung ba/ shes rab chung ba bsod nams chung ba/ dge ba'i
129a3(brgyad stong): rtsa ba chung ba/ dad pa tsam dang ldan pa/ dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa// moso pa tsam dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa tsam dang ldan pa'i las dang po ba'i skal pa med pa rnams kyi
129a4(brgyad stong): dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang / 'dod pa tsam yang phyir zlog cing 'bral bar bye nga bzlog par byede/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig
129a5(brgyad stong): mA yin gyis bslab par mi bya'o zhes zer ro// de dag ra ngagi rgyud kyang ma rung bar byas shing bral bar ba sa te/ pha rol gyi rgyud kyang ma rung bar byas
129a6(brgyad stong): shing bral bar byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skur pa btab na/ thams cad
129a7(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid lo skur pa btab par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur pa btab na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom lda
129a8(brgyad stong): 'das rnams la skur pa btab par 'gyuraro// de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las 'byol bar 'gyur/ chos las yongasu 'phang bar 'gyur/ dge
129b1(brgyad stong): 'dun las yengasu pi rol du 'gyur// de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba rgyun gcod par byed pas sems can dpral ba chen po rnamasu rnam par smin par
129b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i las nye bar sogs// de dag de lta bu'i chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba shes rab 'chal por 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa nye bar gnas pas
129b3(brgyad stong): le brgya phrag mang po/ la sdang phrag rang g.yo brgya stong phrag mang ba ba khrag khrig steng phrag mang per sems can dmal ba chen po rnamasu btso zhing / de dag sems can dmal ba
129b4(brgyad stong): chen po nas sems cad dpal ba chen par 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag de lta bur yun ring por sems can dromal ba chen po nas sems can dpal ba chen por 'pho ban
129b5(brgyad stong): me'i sdud pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur// me'i sdud ba 'i bskal pa byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa
129b6(brgyad stong): de dag tu 'dir te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu skye bar 'gyur// de dag bor te sems cad dmyal ba chen po de dag tu den yang sems can dmyal
129b7(brgyad stong): chen po nas/ sems can dmal ba chen por 'pho bar 'gyuraro// nga dag de lta bur yun ring bar sems can dmal ba chen por 'pho ba na yang / me'i sdud pa'i bskal
129b8(brgyad stong): pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dog de nas shi 'apes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khang sa gzhan dag na sems can daral ba chen po yod pa der 'derate/ sems cad
130a1(brgyad stong): pa chen po de dag tu skye bar 'gyur// de dag der yang de bzhin du sems can dpal chen po nas/ sems can dmal ba chen por 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de dag der yang
130a2(brgyad stong): yun ring por sems can dumal ba chen po nas/ sems can dpal ba chen por 'pho ba ni der yang de bzhin du me'i sdang po'i bskal ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag mo'i sdud pa
130a3(brgyad stong): bskal pa byung ba dang / yang de shi 'phos te las de nyid ma zad cing lhag ma lus pas/ yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'dor te bor nas kyang / sems can dmyal ba
130a4(brgyad stong): chen po dam su skye bar 'gyur te/ yang de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnamasu sems can daral ba'i sdug pa sAl chen po meng bar 'gyuraro// nam me'i bskal
130a5(brgyad stong): pa 'thung bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de dag de lta bu'i sdug bsngal mang po tshor bar 'gyur ba'i las myong bar 'argyu rnam nga se tshig gi nyes pa smras pa'i
130a6(brgyad stong): phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa ldi'i las bgyis pa yang
130a7(brgyad stong): yid kyis nongs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nongs par spyad pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan du yang spyad pa 'dra ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa

130b1(brgyad stong): yang spyad pa 'dra ba ma yin// las de bsags shing kun nas bsags te/ nye bar bsdus pa'i tshul 'dra btsam yang ma yin// gang su dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
130b2(brgyad stong): bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa na phyir gzhil bar sems shing spong bar 'gyur/ mi snyan par zer bar 'gyur te/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes tshig
130b3(brgyad stong): tu sba bar 'gyur/ da ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ma yino nas tshig smra re// smra bar 'gyuraro// de dang sems can gzhan dag kyang 'bral bar byed/ de bdag gi
130b4(brgyad stong): rgyang ma rung bar byas nas/ gzhan gyi rgyud kyang ma rung bar bye // bdag rang gi rgyad dug can da byas nas gzhan gyi rgyud kyang dug can du byed par 'gyur ro// bdag
130b5(brgyad stong): nyid kyang phung nas gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me mi shes/ mi rtogs la gzhan dag kyang
130b6(brgyad stong): 'di la bslab par mi bya bar 'dzin du 'jug pa'i gang zag de lta bu ni/ shA ri'i bu lngar yang ngas mi gnang na de dag dang 'grogs pa lha ci smos/ rnyed pa dang bkur bsti
130b7(brgyad stong): bya ba lta ci sres/ gnas pa lnga ci sdes/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i gang zag de dag ni ches la sun 'byin par reg byar ba'o// shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta
130b8(brgyad stong): dog ni shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa yin no// shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag ni nag po'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag las
131a1(brgyad stong): gang dag sa nyan pa dang / dad par bya bar sems pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul ma yin par brlag par 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu gang zag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
131a2(brgyad stong): la sun 'ben pa de dag ni shA ri'i bu chos la sun 'byin pa'i gang zag du rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag der skyes shing / sen
131a3(brgyad stong): dumyal ba ni mchis pa'i lus de'i tshad ma bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang zag der skyes pa'i lus de'i chang zhog shig/ de ci'i phyi
131a4(brgyad stong): zhe na/ gang zag de lta bu'i lus kyi tshad thos na khrag don mo kha nas skyug cing 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi ba tsam gyi sdug bsngal mi zad pa dang nad kyis reg
131a5(brgyad stong): cing tshig gam/ ma ngan gyi zug rngu zhugs sam/ g.yang sa chen por lhung ngam skam pas rnyis par gyur na mi rung // gang la nges pa de dag yod pa'i lus
131a6(brgyad stong): de'i tshad 'jigs po chen po'i bar du thos na bcom ldan 'das kyis lus de'i tshad 'di tsam du 'gyuro zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la go skabs ma phye'o// lan
131a7(brgyad stong): lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das la shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad kyis phyi mi'i skye bo mang po la snang bar bgyis por 'gyur gyis
131a8(brgyad stong): ngag dang yid kyis las bsags shing kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa 'dis sems can dmal ba'i lus 'di lta bu chen po yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur
131b1(brgyad stong): zhes bcom ldan 'dan 'das kyis bsha du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa ni
131b2(brgyad stong): bsags pa dang kun tu bsags pa dang / nye bar bsags pas yun ring po 'di tsam du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyuraro zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po la
131b3(brgyad stong): snang bar byas par 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu sdug bsngal de nyid dpag tu med pa dang / sdug bsngal mang po gang yin pa de nyid kyis/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag / 
131b4(brgyad stong): ba'i skal ba can rnams skyo bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
131b5(brgyad stong): rigs kyis bu mes lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las shin tu bsdams bar 'gyi'o// de ci'i sladu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de lnga
131b6(brgyad stong): ngag gis nongs par spras pa/ de lta bus bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po chen po skyeso// bcom ldan 'das gang gis bsod nems pa lags pa'i phung po
131b7(brgyad stong): skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'bor dag gis nyes par smras pas/ bsod nangs ma yin pa'i phung po de skyeso// rab 'bor skyes bu
131b8(brgyad stong): gauti mug can de legs par bshang ba'i chos 'dul ba de nyid las rab tu byung la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i sun dbyung bar sems/ spang ba
132a1(brgyad stong): / sems par gzhil bar sems par 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di phyir bcil na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang byir
132a2(brgyad stong): bcil bar 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub byir bzhil na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen
132a3(brgyad stong): pa nyid kyang phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir bcil na/ dam pa'i chos bcil bar 'gyur// dam pa'i chos par bcil na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
132a4(brgyad stong): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil na/ 'o na ni dkon mchog gsum las yongasu phyi rol du gyur
132a5(brgyad stong): pa yin te/ dpag tu med pa'i yang ches dpag tu med pa'i mi dge ba'i las chen po mngon pa 'du byed pa yong su 'dzin par 'gyuraro// de skad ces pa/ 
132a6(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
132a7(brgyad stong): pa 'di la/ pir gzhal bar sems pa de'i rgyu gang logs rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
132a8(brgyad stong): de bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'am/ shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i las kyis chos zab mo dag la ma dang / ma mos par 'gyur ba 'am/ rab 'byor sdig
132b1(brgyad stong): ba'i chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu bo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyir 'jil bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang rab 'bor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
132b2(brgyad stong): kyi bu me sdig pa'i gogs po'i lag tu song ba yin nam/ mi brtson pa yin nas/ mngon par zhen pa yin nam/ bdag la bstod cing gzhan la spong ba dang / nyes pa'i klan ka cho
132b3(brgyad stong): ba yin te/ rab 'ber rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad cing bsnan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa la phyir gzhi la bA sem
132b4(brgyad stong): pa de ni rnam pa de dag dang ldan pa yin// sems can dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu bde pa brgyad stong ba// bam po dgu pa/ de nas
132b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyis 'di ska da ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mi brtson pas mos par dka'o//

132b7(brgyad stong): dang mi 'dod pa dang / thos pa nyung ba dang / shes rab 'chal pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pas nye bor brtan pa dang / sri zhu chung ba dang / mi 'dri ba'i rang bzhinaH
132b8(brgyad stong): dang / dge ba'i chos la mi brtson pas mos par dka' ba'o// rab 'bor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das e ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mos par dka
133a1(brgyad stong): ba'i slad du ji tsam du zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'ber gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byer
133a2(brgyad stong): gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i par ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'bor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes po ni ma bcings ma grol
133a3(brgyad stong): de ci'i pir zhe na/ rab 'bor rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'o pir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' ma bcings ma grol

139a3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod // gzugs la chags pa mi skyed// tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par she
139a4(brgyad stong): pa la tshogs pa mi skyed/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bras bu la chags pa mi bskyed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la chags pa mi skyed/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la chags pa mi
139a5(brgyad stong): skyed/ dgra bcom pa nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi bskyed/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
139a6(brgyad stong): la chags pa mi skye // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma chags pa/ ma bcings pa/ yang dag par ma 'das pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar tshogs pa
139a7(brgyad stong): thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ 
139a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di ni zab ste/ 'di ni bstan kyang mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel ma
139b1(brgyad stong): bstan kyang mi 'phel ba de mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor leg so lag so/ 
139b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'bor 'di lnga ste/ dper na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcu
139b3(brgyad stong): shing / na mkha'i bsngags pa ma brjod kyang / na mkha' yongasu 'grib par mi 'gyur/ bsngags pa brjod kyang na mkha' yongasu 'phel bar mi 'gyu ro// rab 'bor 'di lnga ste
139b4(brgyad stong): dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la bsngags pa ba rjed kyang rjesu chags par yang mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ bsngags pa ma brjod kyang khong khro bar
139b5(brgyad stong): yang mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyen mongs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bstan kyang de snyed zad// ma bstan
139b6(brgyad stong): kyang de snyed du zad// gnas brdan rab 'byer gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
139b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa l-i zhum par mi bgyid/ ya ya bor mi 'gyur/ 'di la rnal 'bor du yang bgying la pir mi ldog na/ dka' ba bgyid pa lag so// 'di
139b8(brgyad stong): lnga sde/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' la bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis go cha'
140a1(brgyad stong): dgos pa ni phyag bgyi ba lag so// de ci'i sla zhe ma/ gang sems can rnams kyi sra go cha 'chal ba de ni na mkha' la ge cha 'tshal ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang
140a2(brgyad stong): namakha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa rnams kyi slang du go cha bag pa 'chal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pa ni go mchen pa bgos
140a3(brgyad stong): pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag so// bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni ra
140a4(brgyad stong): mkha' gdeg par 'tshal ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'chis rnams kyi sla du ge cha 'tshal ba ri brtson 'grus kyi
140a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha chen po thob po lpagaso// nga na sa dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
140a6(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang mi spyad/ chos gang yang
140a7(brgyad stong): 'gog par mi bgyid // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal
140a8(brgyad stong): 'byor du byed pa de/ ci la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni// namakha
140b1(brgyad stong): la ral 'byor du byed par 'gyuraro// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par sems pa de ni bla gab med pa la rnal 'byer du byed par 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lnga'i
140b2(brgyad stong): be brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba de la srung ba dang bskyab pa dang / 
140b3(brgyad stong): sba ba ci zhig bgyi bka' stsal du gsel/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya bin la 'di skad ces sbaso// ko'u shi ka chos gang la srung ba dang / bskyab dang / swa
140b4(brgyad stong): bya ba'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'bor de ni mo yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de ltar gal te/ byang chub
140b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phar le tu phyin pa ji ltar bshad pa la gnas na/ de nyid de la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / spang bar 'gyur// gal
140b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/ mi dang ma mi yin pa de la glags lta ba dang / blugs tshel ba dag gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gang ba
140b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni/ na mkha' srung ba dang / ba
140b8(brgyad stong): ba dang / sba bar bya bar sems// ke'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ ko ru shi ka khyong brag cha la srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar byed par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras
141a1(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'bor de ni ma yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
141a2(brgyad stong): pa la spyod cing gnas pa yang / chos rnams kyang brag cha lta bur yang dag par rje su mi mthong mi shes kun mi shes yang dag par mi shes/ mi sdang / med cing ma dmigs par gan
141a3(brgyad stong): / gal te de ltar gnas na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus// stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po
141a4(brgyad stong): ba'i ji snyed yod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po yang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
141a5(brgyad stong): 'ongs te lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba bas nas/ phyogs gcig tu
141a6(brgyad stong): 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / rgyal po chen po de dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po ra
141a7(brgyad stong): mjed kyi bdag po yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas stong yang dag par rjesu dran te/ de dag gis ming 'di dag nyid
141a8(brgyad stong): dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / rab 'byor ces bya ba'i dge slong dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongasu nus pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
141b1(brgyad stong): le'u 'di nyid lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag yongasu 'dri zhing / kun 'dri ba byed pa dang / sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa dran// byang chub sems
141b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sa pags 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ 
141b3(brgyad stong): 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyuraro// rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'di skad ces gsol
141b4(brgyad stong): // bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsamo// ming de yang mi dmigs te/ ngag gi dngos po nyid ming zhes pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
141b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa de yang ma mchis/ mi dmigs te/ ming ji lta ba bzhin rlab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de ba zhi no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu pade pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming
141b6(brgyad stong): yang de bzhin te/ ches 'di gnyis ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa bla na med ba
141b7(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag gis sa phyogs 'di nyid du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa
141b8(brgyad stong): pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'bor 'di ltar byang chub sod
142a1(brgyad stong): // sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni/ gzugs stong pa'am/ gzugs bcings pa zhe 'am/ gzugs grol ba zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ 
142a2(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa bcings dang / rnam par shes pa grol ba'o/ 
142a3(brgyad stong): nes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor rnam pa de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
142a4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mang 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis sa phyo/ gas 'di nyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad
142a5(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das e ma shes
142a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongasu dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongasu dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag
142a7(brgyad stong): pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// 
142a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor na mo mkha' yeng su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs gos pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ 
142b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gos pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// na mkha' gos pa rje
142b2(brgyad stong): pas/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// gos pa thams cad kyis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
142b3(brgyad stong): su dag pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
142b4(brgyad stong): gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags par gyur pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
142b5(brgyad stong): dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don po dang // lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag ni yang ba mi spong bas 'chi ba'i dus mi bgyid// 
142b6(brgyad stong): de ngag la lha stong phrag mang po dag de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyuraro// tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga la chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de gang dag
142b7(brgyad stong): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dang der/ bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
142b8(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhi no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
143a1(brgyad stong): pab su rdzong phrag sang po dag thong bar 'gyur// tsor byu zhe na/ rang 'phyo gas sakyi rab tu phyin pa da/ lha mi nga rnam yin du las pa 'jig rten
143a2(brgyad stong): rin po ma blan med pa'o// yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma ri de'i gni las bsad nams ma du skyed par 'gyur med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi gar 'bri ba dang
143a3(brgyad stong): lung nod pa dang / ston pa la bar chad mang du byed par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rin po che chen po ni dgra yang ste/ ji tsam du dbyig tu gyur pa bzhin du dgra ches lcits+tsha
143a4(brgyad stong): gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni// bla na med pa'i rin po che ste/ jig rten la phan po dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa/ 
143a5(brgyad stong): thams cad mi skyo ba dang / mi 'gog par bya ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ste/ 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin po'i chos gang la mi
143a6(brgyad stong): gnas chos gang la yang mi sbyor/ chos gang la yang mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni med cing mi rimagos// rab 'byor ming sa
143a7(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma gos pa'o// rab 'byor ma gos pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs
143a8(brgyad stong): gos pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gos pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mo gos pas na// shes
143b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gos pa'o// gal te de ltar yang dag par mi shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos ka
143b2(brgyad stong): la yang 'jug pa 'am/ nges par 'jug pa 'am/ yang dag par ston pa 'am/ yongasu thob par byed pa 'am/ nges par thob par byed pa med do// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag ma
143b3(brgyad stong): po dag par snang la tsa tse dang / gzha dag byed de/ ges dag 'thor zhing // e ma 'dzam bu'i gling du ches kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lan gnyis byung bar snang zhes 'dzer to// de nas
143b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'bar la 'a de skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'do ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyisu bskor ba ma yin te/ chos gang la yang
143b5(brgyad stong): rab tu bskor ba 'am/ ldeg pa mdo// rab 'byor lade yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yino// de skad ces
143b6(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'ber gyis 'di skad ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang la chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa
143b7(brgyad stong): dang / gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal la/ chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyab
143b8(brgyad stong): dang / ches kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor yang ches gang yong mi smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ 
144a1(brgyad stong): gang smos par bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs te/ ches gang yang rab tu ster bar 'gyur ba ma mi so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ches thams cad ni/ shi
144a2(brgyad stong): tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos gang yang mngon par bsgrub par mi 'gyuraro// rab tu skur bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad thog ma nas mdo
144a3(brgyad stong): par ma grub pa'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni rab tu 'jug pa 'am/ 
144a4(brgyad stong): ldog pa mdo// rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa ni 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa medado// smon pa med pa ni 'jug pa 'am ldog pa me // gang 'di ltar bstan pa 'di ni chos thams cad bsdu/ 
144a5(brgyad stong): pa med pa yin te/ sus kyang bstan pa med la/ sus kyang thos pa med/ sus kyang mnod pa med/ sus kya nga mngon sum du ma byas/ su yang mngon sum du byed pa
144a6(brgyad stong): mdo// chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur/ yongasu mya ngan las mi 'dar te/ chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang
144a7(brgyad stong): sbyin pa'i gan su byas pa medo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na mkha'
144a8(brgyad stong): mtha' yas pa'i slodang 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mnyam pa ma mchis pa'i
144b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu stong pa'i maru// 'di ni dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad/ 'di di mi rdzi ba'i pha ro
144b2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis shing / lus pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni// gos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos
144b3(brgyad stong): thams cad 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad/ 'di ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gzung ba la mchis pa'i spang du/ 'di ni mi 'brog
144b4(brgyad stong): ba'i pha rol tu zin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i slod/ 'di ni 'di mi bas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon pa
144b5(brgyad stong): ma grub pa'i slad du 'di ni chos thams cad mi skye ba'i ba rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i slad/ 'di ni bde ba po ma mchis pa'i
144b6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad/ 'di ni shes pa po dang // mthong ba po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan pa
144b7(brgyad stong): shi 'bo bo dang / skye ba mi skye ba'i sladadu/ 'di ni mi 'pho ba'i pha rol tu zin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi mtha' dang / bi ma'i mtha' dang / da lhor byung ba'i dus mi dpags
144b8(brgyad stong): pa'i slad/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu byin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis shing / rnam par grol bar mi bgyid pa'i sladadu/ 'di ni sgra mi'i pha rol tu phyin par
145a1(brgyad stong): / bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bzung ba'i slad du/ 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / ga
145a2(brgyad stong): rug ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rten mi dmigs pa'i sparu/ 'di ni pa~M gos pa'i pha
145a3(brgyad stong): rol tu zin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rlom sems thams cad las 'das pa'i slad du/ 'od ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das g.yo ba ma
145a4(brgyad stong): mchis pa'i sladadu/ 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi slang/ 'di ni mi g.yos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
145a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyis/ du/ 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral po'i pha rol tu byin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad da
145a6(brgyad stong): par mi rig pa'i sladu/ 'di ni sdang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'as mtshan ma thams cad mi dmigs pa'i smad/ 'di ni zhi bi'i pha rol tu phyin pa
145a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad/ 'di ni skyospyod ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mthir slad du/ 'di ni sems can
145a8(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ldang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni chang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'as
145b1(brgyad stong): rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par chags pa'i slad/ 'di ni mtha' mi rig
145b2(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu yin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma brel ba'i slad/ 'di ni tha dad ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thang
145b3(brgyad stong): kyi sa'i sdang du/ 'di ni mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdog pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o bcom ldan 'dra
145b4(brgyad stong): chos nyid tshang ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni gangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha
145b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rnam par mi rtag ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ches
145b6(brgyad stong): kyi rang bzhin gyi sla du/ 'di ni dastigasu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ches thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni chags pa ma mchis
145b7(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gnas mi dmigs pa'i sdang/ 'di ni mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad skye ba ma ma
145b8(brgyad stong): pa'i slad/ 'di ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu byin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyi
146a1(brgyad stong): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid dmakha' dang 'dra ba'i slad du/ 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par mchatha
146a2(brgyad stong): pa'i slad 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ches thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu zin pa'o// bcom ldan
146a3(brgyad stong): 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i sladadu/ 'di ni mtshan nying ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas su ma mchis pa'i sladadu// 'di ni dngag
146a4(brgyad stong): tu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'i ngas mi rdzi ba'i slad du/ 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba'i tshul las shin tu 'a
146a5(brgyad stong): pa'i sladadu/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shi na tu ma zhub pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu
146a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad log pa de bzhin nyid kyi sladadu/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu byin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thang ngo bo nyid
146a7(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'i slad/ 'di ni rang byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yongasu 'tshal ba'i slad 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
146a8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'dzin thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
146b1(brgyad stong): brgyad spong ba// bam po bcu pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rna
146b2(brgyad stong): du grag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba bas pa yin na gang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang
146b3(brgyad stong): lung rnyed pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzung zhing btsongs te klag pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang // rab tu bton pa dang / lung banos shing / kha ton du byas nas/ 
146b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid rnal 'byor du byed pa lta ci smos te/ de dag ni ngan ngon ma yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa
146b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur// rigs kyi bu dang // rigs kyi bu mo dang / ga ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyed bkur ba sa pa yin/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ sarba
146b6(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dris shing / yongasu dri ba byas pa yin te/ gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ 
146b7(brgyad stong): ldan yang nyan te/ mnyan nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur// 'chang bar 'gyur/ klogo bar 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur/ ston
146b8(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ kha ton byed par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid slob par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur// de bzhin nyid rnal 'bar du byed bar 'gyur ba dang / 
147a1(brgyad stong): ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid thob pa yin// 
147a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta bur bshad pa la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur/ yi mi
147a3(brgyad stong): gsod/ yi gsod par mi 'gyur/ yid phyir phyogs par mi byed/ mi skrag gi dang / shin tu dbang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba
147a4(brgyad stong): rtsa ba bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o// tsho dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyi 'di lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan
147a5(brgyad stong): 'das lo 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la mdo
147a6(brgyad stong): par dad ste/ rtog cing mos la sems dang bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klo ga pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu
147a7(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang // lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyi du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du 'gyed na/ 
147a8(brgyad stong): ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po ji rtsa ba bzhin du gzung bar bgyira'o// de ci'i sri zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
147b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / yongasu mi 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du gyur pa ma thos
147b2(brgyad stong): pa dang / sngod spyang ba dang ma ldan pa rnams kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par mi nuso// bcom ldan 'das gang dag ma gtogs par spong ba sems
147b3(brgyad stong): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mtha' na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chang ba la spong bar gyur to// de ci'i sladu zhe na/ 
147b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i sladadu sngon pa spyad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po zab mo 'a ji 'chad pa na/ spong bar 'gyur ba de dag kya
147b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/ de dag gis sngon yang / sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa na/ spangs pas 'di ltar de dag gis shes rab kyi
147b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mos pa ma mchis/ dad pa ma mchis/ dga' ba ma mchis/ dang ba ma mchis/ bzod pa ma mchis pa ste/ de dag gis
147b7(brgyad stong): sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang // sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la yongasu ma dris te/ yongasu dri ba ma bgyis// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
147b8(brgyad stong): gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seng la chan
148a1(brgyad stong): ma spyad pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bshang ba la mos par mi 'gyur ba de ltar ngo mtshar ci che// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
148a2(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad
148a3(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke ru shi ka de de bzhi// nga de bzhin de ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
148a4(brgyad stong): la ba pa shA na/  bya na/ sas rgyas pam ldan 'das rnas kyi/ mam
148a5(brgyad stong): po nyid ni 'di las skyes te/ koru sho ka thams cad mkhan pi nyid kyi ye shes las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu na pa skyes par rab tu gzhag go// de ltar shes rab kyi
148a6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad
148a7(brgyad stong): ces gsil to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags
148a8(brgyad stong): ba lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byer du bgyod// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
148b1(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko 'uru shi ka leg so leg so// gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ don
148b2(brgyad stong): bar sengs pa le gas legs// ke'u shi ka 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ khyod kyi stobs pa skyes// ko ru shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
148b3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa na/ gzugs la mi gnas/ gzugaso zhes mi gon so// kau ru shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la mi gnas/ 
148b4(brgyad stong): gzug so zhes mi gnas pas/ ko'u shi ka de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
148b5(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par shes pa la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'o zhes ma gnas te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
148b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas/ ko ru shi ka de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam par shes pa la
148b7(brgyad stong): dal 'byer du byed// ko'u shi ka gzugs zhes mi sbyar te/ ko 'uru shi ka nam gzugaso zhes mi sbyor no// de ltar na gzugs zhes mi gan so// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba
148b8(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o zhes pa sbyor de/ ko'u shi ka nas rnam par shes pa'i nas mi sbyor ba de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa zhes mi
149a1(brgyad stong): de ras bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni za'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
149a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtog par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzung bar dko'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchi so// ca
149a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ shA ri ri bu re de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu gzugs zabo snyam du mi gan so// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs za'o snyam du mi gnas pas/ 
149a4(brgyad stong): de ltar na gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / shA ri'i bu/ rnam par shes pa zabo snyam du mi gnaso// shA ri'i
149a5(brgyad stong): 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zang snyam du mi gnas pas/ de ltar rnam ra shes pa la rnal 'byor du bye'o// shA ri ri bu gzugs za'o snyam du rnal 'byor du mi bya'o// shA
149a6(brgyad stong): ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs za bo snyam du rnal 'byer du mi byed nas/ de ltar na gzugs zabo snyam du mi gnas// de bzhin du tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
149a7(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa za'o snyam du rnal 'bor du mi byed pas/ 'di ltar na rnam par shes
149a8(brgyad stong): bzebo snyam du mi gnas// de skad ces bkar stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri ri bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
149b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par bgyi'o// de ci'i sladu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ne nu
149b2(brgyad stong): mi bgyid/ the tsom 'tshal bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces spraso// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal de byang chub sems
149b3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa'i mdun du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad na/ nyes pa ci yod/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i ru
149b4(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya bin la 'di skad ces smraso// ke'u shi ka lung ma bstan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / nyan pa thos par gyur la
149b5(brgyad stong): thos nas kyang mi sreg pa dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon pa ni yu/ ring po nas/ theg pa la yang dag par zhu
149b6(brgyad stong): pa ste/ nges yun ring po mi thogs pa lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te// de ni lung bstan pa la bsnyen pa yino// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ de
149b7(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gim gnyis las mi 'dab ste/ de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
149b8(brgyad stong): tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ thugs rgyu
150a1(brgyad stong): bar byed par mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na yang lung bstan pas 'bras bu yod par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas na bla na med pa yang dag
150a2(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyuraro// ko 'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa 'di lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang // mnyan pa thob par gyur
150a3(brgyad stong): thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung mnod pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
150a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba yi na te/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
150a5(brgyad stong): bo nga ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa yido// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsam ro// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin// 
150a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mnyan pa thob par gyur pa thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang
150a7(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba yin te/ yun
150a8(brgyad stong): ring bi zhes theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de dag pang rtsa ba yong su smid pa lano// skangasas pa
150b1(brgyad stong): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol ba bdag spob so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag speb so// bcom
150b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di lta sde/ dper na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me byang chub sems dpa' theg pa can gang de'i rmi lam du yang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa rmis ma bcom
150b3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba'i slang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bstan pa
150b4(brgyad stong): leg so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa dang
150b5(brgyad stong): gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyi ba rnyed par gyur na/ bcom
150b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyi gang zag de ni/ rgyang ring po nas mchis pa lags te/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can da ni lung bstan pa la
150b7(brgyad stong): bsnyen pa lag so// da ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba rig par bgyi'o// gang shes rab
150b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'ang tha na mnyan pa yang rnyed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smid pa lags par rig pa
151a1(brgyad stong): bgyi'o// de ci'i sladu zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das pa chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa dang / ma bral ba'i sems cadan de dag las phal cher ni/ shes
151a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di la sems mi mthun par 'gyur/ sems ldog par 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu mi 'jug ste/ gang yang da/ 
151a3(brgyad stong): pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu gnon cing / yang dag par dad par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das de
151a4(brgyad stong): dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu zhig 'breg dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad nyas
151a5(brgyad stong): brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'am/ dpag chang ba ni brgya ba 'am/ dpag chang lnga brgya pa dang / dpag chang brgya phrag bcu pa'i 'brog dgon pa nas byung ba dang
151a6(brgyad stong): des 'di ltar mtshan ma gang gis grong ngam grong khyer ram// grong rdal mchis pa'i mtshan ma sngar gda' ba/ ba lang rdzi'am/ phyug rje 'am/ sa mtsham sam/ kun dga'i ra ba
151a7(brgyad stong): phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ dam lags pa'i mtshan ma gzhan dag sngar mthong la/ des mtshan ma dag mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du 'di ltar mtshan pa 'di dag sdang ba dang / 
151a8(brgyad stong): grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grol rdal du nye bar 'gyuraro// snyam nas de ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lag ste/ de la slan chad tshim po yid la bgyid pa ma mchis pa lags
151b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nye bar gnas na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems pa
151b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ring po mi thigs par/ bla na
151b3(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la sems par mi 'gyur/ 'jigs par mi
151b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de ci'i sradu zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lngas sngar ganga' ba ring lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phag bgyi ba dang // mnyan pa thob pa'i sla
151b5(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// shA ri'i bu de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i
151b6(brgyad stong): bu de ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus smra ba dang // smra bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du yang gnas 'di la khong spobs par gyi sa shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
151b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dbor na 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rgya mche chen po lnga 'tshal bar gyur te/ 
151b8(brgyad stong): de rgya mtsho chen por mchis nas// ji lnga ji ltar mchis pa dang / gal te nges ldum bu 'am/ ldum bu'i mtshan mo 'am/ ri'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong na// ris 'di snyam du'i
152a1(brgyad stong): nas rgya mchechen po rung ngo snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gal te pyis rdzob bu 'am/ ldus bub mtshan ma 'am/ ri'amar 'i mtshan ma ma mthong sa// nges 'ja
152a2(brgyad stong): snyam du/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po dang nye'o snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slang zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po na dma' ba lags pas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na ldum bu 'am/ ldus
152a3(brgyad stong): bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ring mtshan ma gang yang ma mchis te/ rgya mtsho chen po de mig gis dgreng mod kyi 'on kyang rgya mtsho chen po ni bdag gis bsnyen te/ 'di phan chang rgya
152a4(brgyad stong): mtsho chen po mi ring ngo snyam du rdzogs par ri'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du rag par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi
152a5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pas na// de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bco mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ bdag bangon sum du ni lung ma
152a6(brgyad stong): bstan kyang / 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bstan par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i skadu zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu na
152a7(brgyad stong): ba zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa thob pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ dped ka'i dus nye bar gnas pa na/ shing sna tshogs
152a8(brgyad stong): kyi yal ga dang / lo ma rnams lpags pa las/ lo ma rnams byung ste/ lo ma rnams byung ba dang / ladza m+bu'i gling gi mi rnams nags tshal dag la mtshan ma sngar byu
152b1(brgyad stong): ba de dag mthong nas/ da ni me tog dang 'bras bu rnams ring po mi thogs par 'byung snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur// de ci'i slad zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sdong po las mtshan ma 'i
152b2(brgyad stong): lta bu sngar gangar ba'i sladu'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang lta ba dang / phyag
152b3(brgyad stong): bgyi ba dang / mnyar ba'i sladadu nye bar gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'ong la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu
152b4(brgyad stong): smin pa lags par yengs rig par bgyi ste/ shes ra bA kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis bsgrubs pa lagaso// de la gang sngon
152b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha de dag ni 'di snyam du/ sde na gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched po ga kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
152b6(brgyad stong): chub tu lung bstan pa'i mtshan pa sngar byung ba yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring
152b7(brgyad stong): mi thegs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur snyam nas/ rab tu dga' zhing rangs te/ yid mgu ba skyed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'ang lta ste/ dbor na bud mad smra
152b8(brgyad stong): ma mngal lci bar gyur pa/ ji lta ji ltar lus rnam bskyed na/ char snyems par 'gyur te/ 'chag pa la dang po cher mi 'gyur/ rngub pa dang / gnyid chung bar 'gyur/ 
153a1(brgyad stong): / kha zas chung ba tshal bar 'gyur/ spra bzung bar 'gyur/ stabs chung bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal bang bar 'gyur/ 'chag pa la ring du mi gnas par 'gyur/ grog po
153a2(brgyad stong): ngad pa che bar mi 'gyur/ sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma legs pa yid la bgyid pa bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pas/ 'di lta bu'i tsher ba lus kyis myeng de snyam na/ bcom ldan pa
153a3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar mtshan ma 'di dag gangar ba'i slad du/ bud med 'di ni ring po pi thogs par bu 'byung bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng
153a4(brgyad stong): chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs smin pa de ji lnga ji lngar shes rab kyi pha rol tu byid pa zab ma 'di rtsa ba dang / phyag bgyi bra dang / mnyan pa'i slad nye bar gnas pa la nyan par
153a5(brgyad stong): la dga' zhing // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dod du gnyer po'i sems skye na/ bcom ldan 'das bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dza
153a6(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring po ri thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcos
153a7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'iri bu legs leg so// shA ri'i bu yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod slebs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
153a8(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ping sas rgyas kyis byang chu
153b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag 'di ltar legs par yongasu gtang ba 'di ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub
153b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i ded dang / phan pa dang / 
153b3(brgyad stong): bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ lha dang mi rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dong ba bla na med pa yA
153b4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na med pa'i chos ston par 'dod pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub se
153b5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa la ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ bcom lda
153b6(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par
153b7(brgyad stong): rjesu mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes pa ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba
153b8(brgyad stong): dag par rje su mi mthong // shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin pa la spyod// gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjesu mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // de bzhin du
154a1(brgyad stong): tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjesu mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
154a2(brgyad stong): ba la spyod// chos yang dag par rje su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// chos ma yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
154a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/  dzin
154a4(brgyad stong): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khya'o// rab 'byor gzugs posam gyis mi khab ces bya bar mi shes na/ 
154a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsama~M gyis mi khab ces bya bar
154a6(brgyad stong): mi shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa la spyod// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
154a7(brgyad stong): phyin pa zab mo 'di la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
154a8(brgyad stong): pa la spyod par 'gyur ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod par 'gyur ba
154b1(brgyad stong): lags ji ltar na spang bar 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
154b2(brgyad stong): stobs rnams li mo rtog/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi rtog/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi rtog la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang mi rdog// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu stobs rnam
154b3(brgyad stong): bsam gyis mi khab/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khab/ chos thas
154b4(brgyad stong): cad kyang bsam gyis mi khab ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
154b5(brgyad stong): la spyod par gyur pa zhes bya zhing / spyad par gyur pa shes pa ba'i ming tho bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang lnga na pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
154b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das na mkha' dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
154b7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
154b8(brgyad stong): dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba la bar chod bgyid pa mang po mi 'byung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar
155a1(brgyad stong): to/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ rig kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
155a2(brgyad stong): bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab du 'don pa dang / lung dong ba dang / khe na byed pa dang /

155a6(brgyad stong): rol tu byin pa bri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ rab 'byor 'ang sa bur mdzo // gang dzin po chechen po de la ba cang byed pa mang du 'byung // de gang cel bka' stsal pa dang /

156b7(brgyad stong): du sleb par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub por 'gyur// de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur te/ shA ri ri bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang da/
