190a1(brgyad stong): ras 'jig rten gyi de bzhin nyid mkhyen te// ma log pa'i de bzhin nyid mkhyen to// gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin ga
190a2(brgyad stong): bsang bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sa sa rgyas so// de bzhi gshegs pa nas byar// raba'i phyir gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nga bzhin nyid ni za'o ste/ de bzhin nyid la
190a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub rab tu dbye'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/ dgra bcom pa
190a4(brgyad stong): brtag pa yongasu rdzogs pa 'am/ rigs kyi bu lta ba phun sum tshogs pa su ngag 'di la mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das gnas zab mo 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs
190a5(brgyad stong): pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gsung so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
190a6(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ gnas zab mo 'ang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nos bshad/ rab 'byer
190a7(brgyad stong): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi zad pa ste/ mi zad pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mi
190a8(brgyad stong): pa nyid du bstan to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lde'i bu rnams dang // tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khri dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
190b1(brgyad stong): dang nga ste/ lpags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// phyogs gcig tu 'khong nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa
190b2(brgyad stong): na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos zab mo dag rab tu bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la mtshan
190b3(brgyad stong): nyid ji ltar gzhag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag stong pa'o zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhago/ lha'i bu dag mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'o zhes
190b4(brgyad stong): 'di la mtshan nyid gzhag go// lha'i bu dag mngon par 'a du mi byed pa'o// skye ba med pa'o// dngos po med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa'o// chos kyi dbyings so zhes 'di la mtshan
190b5(brgyad stong): nying gnag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid 'di dag ni mi gnas pa na mkha' dang 'dra ba ste/ lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
190b6(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma bzhag ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag ni gzugs su bgrang ba ma yin no// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
190b7(brgyad stong): dang / rnam par shes par bdagrang ba ma yin no// mtshan nyid 'di dag ni gzugs la brten pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
190b8(brgyad stong): brten pa ma yin no// mtshan nyid 'di dag ni lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin dag gis ma bzhag go// mtshan nyid 'di dag ni lnga dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spyod pa
191a1(brgyad stong): // nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten kyang mtshan nyid de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid 'di dag ni lag gis bzhag pa yang ma yin no// 
191a2(brgyad stong): lnga'i bu dag gang zhig 'di skad du na mkha' 'di sus bzhag ces zer na/ lha'i bu dag de ci yang dag par smra bas smra 'am/ de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la
191a3(brgyad stong): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na mkha' ni sus kyang ma bzhag ga/ ngo tsa'i slad du ga na/ bcom
191a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das na mkha' ni 'dus ma 'gyes pa lags te/ sus kyang ma gnag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyad pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i
191a5(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bani na no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid 'di dag
191a6(brgyad stong): ni de bzhin du gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar 'di dag gnas pa de lta bu nyid du de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas// de bas na lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs
191a7(brgyad stong): bde bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyad pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gos 'di skad ces
191a8(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid zab mo 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 
191b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes so// chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
191b2(brgyad stong): spyod yul lo// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ 
191b3(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
191b4(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten cing gnas pa de bzhin du/ chos de dag kyang rtag tu de bzhin gshegs
191b5(brgyad stong): pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// de dag kyang chos kho na la brten cing gnas so// chos la bkur sti mdzad// tha mar mdzad do// ri mor mdzad do// mchod
191b6(brgyad stong): do rjeng ngo gsol lo// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
191b7(brgyad stong): bkur stir mdzad do// bla mar mdzad do// ri mor mdzad do// mchod par mdzad do// rjed par mdzad do// gsol bar mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
191b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byed par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
192a1(brgyad stong): / pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ byas pa gzo pa byas 'tshor ba rnams yin no// rangab 'byor bang 'di skad du// de bzhin gshegs pa ni byas pa gzog/ 
192a2(brgyad stong): byas pa tshor ba'o zhes zer na/ yang dag par smra bas yang dag par spro'o// rab 'byor byas pa gzob byas pa tshor ba zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/ 
192a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te/ theg pa gang dang gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i dag pa nyid dang / lam de nyid
192a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa rjes 'dzin cing rjesu skyong ngo // rab 'byor byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor ba 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor
192a5(brgyad stong): par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin pa shegs pas chos thams cad ma byas pas ma byas pa 'o zhes/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ma/ 
192a6(brgyad stong): bsgyur ba ma bsgyur ba'o zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rab 'byor 'di la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar
192a7(brgyad stong): rig par blta'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas/ chos thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
192a8(brgyad stong): kyi ye shes 'jug ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
192b1(brgyad stong): rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams
192b2(brgyad stong): cad ni ma 'tshal ba/ mi mthong ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
192b3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor
192b4(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa leg so legs so// rab 'byor khyod gang 'di skad du/ chos thams cad mi shes mi mthong zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor
192b5(brgyad stong): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni mi shes pa mi mthong ba'o// rab 'byor ji ltar chos tha mas cad mi shes mi mthong ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
192b6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ni stong pa yin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na chos thams cad ni mi shes mi mthong ba'o// rab 'byor chos de dag thams cad
192b7(brgyad stong): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor de ltar na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
192b8(brgyad stong): phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ 'jig rten 'di ston pa yin no// gzugs mi mthong ba dang / tshor ba
193a1(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi mthong ba'i phyir rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
193a2(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs ma mthong ba lags/ dziH
193a3(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la dmigs
193a4(brgyad stong): pa'i rnam par shes pa mi skye ba'i tshe/ de ltar gzug sa mi mthong ba yin no// rab 'byor nam tshor ba dang 'du she sa dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs
193a5(brgyad stong): ba'i sems mi skye ba'i tshe/ de ltar rnam par shes pa mi mthong ba yin no// rab 'byor gzugs mi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed
193a6(brgyad stong): rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa mi mthong ba gang yin pa de rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gdags so// rab 'byor des shes rab kyi pha rol tu
193a7(brgyad stong): phyin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
193a8(brgyad stong): 'jog rten ston cing / ji ltar 'jig rten smos she na/ 'jig rten stong pa'o zhes de ltar 'jig rten ston to// 'jig rten dben pa'o zhes de ltar 'jig rten rnam par dag pas
193b1(brgyad stong): 'jig rten smos so// 'jig rten zhi ba'o zhes de ltar 'jig rten ston cing de ltar 'jig rten smos so// / 'jig rten bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis
193b2(brgyad stong): ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes ra'i tu phyin pa
193b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bgyi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bgyi ba gzhal du ma mchis pa dang
193b4(brgyad stong): bgyi ba dpag tu ma mchis par nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bya ba chen pos
193b5(brgyad stong): nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bya ba gzhal du med pa dang / bya ba dpag tu med pas
193b6(brgyad stong): nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab par nye bar gnas she na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang
193b7(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / ring drung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyam po// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha
193b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di na bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas te/ sems kyis bsam par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la sems dang sems las
194a1(brgyad stong): // byung ba'i chos mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bya ba gsal du med pas nye bar gnas she na/ rab 'byor de bzhin
194a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ni bsam pa 'am gzhal bar bya mi nus te/ rab 'byor
194a3(brgyad stong): de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bya ba gnal du med pas nye bar gnas so// rangab 'byor ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang/ bya ba dadag tu med pas
194a4(brgyad stong): nye bar gnas she na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nying dang / rang byung nying dang / thams cad dakhyen pa nyid
194a5(brgyad stong): ni dpag tu med pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ bya ba dpag tu med ngas nye bar gan so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
194a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzhal du ma mchis pa lags sar// de bzhin gshegs pa
194a7(brgyad stong): nyid dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i de bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma
194a8(brgyad stong): mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa lags/ 'on te gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
194b1(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnal du ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa lags/ 'on te chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa
194b2(brgyad stong): gzhal du ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'bor
194b3(brgyad stong): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa dngag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
194b4(brgyad stong): 'ang byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa gzhal
194b5(brgyad stong): du med pa dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor chos tham sa cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems pa ya nga med/ sems las byung ba'i chos kyang med do// 
194b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs ni gzhal du med pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang gzhal du med pa'o// rab 'byor chos
194b7(brgyad stong): ni dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa yang dpag tu med pa ste/ 
194b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi tshad kyang mi rig go// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'ang byed rnams dang / rnam par
195a1(brgyad stong): / shes pa'i tshad kyang mi rig ste// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi tshad kyang mi rig go// rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs dpag tu med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
195a2(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad kyang dpag tu med ce na/ rab 'byor gzugs la yang
195a3(brgyad stong): tshad meng ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la tshad med de/ rab 'byor chos thams cad la tshad med do// rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzu
195a4(brgyad stong): tshang med do// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa tshad med/ rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams
195a5(brgyad stong): cad la tshad med ce na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du se mas na mkha' la chung dang / sems sam sems
195a6(brgyad stong): las byung ba'i chos gang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rnam grangs
195a7(brgyad stong): 'dis chos 'di dag thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu med pa ste/ rab 'byor chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ rnam grangs 'dis
195a8(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med pa dpag tu med do// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag kyang sems dang bral ba'i phyir
195b1(brgyad stong): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o// rab 'byor dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ rnam par shes par 'gyur
195b2(brgyad stong): ba'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor gzhan yang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o// na mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dpag tu med pa'o// nam mkha' gzhal du
195b3(brgyad stong): med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa ste/ chos de dag mi phrad pa'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ chos de dag ni gzhal du med pa'o// zhes bya'o// na mkha' bsam gyes
195b4(brgyad stong): me khyab pa'i byedar/ chos de dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// namakha' gzhal du med pa'i phyir/ chos de dag gzhal du meng po'o// namakha' dpag tu meng nga'i phyir chos
195b5(brgyad stong): dag ni dpag tu med pa'o// bsam gyis mi khyad pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / dpag tu med pa 'di dag bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams
195b6(brgyad stong): las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma nyis stong yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen drug stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig
195b7(brgyad stong): rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge bsnyen ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems
195b8(brgyad stong): dpe'a'i khris kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dag kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
196a1(brgyad stong): tu lung bstan to// dge bsnyen dang dag bsnyen ma gang dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
196a2(brgyad stong): lung bstan te/ de dag kyang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
196a3(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba
196a4(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa ra 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab tu
196a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab po// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen
196a6(brgyad stong): pa nyid dang yang dag par ldan no// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang dag par ldan no// 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa dang yang dag par ldan no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na
196a7(brgyad stong): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ yul gyi mi la dbang dang brtson 'grus thob pa'i rgyal po'i bya ba gang yin pa dang / grong khyer gyi bya ba gang yin pa dang / ljongs
196a8(brgyad stong): kyai bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ blon po dang ldan par gyur na/ de phyir rgyal po ni brtson pa chung zhing khur bor bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du/ 
196b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag par ldan na/ shes rab
196b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de la bya ba byed do// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// gzugs yongs su mi bzung
196b3(brgyad stong): zhing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi bzung zhing / mngon par ma yin par bya
196b4(brgyad stong): dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi bzung zhing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba dang / lan cig/ prir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
196b5(brgyad stong): dang / dgra bcom pa yongs su mi bzung zhing mdo na par ma zhen par bya ba dang / rang byang chub yongasu mi bzung zhing mngon par ra zhen par bya ba dang / thams
196b6(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gzung zhing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar gnaso// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
196b7(brgyad stong): ji ltar na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gzung zhing mngon par ma zhen par bgyi ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar gnas pa lags/ bcom
196b8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems// dgra bcom pa de nyid gang la yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/ mngon par zhen par byed pa khyod kyis mthong ngam
197a1(brgyad stong): / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das do ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid gang la yongs su 'dzin pa 'am/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba'i
197a2(brgyad stong): tshesna de lta bu ni bdag gis ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par
197a3(brgyad stong): dza suM ma mthong ste/ yong su 'dzin par mi byed/ mngon par zin par mi byed ngo // rang 'byor de lta bas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ni yongs su 'dzin pa re dang / mngon par zhen pa med
197a4(brgyad stong): ba'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das / gang la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
197a5(brgyad stong): yongs su mi 'dzin cing / mngon par zhen pa med do/ sa bgyi bar bsten pa 'di thos na/ skrag cing dang ste/ dngang bar gyur du mchi'o// 'od kyang bcom ldan 'ad
197a6(brgyad stong): gang rgyu phun sum tshogs pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa dang / yun ring po nas dge do'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'ang
197a7(brgyad stong): thus ni mos par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de bzhin te/ de de bzhin na// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na skyed pa dang / gzugs na
197a8(brgyad stong): spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni blta dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
197b1(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyi ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi
197b2(brgyad stong): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad kyis/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sa la/ bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par spyadapa
197b3(brgyad stong): dang gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la nyi ma gcig tsam yang bzod cing sred de/ chel ba dang sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / nye bar
197b4(brgyad stong): sems par bgyed na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid de dag ngas mchog du 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na
197b5(brgyad stong): na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan na/ 
197b6(brgyad stong): lnga'i bu dag des na/ ches myur bar mya ngan las 'da' bar re bar bya ste/ dad pas rje su 'brang ba'i sa la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par spyod pa de dag gis ni ma yin/ 
197b7(brgyad stong): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lho'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lar gsu
197b8(brgyad stong): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mchi'o zhes gsol te dang ngo // de dag shin tu ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dod pa na sbed pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni
198a1(brgyad stong): // 'dod pa'i khams su gnas par gyur/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to// bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
198a2(brgyad stong): ste bcu rtsa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
198a3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang / kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par
198a4(brgyad stong): rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / the tsom du mi 'gyur zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga' na/ bcom ldan 'das gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mchis pa
198a5(brgyad stong): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ra ba 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma
198a6(brgyad stong): thag tu/ mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur/ rmongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par mongs par mi 'gyur/ the tsom du mi 'gyur/ som nyi mi za bar
198a7(brgyad stong): blta ba dang mnyan pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing sgom par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo dang
198a8(brgyad stong): ldan pa'i yid la byed pa mi spong zhing / phyir phyogs par mi byed/ gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / bcang ba dang klag pa'i phyir/ mos pa skyed par 'gyur
198b1(brgyad stong): rjesu 'brang zhing phyir 'gro bar 'gyur/ chos smra ba mi gtong bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ba be'u gzhon nu yod pa/ be'u mi 'dor ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub
198b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lus la thogs pa 'am/ glegs bam
198b3(brgyad stong): du chud par ma gyur pa de srid du chos smra ba mi gtong bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mi dag gi nang nas shi 'phos nas mir skyes
198b4(brgyad stong): pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan
198b5(brgyad stong): nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas
198b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byas shing 'dri ba dang / yongs su dri ba byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan de dag nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa yang yod de
198b7(brgyad stong): de yang yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha dag gi nang nas shi 'phos nas
198b8(brgyad stong): 'dir skyes pa de yang / yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan pa rig par bya ste/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bsnyen bkur byas shing / shas
199a1(brgyad stong): // rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtsams te/ dri ba dang / yongs su dri ba byas pa de yang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
199a2(brgyad stong): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bos nas/ yong su madris pa'i phyir mi nyid kyi nang du skyes na yang nem nur du byed par 'gyur// rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par
199a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni/ sngon yang yongs su mo 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur par rig par bya'o// de ba'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar deni shes rab kyi pha rol
199a4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la nem nur du gyur// rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis
199a5(brgyad stong): sngon yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzi nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam gsum 'am/ bzhi tsam du thos par gyur te/ bsnyen bkur byas nas dri ba dang / 
199a6(brgyad stong): rings su dri babyas pa de ni mi shig 'dun pa yin te/ skor bar gyur cing yongs dugs 'dzugs par 'gyur// tsar phyir zhe na/ rang 'byor don 'di skar gajigs shes rab kyi
199a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di sngon yongasu ma dris shing rjes su 'brangs par gyur pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyam par bya ba'i phyir/ ras 'ga' ni mos pas rjesu
199a8(brgyad stong): 'brangs par 'gyur/ res 'ga' ni mos par mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir g.yengs pa dang zhum par 'gyur/ de'i blo rgod par 'gyur te/ ras bal gyi la ba bzhin du 'gyuro// byang
199b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas/ ring po ma lon zhing theg pa la gsar du zhugs te 'ongs par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni dang pa
199b2(brgyad stong): de dang dang ba de rab tu gtong bar 'gyur zhing // 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rjesu 'dzin par mi 'gyur/ rjesu 'jug par mi 'gyur/ rjesu 'khor bar ma
199b3(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ de'i nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gnyis po gang yang rung ba'i sa gcig tu shes par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen
199b4(brgyad stong): bar zhugs pa'i gru zhig pa dang / gang dag der shi nga ngam/ gru tshal la mi 'dzin tam/ shi ba'i ro la mi 'jun/ rab 'byor de ni chu'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma
199b5(brgyad stong): phyin par/ chu'i nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gang dag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i gru zhig pa dang / shing leb bam/ gru tshal la 'dzin cing / 
199b6(brgyad stong): shi ba'i ro la 'jun/ de ni chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur te/ bde bar pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin cing / ma smas ma snad par skam sa la gnas par 'gyur bar rig
199b7(brgyad stong): par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / dang po tsam dang ldan yang des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma 'jus na/ 
199b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ni bar ma dor lam gyi bye brag la sgying lug par 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid du gnas par 'gyur ba
200a1(brgyad stong): de ltar rig par / rab byar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / blan me pa yang dag
200a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'chang rgya bar dang po long ba dang babang ba yong bar sreng pa yong pa dang dun
200a3(brgyad stong): pa yod pa dang / brtson 'grus yod pa dang ngag byed pa yod pa mas pa yod pa da lhag pa'i bsam
200a4(brgyad stong): yod pa dang / ga nga ba yod pa dang / gus par byed pa yod pa dang / dga' ba yod pa dang
200a5(brgyad stong): dang ba yod pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba yod pa dang / brtson pa 'dor ba yod pa de dag kyang shes rab tu
200a6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'jug par byed pade de ltar de dag gi dad pa de dang / bzod pa dang / sred pa dang / 'dun

200b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bud med dam/ skyes pa yang rung / bum pa so ma btang
200b2(brgyad stong): ngas rga chur rab 'byor de'i bum pa de ni yun ring por mi thub ste/ de ni myur du 'chag cing zhig par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen
200b3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar bum pa so mi btang ba de ni mtharas nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
200b4(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzan par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod pa dang / bzod pa yod pa dang / sred pa yod pa dang

200b7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasu ma gzung bar gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bar ma dor lam gyi bye brag la skyed lug par
200b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i bye brag gi lam la sgyid lug pa gang zhe na/ de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
201a1(brgyad stong): na bung med dam/ skyes pa yang rung ste/ bum pa legs pa so btang bas/ 'bab chu 'am/ rdzing bu 'am/ mdze'u 'am/ 'pho'am/ khron pa 'am/ dem
201a2(brgyad stong): yin pa'i chu'i gzhi gzhan las chu bcus te/ des chu khyer nas// rab 'byor bum pa des ni// bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur ro// daci phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bum pa
201a3(brgyad stong): ma lags par gang ba'i phyi / rab byung bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
201a4(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar babang ba yod/ da dang / 'dun pa yod/ btsun 'grus yang / ngag byang pa yang / mam pa yong/ @
201a5(brgyad stong): pa'i bsam pa yod/ gtong ba yod/ gus pa byed pa yod/ dang ba yod/ mchog tu dga' ba yang / brtson pa mi 'dar

201a8(brgyad stong): nyid la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par byag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad spong ba
201b1(brgyad stong): bam po bcu bzhi pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhig rgya mtsho'i gru mig chags ma byas
201b2(brgyad stong): shing ma bcos pa bcings pas bcings nas ring du lon pa zhig/ nu'i nang du drangs la rdzas der bsdus
201b3(brgyad stong): gang zhig khal gyis non pa'i nang du zhugs par gyur na/ rab 'byor gru da ni 'di lta ste/ 'di lta bur 'jig par
201b4(brgyad stong): chos can du 'gyur// rol tu ma brgal bar de'i rdzas kyang gzhan du gyur la/ gru
201b5(brgyad stong): de yang gzhan du 'gro bar rig par bya'o// de ltar ded dpon thabs mi mkhas pa/ 'chal pa'i shes
201b6(brgyad stong): rab can de// nor chen po dang bral ba dang phrad par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po las yongs su nyams par

201b8(brgyad stong): nga'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod/ bzod pa yod/ sradang yod/ 'dun pa yodabartson 'grus
202a1(brgyad stong): // yod/ pag byed pa yod/ mos pa yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yeng/ gtong ba yed/ gus par byed pa yod/ dga' ba yod/ dang ba yid/ mchog tu dga' ba yod

202a5(brgyad stong): par bcings/ mig chags bya ba legs par byas na sa/ bcos par bya ba legs par bcos te/ chu 'i nang du drangs nas/ rdzas bslus te gang bar byas nas/ 
202a6(brgyad stong): legs par bshams shing 'thun pa'i rlung dang sbyar te/ de gang du 'gro 'dod pa'i phyogs su mthar gyis song na/ rab 'byor gru de ni chus 'jig par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang du
202a7(brgyad stong): 'gro bar bya ba'i phyogs der phyin par 'gyur zhing / ded dpon de yang 'jig rten gyi rin po che chen po chad pa 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi rin po che dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba

202b1(brgyad stong): bar dad pa yod/ bzod pa yod/ sred pa yod/ bdun pa yod/ brtson 'grus yod/ bag byed pa yod/ mos pa yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/ gtong ba yod/ gus par byed pa yod/

202b5(brgyad stong): po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la/ dad pa yod/ bzod pa yod/ sred pa yod/ 'dun pa yod

202b7(brgyad stong): 'grus mi gtong ba'ang yod la/ de'i chos 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral na/ de ni gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa
202b8(brgyad stong): nyid du 'gyur ba'i chos mngon du byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
203a1(brgyad stong): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar me sgrub bo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu 'ga' zhig skyes nas/ lo brgya nyi shu lon pa zhig rgan po rgas shing 'khogs par
203a2(brgyad stong): gyur la/ de lus la rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis btab na/ rab 'byor 'di ji
203a3(brgyad stong): snyam du sems// skyes bu de ma bteg par khri las ldang nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
203a4(brgyad stong): rang 'byor gal te spris bu de khri las ldang nus pa re gyur kyang / de rgas pa de dang nad nges 'khogs pas/ rgyang grags gcig sred dem/ rgyang grags gnyis srid du
203a5(brgyad stong): 'gro bar bya ba'i mthu med do// gal te skyes bu de khri las ljang nus kyang 'gro bar bya ba'i mthu med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
203a6(brgyad stong): chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar bya bar/ dang ba yod pa dang / bzod pa yod pa dang / sred pa yod pa dang / 'du
203a7(brgyad stong): ba yod pa dang / brtson 'grus yod pa dang / dang ba yod pa dang / mos pa yod pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang / gtong ba yod pa dang / bla mar byed pa yod pa dang / dag
203a8(brgyad stong): ba yod pa dang / bag byed pa yod pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba yod pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba yod par gyur kyang / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung
203b1(brgyad stong): zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la/ yang dag par zhugs su zin kyang
203b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni bar ma dor zhum par 'gyur zhing yi bsad nas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par
203b3(brgyad stong): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyi'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes
203b4(brgyad stong): bu skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon par gyur pa/ rgan po rgas shing 'khogs pa de nyid lus la rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las
203b5(brgyad stong): gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis btab pa de'i g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs gnyi sa nas/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis legs par
203b6(brgyad stong): brten cing 'jur bcug ste legs par bzung nas/ de la 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu khyod gang du 'gro bar bya ba'i gnas der khyod kyis ma phyin gyi bar du khyod kho bo cag
203b7(brgyad stong): gnyis kyis brten pas/ 'am du bar ma dor rdeg 'chos nga'i 'jigs der mi 'gyur gyis/ khyod gang du 'gro 'dod par song shig ces bsgon// de khrid las ldang nus par
203b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byab
204a1(brgyad stong): / la dad pa yod pa dang / bzod pa yod pa dang / sred pa yod pa dang / 'dun pa yod pa dang / brtson 'grus yod pa dang / dang ba yod pa dang / mos pa yod pa dang / lhag nga'i bsam
204a2(brgyad stong): pa yod pa dang / gtong ba yod pa dang / bla mar byed pa yod pa dang / bag byed pa yod pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba yod pa dang / brtson pa mi gtong ba yod par gyur la/ de shes rab kyi
204a3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pas/ yongs su bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bar gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bar ma dor zhum par mi 'gyur/ 
204a4(brgyad stong): yi gsod par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ 'di lta ste/ de'i gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas rjes su
204a5(brgyad stong): 'thob par rig par bya'o// dpa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di
204a6(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// las dang po pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar
204a7(brgyad stong): bslab par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
204a8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po// las dang po pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen par bya/ bstan par bya'o// bsnyen bkur bya'o// gang
204b1(brgyad stong): ngag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'doms shing ston par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la lung 'bogs pa de dag ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
204b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar lung 'bog ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/ sbyin pa gang dang gang
204b3(brgyad stong): sbyin pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su
204b4(brgyad stong): ma sems shig/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / du byed rnams dang / rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par shes
204b5(brgyad stong): par ma sems shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi snyems pa ste/ de ltar tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba dang / bzod pa gang dang gang
204b6(brgyad stong): bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus gang dang gang rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang gang mnyam par gzhog pa dang / rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab gang dang gang yongasu byang bar byed pa
204b7(brgyad stong): de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su ma sem
204b8(brgyad stong): shig/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rnam par shes par ma sems shig/ de
205a1(brgyad stong): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa ni ma snyems pa ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'dod par ma byed cig ces/ rab
205a2(brgyad stong): 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis mthar gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhug par bya'o// rab
205a3(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs shing / 
205a4(brgyad stong): lta bu'i sbyin pa la brten/ de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang / de lta bu'i bzod pa dang / de lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang // de lta bu'i bsam gtan dang / de lta bu'i shes rab la brten
205a5(brgyad stong): nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rang dbang du gyur pa mi 'tshal zhing // sems can gyi khams shin tu sdug bsngal ba mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
205a6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'tshal te/ 'khor bas skrag par mi bgyid pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
205a7(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig rten la phan
205a8(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi skyob par 'gyur
205b1(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi skyab su 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten
205b2(brgyad stong): gyi snang bar 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur bar bya'o// snyam ste/ de ltar byang chub tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dka' ba byed
205b3(brgyad stong): pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi skyob par
205b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'khor ba na yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed pa de dag las de skyob par byed cing / sdug bsngal de dag spang ba'i phyir 'bad par byed do// rab 'byor de
205b5(brgyad stong): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi sgrub
205b6(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
205b7(brgyad stong): nas 'jig rten gyi gnas su 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sbyor ba med par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can
205b8(brgyad stong): rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na sbyor ba ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
206a1(brgyad stong): // gang gzugs la sbyor ba med cing 'brel pa med pa de ni/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'o// gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa gang
206a2(brgyad stong): yin pa de ni/ gzugs la sbyor ba med pa'o// gang gzugs la sbyor ba med pa de ni/ gzugs la 'brel pa med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyang
206a3(brgyad stong): de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la sbyor ba med cing 'brel pa gang yin pa de ni// rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med de'o// gang rnam par
206a4(brgyad stong): shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa de ni// rnam par shes pa la sbyor ba med pa'o// gang rnam par shes pa la sbyor ba med pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa
206a5(brgyad stong): la 'brel pa med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na chos tham sa cad la sbyor ba med pa/ 'brel pa med pa ste/ rab 'byo ra de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
206a6(brgyad stong): bo/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi gnas su 'gyur ba yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems
206a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi skyabs su 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor sems
206a8(brgyad stong): can gang skye ba'i chos can/ rga ba'i chos can/ na ba'i chos can// 'chi ba'i chos can/ mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 
206b1(brgyad stong): 'khrug pa'i chos can de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams las
206b2(brgyad stong): yongasu thar par byed de/ de ltar na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
206b3(brgyad stong): nas 'jig rten gyi skyabasu 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
206b4(brgyad stong): rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ rab 'byor pha rol ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te/ 
206b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed na/ mes dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa doni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rab 'byor
206b6(brgyad stong): rol ji lta ba bzhin rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin te/ rab 'byor gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol ji lta ba ches
206b7(brgyad stong): thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
206b8(brgyad stong): pha rol ji lta ba chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
207a1(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas pa ma lags sam/ dpa'i phyir she na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis pa'i slang du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis

207a5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos 'di dag bstan par bya'o// ba tu shang bar bya'o mas nas 'dzin byang chub sems pa

207b1(brgyad stong): dus yongs su bskor ba ni gleng nas byaste/  byor da bzhin du gzugs ldan gyi mapa' dang phyi ma'i mthar 'ongs kyang nga'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /

207b7(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang / ling tog gis yongasu khebs pa'i sems can mun pas zil gyi non pa
207b8(brgyad stong): rnams shes rab kyis snang bar byed cing ma rig pa'i mi snang ba'i mun pa mun nag med par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
208a1(brgyad stong): / rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub
