208b4(brgyad stong): chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang na mkha'i rten ca no// zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro// rab
208b5(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad na mkha'i rten rtsan de 'ong ba med/ 'gre ba med pa/ na mkha' dang ma chungs pa ste/ ji ltar na mkha' 'ong ba med pa/ song ba mang
208b6(brgyad stong): pa/ ma byas pa/ mi gnas pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang na mkha' la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir
208b7(brgyad stong): rnam par mi rtog pa'o// de cing byer zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra
208b8(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi stong po nyid ni 'gro ba
209a1(brgyad stong): // 'am 'ong ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rten can te/ chos de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad
209a2(brgyad stong): cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams
209a3(brgyad stong): cad ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'byung ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'anga'o// rab
209a4(brgyad stong): 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i rten can te/ deng ngag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las
209a5(brgyad stong): mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam gyite/ na can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/ bdag gi rten can te/ 
209a6(brgyad stong): dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mu med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhi ba'i rten can te/ de
209a7(brgyad stong): dag rten de las mi 'do'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbyung
209a8(brgyad stong): du med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor ches thams
209b1(brgyad stong): cad ni 'gro ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor thams cad ni rab tu zhi ba'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
209b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su dag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
209b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po/ gang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du spyad pa de dag gi shes par 'gyur te/ byang chub
209b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par rig par bya'o// 
209b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'tshal
209b6(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo 'ang ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes
209b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ 'dul ba dben pa'i rang bzhin can no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
209b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de dag ji lta bu'i rten can len lags sam/ rten de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can dag la/ 
210a1(brgyad stong): yang rten 'di nyid ston par 'gyur zhing / de dag de ltar sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur pa lags sam/ de skad ces gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
210a2(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'di lta bu'i rten can du
210a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// dzin 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dag la rten 'di dag ston par 'gyur te/ de ltar 'di dag sems can rnams kyi can dur gyur/ 
210a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can
210a5(brgyad stong): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gi rten du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems ca na grangs ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa dag
210a6(brgyad stong): yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o zhes go cha 'di bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
210a7(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las
210a8(brgyad stong): bzla'o zhes gang gis go cha 'di bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' ba byed pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go chad
210b1(brgyad stong): ni/ gzugs dang 'brel ba yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 'brel pa yang
210b2(brgyad stong): ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du
210b3(brgyad stong): 'brel pa yang ma yin// sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin// sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'bral pa yang ma yan/ sangs rgyas sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yino// de ci'i phyir
210b4(brgyad stong): zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa'i go cha 'di ni/ chos thams cad dang ma brel pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
210b5(brgyad stong): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar spyod pa de gnas gsum la re bar mi bgyi
210b6(brgyad stong): ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
210b7(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa shes rab
210b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar spyod pa de gnas gsum la re bar mi bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi
211a1(brgyad stong): / sa'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de ni sus kyang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ su yang mi bsgom
211a2(brgyad stong): su yang sgom par mi 'gyur/ gang la yang bsgom par bgyi ba ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang yang yongs
211a3(brgyad stong): grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ang ni namakha' sgom pa lag so// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
211a4(brgyad stong): ral tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad sgom pa lag so// / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ ma chags pa bsgom pa lags so// 'di lta ste/ 
211a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ mtha'ayas pa sgom pa lags so// 'di lta ste/ she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po ma
211a6(brgyad stong): mchis pa sgom pa lags so// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa sgom pa lags so// de skad ces gsol
211a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa zab mo
211a8(brgyad stong): 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las drir mi ldog par brtag par bya'o// ra
211b1(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / la la gzhan gyis smras pa dang / gzhan gyis sle ba
211b2(brgyad stong): dag la mngon par mi zhen pa dang / la la pha rol gyi dad pa'i phyir mi 'brang ba dang / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
211b3(brgyad stong): bshad pa la mi zhum mi 'gong / mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi byed/ nem nur mi byed/ the tsom mi za// rmongs par mi 'gyur zhing / rtog par byed/ mos par byed de/ shes
211b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba dang / thos par dag/ 'an/ rab 'byor 'odas sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs dris par rig par bya'o// detsa
211b5(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa la mi skrag mi dang zhing nga ngang bar yang mi byed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
211b6(brgyad stong): ba bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi bgyid na/ bcom
211b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rgyu gang gis des shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bye brag tu rtags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa la gzhol
211b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bye brag tu brtags pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar
212a1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud bye brag tu brtags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer nam kha' la gzhol
212a2(brgyad stong): ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / rab 'byor na mkha' la bab pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud bye brag tu brtags pa yin no// ra
212a3(brgyad stong): 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis bye brag tu brtags pa gang yin pa de ni/ bye brag tu brtags pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams
212a4(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu med pa'o// rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni tshad med pa'o// rab 'byor dpag tu med pa dang / chad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs
212a5(brgyad stong): ma yin// tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yi na/ 'thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa
212a6(brgyad stong): ma yin/ khong du chud pa ma yin/ lam ma yin/ lam gyi 'bras bu ma yin/ ye shes ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ skye ba ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin// 
212a7(brgyad stong): 'byung ba ma yin/ 'grib pa ma yin// 'gag pa ma yin/ sgom pa ma yin/ rnam par bsgom pa ma yin te/ sus kyang ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs
212a8(brgyad stong): gang du yang mi 'gro ba/ yul gang du yang ma yin/ phyogs gang du yang ma yin/ gang du yang mi gnas te/ gzhan gzhan du na dpag tu med pa tshad med pa
212b1(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro'o// na mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sus kyang
212b2(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin/ tshor bas ma yin/ 'du shes kyis ma yin// 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin/ rnam par
212b3(brgyad stong): shes pas ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
212b4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pas ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma
212b5(brgyad stong): nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// de bzhin du tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed nyid rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam pa
212b6(brgyad stong): shes pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / 
212b7(brgyad stong): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni tha
212b8(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams
213a1(brgyad stong): te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong su lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mag bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bsgo
213a2(brgyad stong): byas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams su bcas pa dang / mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa
213a3(brgyad stong): yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// bcom ldan 'das
213a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gtang dpag dka' ste/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
213a5(brgyad stong): byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa na/ brtson pa chung ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa la gzhol bar ma mdzad// de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
213a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad
213a7(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin to/ lha'i bu dag a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo// lha'i bu dag a la la shes rab kyi pha rol
213a8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag dka' ba ste/ don 'di nyid gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ byang chub kyi
213b1(brgyad stong): snying po la bzhugs pa na/ brtson pa chung ba la sems gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos ston pa la gzhol bar mdzad do// a la la chos zab mo 'di ni ngas mngon par rdzogs
213b2(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas te/ sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/ su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur/ su yang mngon par rdzogs par
213b3(brgyad stong): 'chang mi rgya ste/ 'di ni chos kyi zab pa de yin te/ nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zabo// chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// chos thams cad
213b4(brgyad stong): 'gro ba med pa'i phyir chos 'di za'o// chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa'i phyir chos 'di za'o// zhes ngas ma don par sangs rgyaso// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
213b5(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag dang / mi mjed kyi bang ga po tshangs pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu
213b6(brgyad stong): ngag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni/ 'jig rten thams cad
213b7(brgyad stong): dang mi mthun par bstan to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa lags na/ 'jig rten dag ni 'dzin pa la spyod do// lha'i dbang po'i
213b8(brgyad stong): le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa// bam po brtsi
214a1(brgyad stong): dem na das pa tsha lda pa rdzu sa na / ma mas la/  sa/ 
214a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis so// kye ma bcom ldan 'das na mkha' dang mtshungs pas gnas thams cad du dmigasu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos
214a3(brgyad stong): 'di ni thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// kye ma bcom ldan 'das gnyi su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// kye ma bcom
214a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rgol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'a de ni zla ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// kye ma bcom ldan 'das mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di
214a5(brgyad stong): ni rjes ma mchis so// kye ma bcom ldan 'das skye pa thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'odoni 'byung ba ma mchis pa'o// kye ma bcom ldan 'das
214a6(brgyad stong): lam thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du// chos 'di ma ma mchis pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod
214a7(brgyad stong): ba dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos 'phags pa gnas brtan rab 'byor
214a8(brgyad stong): 'di ni rjesu 'thun par skyes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang dang gang ston pa/ chos de dang de nyid la brtsams te ston pa'i
214b1(brgyad stong): slad du'o/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lnga'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di
214b2(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu 'thun par skyes so// zhes smras pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gnas
214b3(brgyad stong): brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu 'thun par skyes so// gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjesu song ba'o// ji ltar
214b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'ong ba'ang med song ba yang med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'a byor yang de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song zhing song ba yang
214b5(brgyad stong): med de/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni dang po nas de ba zhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhi na gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ches
214b6(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
214b7(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid de/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su
214b8(brgyad stong): song ba'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu song ba ste/ de bzhin nyid de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes
215a1(brgyad stong): // su skyes pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyi gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa des/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
215a2(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba med pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor kyang / de bzhin nyid
215a3(brgyad stong): des 'gyur ba med/ rnam par 'gyur ba med/ rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
215a4(brgyad stong): gang la yang / thogs pa med pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med// rnam par 'gyur ba med/ rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med do// 
215a5(brgyad stong): gang la yang thogs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de
215a6(brgyad stong): bzhin 'dadi ni gcig ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// gnyi su med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang du yang de bzhin nyid ma yin/ gang na yang de bzhin nyid ma yin
215a7(brgyad stong): gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin/ 'di ltar gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir// de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis su med pa ste/ gnyi su med pa'i de bzhin 'di na
215a8(brgyad stong): gnyis su dbyer med do// de ltar na gnas brtan rang 'byor ni ma byas pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su 'thun par smras te/ ma byas pa'i de bzhin
215b1(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ni/ nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ltar de nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis su med de/ 
215b2(brgyad stong): gnyi su med pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyi su byar med do// de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes so// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
215b3(brgyad stong): nyid dus thams cad du chos thams cad la mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang chos thams cad la mi rtog rnam par ma
215b4(brgyad stong): rtog go// de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par sprul pa ste/ 'byed pa med nga'i phyir 'di ni tha dad pa ma yin zhing gzhig tu med pa'o// 
215b5(brgyad stong): ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i rjesu skyes so// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs bI de bzhin nyid ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las de
215b6(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid gud na med de/ de gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid de ni// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid// de bzhin nyid la gnas brtan rab 'byor
215b7(brgyad stong): gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rje su 'gro bar 'a bar song ste/ 'di la gang yang gang du yang rje su 'gro bas nye bar song ba med do// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni
215b8(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes so// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa yang ma yin// ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin// da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de
216a1(brgyad stong): / bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin kyang 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ltar gnas gan pa byor kyang de bzhin
216a2(brgyad stong): deng rjes skyes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin med kyi rjesu song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin med kyis 'das pa'i
216a3(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid kyis rjesu song ngo // 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjesu song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ma 'ongs par
216a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid kyis rjesu song ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i de ba zhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi sa rje su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ 
216a5(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjesu song ngo // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjes song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
216a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjesu song ngo // 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin
216a7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rje su song ste/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis de bzhin nyid dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 
216a8(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyisu med de gnyis dbyer med do// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis
216b1(brgyad stong): meng de gnyis su dbyer med do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
216b2(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yang de bzhin nyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin nyid gang gis bla na med pa yang dag
216b3(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid 'di bstan pa na/ de
216b4(brgyad stong): tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba bzhin du/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab
216b5(brgyad stong): tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur to// de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor
216b6(brgyad stong): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyeso// gzhan yang gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjesu ma skyes te/ tshor ba'i ma yin/ 'du shes kyi ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi ma
216b7(brgyad stong): yin rnam par shes pa'i rjesu ma skye so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rjesu ma skyes te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma yin/ dgra bcom
216b8(brgyad stong): nga nyid kyi 'bras bu'i rje su ma skyes// rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi rjesu ma skyes/ sangs rgyas nyid kyis rje su ma skyes te/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes skyeso// 
217a1(brgyad stong): de na pas paka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan das la cha dang ldan pa shA ro'-i bus 'di skad ces gsal te// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ de bzhin 'ad 'di ni spyad ba zab mo
217a2(brgyad stong): lagaso// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu da
217a3(brgyad stong): ltar de bzhin nyid 'di spyad pa zab mo yin no// de bzhin nyid bstan pa bshad pa na/ dge slong sum brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong
217a4(brgyad stong): ma lnga brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag/ lha'i bu lnga stong sngon yongasu snang ba byas pa dag gis mi skye ba'i ches la
217a5(brgyad stong): bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' drug cu len pa med par zag pa rnams las sem sa rnam par grolo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
217a6(brgyad stong): ba shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni// sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas shing thams cad la sbyin pa byin// tshul khrims bsrungs
217a7(brgyad stong): bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan dag bskyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang / bral bar gyur
217a8(brgyad stong): to/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma med pa la spyod kyang / smon pa med pa yid la byed pa yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag thabs la
217b1(brgyad stong): mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon gsum du byas nas/ nyan thos kyi sa nges par skyes sa// shA ri'i bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ mdab chags bya zhigs
217b2(brgyad stong): lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa 'am/ dpag chad lnga brgya pa tsam du gyur pa zhig yod
217b3(brgyad stong): de des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du 'dug pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'gro snyam du sems na/ shA ri'i bu mngab chags bya de mdab ma ma skyes pa 'am/ mngab mthi
217b4(brgyad stong): gyur lang de 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gnas par bya'o// snyam du bsams te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs nas/ mdab chags byi de de nas lhung ba dang / nam
217b5(brgyad stong): mkha'i bar snang la gnas pa'i bar der/ 'di snyam du kye ma'o bdag phyir sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i na nga du gnas par bya'o// snyam du sems na shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam
217b6(brgyad stong): du sems 'dab chags bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du gnas par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
217b7(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu gal te yang 'di snyam du bdag ni ma smas ma snang bar 'dzam+ba'i gling du gnas par bya'o snyam na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ mdab chags bya dam smas ma snang bar
217b8(brgyad stong): 'dzam+bu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni me lag so// bcom ldan 'das de 'dzam bu'i gling du lhung nas/ smras shing snad par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa
218a1(brgyad stong): 'am/ 'gum pa la thug pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal du 'gyuro// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dor lus kyang chen por gyur la/ mngab ma yang ma mchis
218a2(brgyad stong): par gyur la/ mthon po zhig nas lhung bar gyur pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
218a3(brgyad stong): ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bska
218a4(brgyad stong): ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas shing / sbyin ba byin// tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzad pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan la me'am par gnas
218a5(brgyad stong): ste de rgya cher yang dag par zhugs par gyur cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar de'i sems cher bskyed par
218a6(brgyad stong): gyur kyang / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma zin cing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral na/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
218a7(brgyad stong): dpar sems dpa' chen po 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims de dang / ting 'dzin de dang / shes rab de dang / rnam
218a8(brgyad stong): bar grol pa dang rnam par tshul ba'i ye shes mthong ba de dag sa tshan mi'i tshul gyis sems shing spres kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes / 
218b1(brgyad stong): tingange 'dzin ma yin/ shes rab ma yin rnam par grol ba ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
218b2(brgyad stong): mthong ba mi shes te/ des ma shes ma mthong bas/ stong pa nyid kyi sgra nyan la des sgra de la mtshan mar 'dzin cing // des sgra de mtshan mar gzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
218b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar 'dod na/ de'i phyir 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i
218b4(brgyad stong): bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma ba zung zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pa de ni 'ji ltar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
218b5(brgyad stong): bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal pa ltar/ byang chu ba sems dpa' gang bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu mang ba dang ldan du lags kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
218b6(brgyad stong): phyin pas yongasu ma bzung la/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma ldan na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob pa la the tsom du 'gyur te/ 
218b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas// 
218b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi/ thabs mkhas pa la brtson par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
219a1(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to// shA ro bu de de bzhin// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma bzung ning
219a2(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa dang / bral ba/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mang po dang ldan pa yang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar gyur na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob
219a3(brgyad stong): pa de ni be com du 'gyur// shA ring bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
219a4(brgyad stong): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom par bya zhing / thabs mkhas pa la yang brtson par byar// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu
219a5(brgyad stong): rnams dang bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs po yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
219a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o// bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
219a7(brgyad stong): nga'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgyu ba shin tu 'byung bar dka'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa/ 'dod pa na spyang ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang / ma
219a8(brgyad stong): mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lga'i bu dag de de 'i zin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
219b1(brgyad stong): ni zab bo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka' ste/ shes rab 'chal pa dang / brtson 'grus dman pa dang / mos pa dma' ba dang / thabs la mi mkhas
219b2(brgyad stong): ba dang sdig pa'i grogs po la brten pa rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba shin tu 'byung bar dka'o// de nas
219b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung
219b4(brgyad stong): bar pa'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'byung bar shin tu dka'o// zhes bka' stsal na/ 'di ltar de la cung zad kyang
219b5(brgyad stong): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
219b6(brgyad stong): rgya ba 'byung bar dka' zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub shin tu 'thung bar dka' ba lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
219b7(brgyad stong): stong pa lags pa'i slad du/ chos thams cad gang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar nus pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchi so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ 
219b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos gang spang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos bstan pa'i chos de yang ma mchi so// de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
220a1(brgyad stong): // rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba gang lags pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba gang lags pa dang / 'tshal bar bgyi ba gang lags pa'i chos de dag thams cad na
220a2(brgyad stong): spong ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'das na/ bdag na 'di snyam du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba la/ mangs
220a3(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla ba lags te/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ma lags pa snyam bgyid// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
220a4(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'thung ba med pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dka'o// rab 'byor
220a5(brgyad stong): yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dka'o// rab 'byor rnam par ma sgrubs pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang
220a6(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dka'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor stong pa zhes
220a7(brgyad stong): bya ba'i rnam grangs 'dis// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung bar dka'o// bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya
220a8(brgyad stong): bar shin tu 'thung bar dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor na mkha' 'di snyam du bdag gis// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
220b1(brgyad stong): par 'tshang brgya bar bya'o// snyam du mi sems te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
220b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i dri ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
220b3(brgyad stong): rgya bar skar zin na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sred/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
220b4(brgyad stong): 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta
220b5(brgyad stong): bas na/ 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub 'byung bar dkar zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
220b6(brgyad stong): shin tu 'byung bar dka'o zhes rig par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci gzugs
220b7(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog gam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yinano// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
220b8(brgyad stong): ci bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gang phyir ldog pa'i chos de gzugs las gzhan na yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin// 
221a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
221a2(brgyad stong): las phyir mi ldog gam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
221a3(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i chos de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams las gzhan na yod dam/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa
221a4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci gzugs kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
221a5(brgyad stong): nga'i byang chub las phyir ldog gam/ shA ri'i bus smras pe/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yi no// rab 'a byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba'i
221a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin gang yin pa de
221a7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog gam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
221a8(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ci bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gang phyir ldog pa'i chos de yang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan na yod dam/ shA ri
221b1(brgyad stong): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gang phyir ldog pa'i
221b2(brgyad stong): chos de tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan na yod dam/ shA ri'i bus
221b3(brgyad stong): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci gzugs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
221b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe da nga ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// rab 'byor gyis smra sa pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ci tsher ba dang / 'du shes
221b5(brgyad stong): dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bla na med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog sa par 'tshang rgya 'am/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ che dang
221b6(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de gzu
221b7(brgyad stong): las gzhan na yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
221b8(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams las gzhan na yod dam/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yod dam/ 
222a1(brgyad stong): / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid bla na med pa yang dag par
222a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
222a3(brgyad stong): ri'i bu// ci tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ci rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
222a4(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdo na par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// rab 'byor
222a5(brgyad stong): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gang yin pa de/ gzugs
222a6(brgyad stong): kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan na yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci bla na med pa yang
222a7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gnan
222a8(brgyad stong): na yod dam/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan na yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
222b1(brgyad stong): bu ci gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de gzugs las gzhan na yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
222b2(brgyad stong): de ni ma yino// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de/ tshor ba
222b3(brgyad stong): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams las gzhan na yod dam/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yod dam/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
222b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ni ma yino// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang lnga na pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin 'ang bla na me da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog gam/ 
222b5(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yi no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
222b6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i chos de de bzhin nyid la yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang
222b7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i chos de gang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i chos de gang yin/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin
222b8(brgyad stong): shing ma yin pa'i chos de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci de bzhin nyid phyir ldog par 'gyur ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
223a1(brgyad stong): me dang ldan pa shAr bu ltar bden pa'ang dang / gnas pa nyid du chos thams cad dmig su med pa la/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyim rdza/ 
223a2(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// chos kyi tshul rnam pa gang gis tshe dang ldan pa
223a3(brgyad stong): gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bshad pa ltar na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gang phyir ldog pa'i chos gang yang medo// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang zag byang
223a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gsum du gsungs pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'a gcig tu zad kyi/ 
223a5(brgyad stong): ngag gsum du rnam par gzhag pa med/ dzi dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bstan pa ban no// de nas tshadang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos// tshe dang ldan pa rang gyur
223a6(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yod par khas mi len na ni// gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod la dri ba yong
223a7(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// rab 'byor ci nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa
223a8(brgyad stong): chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yod par khyod khas mi len tam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
223b1(brgyad stong): de la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjesu mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 
223b2(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// de bzhin nyid rnam pa gsum du dmigasu med na/ byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
223b3(brgyad stong): ri'i bu de bzhin nyid rnam pa gcig tu yang dmigasu yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe
223b4(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci khyod kyis de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i gcig kyang yang dag par rje su mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
223b5(brgyad stong): 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar bden pa nyid dang gnas pa nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i chos de yang dmigasu
223b6(brgyad stong): med ma khyod ci'i phyir 'di snyam du 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa can/ 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can/ 'di ni theg pa chen po pa snyam du sems/ shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub se
223b7(brgyad stong): dpa' 'di dag de bzhin nyid la rab tu rnam par 'byed na/ khyad par med pa dang / bye brag med pa dang / tha dad du bya ba med par thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
223b8(brgyad stong): po gang sems zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nges par 'byung bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ched
224a1(brgyad stong): // ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor khyod 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi
224a2(brgyad stong): byin gyis brlabs kyis khyod de skad du smra bar spobs pa de ni/ rab 'byor legs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin nyid la rab tu rnam par 'byed na/ khyad par med pa dang / 
224a3(brgyad stong): brag med pa dang / tha dad du bya ba med par thos nas/ sems zhum pa med/ kun tu zhum pa med na// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub la nges par
224a4(brgyad stong): 'byung bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a ngas byang chub gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
224a5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'di nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis/ byang chub
224a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po 'ang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
224a7(brgyad stong): chen po/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
224a8(brgyad stong): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas/ sems can thams cad la mtsham par
224b1(brgyad stong): gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par bskyed par bya ste/ mi mnyam pa'i sems kyis gzhan la smra bar mi bya/ byams pa'i sems kyis gzhan la smra bar bya/ pa
224b2(brgyad stong): pa'i sems kyis gzhan la smra bar bya/ dge ba'i sems kyis gzhan la smra bar bya/ nga rgyal bcag pa'i sems kyis gzhan la smra bar bya/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis gzhan
224b3(brgyad stong): la smra bar bya// rnam par 'tshe ba med pa'i sems kyis gzhan la smra bar bya/ tho 'tsham pa med pa'i sems kyis gzhan la smra bar bye// sems can thams cad la bar 'du shes pa dang / 
224b4(brgyad stong): mar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa nye bur gzhag ste/ gzhan la smra bar bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla
224b5(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ sems can thams cad la de ltar gnas par bya// de ltar bslab par bya ste/ 
224b6(brgyad stong): bdag sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur par gnas par bya'o// de bzhin nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
224b7(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa gang dag lags/ rtags gang
224b8(brgyad stong): ngag lags/ mtshan ma gang dag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag par 'tshal bar bgyi
225a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor so so'i skye bo'i sa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi sa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gang yin pa
225a2(brgyad stong): de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa zhes bya ste/ 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin nyid la gnyi su red de gnyisu dbyer med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyid de la
225a3(brgyad stong): chos kyi de bzhin nyid du 'jug ste/ de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / de bzhin nyid la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste// de bzhin du 'jug cing / de bzhin nyid du zhugs pas/ 
225a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin thos nas kyang / de las 'gal bar 'di lta ma yin no zhes nem nur mi bya da be tsom mi za zhing / 'di ni de bzhin// de ni 'di lta'o// 
225a5(brgyad stong): zhes mos par byed/ khong du chud par byed de/ gyi mngar smra bar mi 'gyur gyi don dang ldan pa'i rig tu smra ste/ don dang mi ldan pa ma yin/ pha rol gyis byas pa dang /

225a7(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po no// dge sbyong dang / 
225a8(brgyad stong): bram ze khyod 'di dag ni/ shes par bya ba shes so// blta bar bya ba mthong ngo zhes dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gi ngor mi lta ste/ lha gzhan dag la phyag mi 'tshal/ lha gzhan
225b1(brgyad stong): la me tog dang / bdug dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag sbyin par mi sems shing / lha gzhan dag la

225b5(brgyad stong): nyid kyang srog gcod pa spangs pa yin te/ gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag par mdzad// / bdag nyid kyang ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin te/ 
225b6(brgyad stong): gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag ngar 'dzud// bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin te/ gzhan yang 'dod pa la log
225b7(brgyad stong): par g.yem pa spong ba la yang dag par 'dzud// bdag nyid kyang brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin te/ gzhan yang brdzun du smra ba spong ba la yang dag par 'dzud do// bdag
225b8(brgyad stong): nyid kyang bram zer ba spangs pa yin te/ gzhan yang bram zer ba spong ba la yang dag par mdzad do// bdag nyid kyang tshig rtsub mo smra ba spangs pa yin te/ gzhan yang
226a1(brgyad stong): / tshig nub mo smra ba spong ba la yang dag par 'dzud do// bdag nyid kyang tshig kyal ba smra ba spangs pa yin te/ gzhan yang tshig kyal pa smra ba spong ba la yang dag par mdzad do// bdag
226a2(brgyad stong): nyid kyang rnab sems spangs pa yin te/ gzhan yang brnab sems spong ba la yang dag par mdzad do// bdag nyid kyang gnod sems spangs pa yin te/ gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba
226a3(brgyad stong): la yang dag par 'dzud do// bdag nyid kyang log par lta ba spangs pa yin te/ gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par 'dzud do// rab 'byor de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
226a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/ bdag nyid kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs nas gnas// gzhan yang dge ba bcu'i lam rnams
226a5(brgyad stong): la yang dag par mdzad/ yang dag par ston/ yang dag par ga zeng bstod do// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed/ brtan par byed de/ de la rmi lam du ya mi dge ba bcu'i
226a6(brgyad stong): las kyi lam rnams gcig gam/ mang du yang rung ste/ yong ye mi 'byung zhing sems kyis kyang mi spyod de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i rmi lam
226a7(brgyad stong): du yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi rnams mngon du 'gyur te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa

226b1(brgyad stong): chen po ni chos gang dang gang sems la kun chub par byed pa de dang de nyid sems la kun chub par byed de/ chos 'di dag gis kun chub par byed pa 'dis/ sems can thams cad la
226b2(brgyad stong): phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig/ chos bstan pa 'dis kyang sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ ces chos kyi sbyin pa de yang sems can thang dang
226b3(brgyad stong): mthun mong du byed de/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
