272b5(brgyad stong): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen par bya/ bster par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang byang chub sems dpa
272b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs shing / bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas
272b7(brgyad stong): dang po kho nar dge ba'i bshes gnyer la bsnyen par bgyi ba dang / bsten par bgyi ba dang / bsnyer bkur bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
272b8(brgyad stong): ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags par 'tshal bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
273a1(brgyad stong): // stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mkhas
273a2(brgyad stong): pa/ gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag legs par 'chad cing ston pa dang / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chang cing ston pa de dag ni/ rab 'byor byang chu
273a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyer rig par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
273a4(brgyad stong): dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
273a5(brgyad stong): gnyen du rig par bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni so/ ra pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni lam mo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ri snang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni sbyor
273a6(brgyad stong): ma'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni 'od // pha rol tu phyin pa drug ri gnaso// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni mgor ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni srung so// pha rol ji pyid pa drug ri dpung gcin
273a7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni gling ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ra'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni pa'o// pha rol tu phyid pa drug de shes par bya ba dang / kur chub par bya ba dang / bla na med pa
273a8(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir bsgrub par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyi
273b1(brgyad stong): te rab 'byor gang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
273b2(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol
273b3(brgyad stong): phyin pa drug po 'di dag las skye so// rab 'byor gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
273b4(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
273b5(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag las skye'o// rab 'byor gang dag 'jig rter gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab dag ra/ de
273b6(brgyad stong): bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
273b7(brgyad stong): nas bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po las skye so// rab 'byor de ltar
273b8(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga yang / bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ nga'i
274a1(brgyad stong): / thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin ba drug po 'di dag las skye so// rab 'byor ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi rang ma byang
274a2(brgyad stong): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams 'du so// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / rang byung
274a3(brgyad stong): gi ye shes dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang / gzhal du med pa'i ye shes dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ pha rol tu
274a4(brgyad stong): phyin pa drug gi nang du 'du so// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par shes par
274a5(brgyad stong): bya'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug po nyid ston pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni lam mo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni sgron ma'o// pha rol tu
274a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa drug ni 'ad do// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni gnas so// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni mgon no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyab so// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni dpung gnyer
274a7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni gling ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ma'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni shes pa dang / byang chub pa dang / thams cad mkhyer pa
274a8(brgyad stong): nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir bsgrubs par 'gyuraro// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyi
274b1(brgyad stong): pa drug la slob pa na/ lan glan mi nus pa'i sems can thams cad la yang de phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba yi no// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob
274b2(brgyad stong): par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun
274b3(brgyad stong): chub par bya/ rab tu 'don par bya/ don dang / tshul gyis yongasu brtag par bya/ nye bar bsam par bya/ dri bar bya/ 'drir gzhug par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes
274b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi sngon du 'gro ba'o// 'dren pa'o// rab tu 'dren pa'o// yang dag par stor pa'o// kun tu
274b5(brgyad stong): ston pa'o// skyed pa'o// ma ma'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga mi sdang zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang
274b6(brgyad stong): thob par mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas
274b7(brgyad stong): par 'dod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid gang
274b8(brgyad stong): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir ba ni
275a1(brgyad stong): // chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chags pa/ ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
275a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin ma chis par 'gyur ba'i chags pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das
275a3(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par 'gyur ba'i chags
275a4(brgyad stong): pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad kyang yod par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ chos thams cad ni dben pa'i// rab 'byor
275a5(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ rab 'byor de lta bas na chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / stong par 'gyur
275a6(brgyad stong): nga'i chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad ni dben pa dang stong pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad
275a7(brgyad stong): dben pa dang stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa gda' bar 'gyur/ ji ltar rnam par byang bar 'gyur/ 
275a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das stong pa ni kun nas nyon mongs
275b1(brgyad stong): par yang mi 'gyur ro// rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das dben pa 'am/ stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
275b2(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyal/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa dang / stong pa nyid las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
275b3(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de dmigasu ma mchis na/ 
275b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bshad pa 'di'i don ji lta bur 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ de skad ces
275b5(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sems can rnams
275b6(brgyad stong): ni yun ring po nas/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la spyod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhi no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ 
275b7(brgyad stong): sems can rnams ni yun ring po nas/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'on
275b8(brgyad stong): kyang ngar 'dzin pa dang / ngar yir 'dzin pa stong pa yin mod/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa lag so// bde bar gshegs pa stong pa lags
276a1(brgyad stong): // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pas sems can rnams 'khor bar 'khor ram/ 
276a2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhi no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pas sems can rnams 'khor ba na
276a3(brgyad stong): 'khor ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par yang snang ngo // rnam par byang bar yang snang ngo // ji
276a4(brgyad stong): lhur sems can rnams 'dzin pa dang / mngon par chag sa pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi 'di la gang yang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ni/ 
276a5(brgyad stong): med do// rab 'byor ji ltar 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med pa de ltar ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mi snang ste/ de bzhin du rab 'byor
276a6(brgyad stong): rnam par byang bar yang sdang ngo // ji ltar sems can rnams la 'dzin pa med cing mngon par chags pa med/ 'di la su yang rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ni med do// rab
276a7(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad stong zhing / thed dben pa
276a8(brgyad stong): la/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang snang ngo // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad stong zhi
276b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad dben pa la/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang gda' ba 'di ni ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' sems
276b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gzugs la mi spyod de/ tshor ba la ma lags/ 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed rnams la ma lags/ rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do// 
276b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
276b4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa tsa na thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can thams cad kyi spyod pa zil gyis gnon te/ zil gyis mi
276b5(brgyad stong): gnon pa'i gnas kyang 'thob bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sang sa rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyer pa nyid ni zil gyis mi non pa
276b6(brgyad stong): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyid pa de lta bu la gnas la/ yid
276b7(brgyad stong): la bgyid pa 'dis nyin mtshan 'da' bar bgyid na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur cing / myur du bla na med pa med pa yang dag par rdzogs
276b8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
277a1(brgyad stong): to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277a2(brgyad stong): chen po de ltar spyod na/ gzugs la mi spyod de/ tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do// byang chub sem/ 
277a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gis mi rdzi bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277a4(brgyad stong): chen po de ltar spyod na/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can thams cad kyi spyod pa zil gyis gnon te/ zil gyis
277a5(brgyad stong): mi non pa'i gnas kyang thob par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni zil gyis
277a6(brgyad stong): mi non pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 'di la gnas nas nyin mtshan 'da'
277a7(brgyad stong): bar byed na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
277a8(brgyad stong): bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gal te/ 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ mi'i lus thob
277b1(brgyad stong): nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang // 
277b2(brgyad stong): nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas shing nam 'tsho'i bar du sems can thams cad la sbyar ba byin la/ sbyin pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu
277b3(brgyad stong): sngon/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
277b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
277b5(brgyad stong): po gang / chung ngu ra nyin cig tsam yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa la gnas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
277b6(brgyad stong): ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed
277b7(brgyad stong): pa nyin mtshan gnas na/ de lta de lta bur sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnasu 'gyur ro// de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i byams pa
277b8(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i sems de lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par sems can gzhan dag la med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gabye
278a1(brgyad stong): // pa ni gang zag zla med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpe med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
278a2(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas ni bsam mi khyab pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa'o// rab 'byor ji ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams de snyed mngon par bsgrub can
278a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shes rab ji lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur bar/ sems can thams cad bsad par gyur pa mthong ste/ de de'i tshen snying rje chen pos yongasu bzung bar gyur cing des
278a4(brgyad stong): lha'i mig gis bltas pa dang / sems can chad med dang / ga tu med pa rnams/ mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang ldan par gyur pa mthong ngo // mi khom par gyur
278a5(brgyad stong): pas rnam par nyams pa dang / lta ba'i dra bas khebs pa dang / lam ma rnyed pa dang / gzhan mi khom par gyur pa dag mthong zhing / dal ba chud gson pa dag
278a6(brgyad stong): mthong nas/ de'i dus na de skyo ba chen por skyes te/ sems can de dag thams cad la byams pa de dag dang / snying rje chen po des khyab par byas nas/ bdag ni sems can 'di
278a7(brgyad stong): ngag thams cad kyi mgon du gyur par bya'o// bdag ni sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal las thar par bya'o// snyam du yid la byas par 'gyur te/ mtshan ma
278a8(brgyad stong): de dag dang / gzhan dag lhan cig mi gnas par gyur pa'i shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
278b1(brgyad stong): ngo'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la/ shes rab kyi snang ba chen po'o// rab 'byor 'di lta bur gnas pa
278b2(brgyad stong): la spyod na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas yongasu 'dzin cing / bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// sbyin pa'i bdag po
278b3(brgyad stong): dang sbyin pa po gang dag gis gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi gsos spur dang / yo byad rnams la yongasu spyad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
278b4(brgyad stong): pa 'di la sems rab tu nye bar gzhag na/ sbyin pa'i bang ga po dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyor ba rnam par sbyong zhing / de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar
278b5(brgyad stong): 'gyu ro// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul 'khor gyi ba song snyoms 'bras bu yod par za 'dod pa dang / semra
278b6(brgyad stong): can thams cad la lam ston par 'dod pa dang / rgya cher snang bar byed pa 'dod pa dang / 'khor ba ra gnas pa rnams 'khor ba las thar par byed pa 'dod pa dang / sems
278b7(brgyad stong): can thams cad kyi mig rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 'di la gnas par bya'o// gal te yid la byed pa 'di
278b8(brgyad stong): la gnas par 'dod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dran par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang de ltar drar bya sems pa de nyid/ de'i yid
279a1(brgyad stong): / la byed par 'gyur te/ de ma yin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i yid la byed pa gzhan gyi skabs dbye bar mi bya'o// ci ras kyang shes
279a2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ nying mtshan zad par 'gyur la de ltar bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bral la zhig nor bu rin po
279a3(brgyad stong): tshe shes par gyur cing / nor bu rin po che'i rigs shes pas/ sngon pa rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che zhig rnyed par gyur la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de rjed pas dga' ba dang / 
279a4(brgyad stong): rab tu dga' ba che zhing yangs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba las/ de'i nor bu rin po che de phyis stor ba dang / de de'i gzhi las sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang
279a5(brgyad stong): ldan par 'gyur te/ de 'di ltar kye ma bdag ni nor bu rin po che dang bral lo zhes rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nor bu rin po che dang bral ba'i yid la byed pa
279a6(brgyad stong): 'byung zhing / de ltar nor bu rin po che chen po de 'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan de dang / yon 'dra zhing rigs 'thun brnyed par ma gyur gyi bar du/ skyes bung nor bu rin po che chen po
279a7(brgyad stong): de mi brjed de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nor bu rin po che chen po las nyams pas kyang / nor bu rin po che chen po stor ba/ rin po che
279a8(brgyad stong): la rin po cher 'du shes pa ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan zhing ma bral bar sems kyis ji tsam du de'am gzhan rnyed par gyur pa de srid du
279b1(brgyad stong): 'tshal bar bya zhing / de srid du nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che dang / thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar bya'o// 
279b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad dang yid la bgyi ba thams cad ni ngo bo nyid dang bral ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
279b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral bar gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
279b4(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du chos thams
279b5(brgyad stong): cad ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'o zhes yid la byed par gyur la/ de ltar yid la byed par gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yino// de ci'i
279b6(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stong pa ste/ de mi 'phel mi 'grib bo// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
279b7(brgyad stong): phyin pa stong pa ste/ de mi 'phel mi 'grib na/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phel ba ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub tu
279b8(brgyad stong): sgrub par 'gyur/ ji ltar ra bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
280a1(brgyad stong): / kyis me dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mi 'phel mi 'grib bo/ 
280a2(brgyad stong): 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ste// demi 'phel mi 'grib pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' yang song pa ste/ de mi 'phel po 'gru
280a3(brgyad stong): pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par sgrub na/ bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// 
280a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gal te de nang du bshad pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi sba mi dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing thub par ma gyur na/ rab 'byor byang
280a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis ga/ sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha
280a6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yino// rab
280a7(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
280a8(brgyad stong): de ni ma yino// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol/ phyir pa la spyod
280b1(brgyad stong): pa'i chos de gang yang dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yi no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci stong pa nyid shes
280b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yid do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab
280b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang stong pa nyid la ma mchis par dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yi ro// rab
280b4(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni pa yi'o// rab
280b5(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yi'o// ra
280b6(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dang / bcom
280b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ma yi'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs las gung na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
280b8(brgyad stong): spyod pa'i chos de dag gang yang dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ri ma yiro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
281a1(brgyad stong): / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gu dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de gang yang dmigs sam
281a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yino// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'or ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
281a3(brgyad stong): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
281a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de// khyod kyis yang dag par rjesu mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das don ma
281a5(brgyad stong): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'argya ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
281a6(brgyad stong): phyir pa khyod kyis yang dag par rjesu mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
281a7(brgyad stong): ji snyam du sems/ dmigasu med pa'i chos gang yin pa'i chos de yang dag par rje su mthong ngam/ chos de skyes sam/ skye bar 'gyur ma/ skye 'am/ 'gas sam/ 'gag par 'gyur
281a8(brgyad stong): ram 'gag gam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa
281b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni de lta bu yin te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni blar
281b2(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
281b3(brgyad stong): pa'i lam 'dir zhugs nas/ de ltar spyod cing de ltar brtson te/ de ltar 'bad na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa dang / ye shes chen po dang / thams cad mkhyen
281b4(brgyad stong): pa'i ye shes dang / ded dpon chen po'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi skye
281b5(brgyad stong): nga'i chos nyid gang lags pa de yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
281b6(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor de ri ma yino// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags// 
281b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci khyod kyis chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su
281b8(brgyad stong): mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lu
282a1(brgyad stong): / bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung stor pa'i chos de ni bdag gis yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par
282a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba 'am/ chos gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de yang bdag gis yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das
282a3(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos thams cad dmigasu ma mchis pa la/ bdag 'di snyam du chos 'di ni bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos 'dis ni mngon par rdzogs
282a4(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas snyam du mi sem so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de ras bcol
282a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab bo// kye ma bcom
282a6(brgyad stong): lngar 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga'i dbang po
282a7(brgyad stong): brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab bo// shes rab kyi pha rol
282a8(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste/ na mkha' zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
282b1(brgyad stong): 'di ni dben pa'i phyir blta bar dka' ba'o// stong pa'i phyir rtogs par dka' ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lnga'i dbang po
282b2(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur cing thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
282b3(brgyad stong): ba dang / klog pa dang // lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni ngar ngoran gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ma lags so// de
282b4(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhir ro// 
282b5(brgyad stong): de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung nong
282b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / kha tor du byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni ngan ngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag dang ldan pa ma yin no// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ji snyed
282b7(brgyad stong): yod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lapa la bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du
282b8(brgyad stong): bskyed dam/ brgya byiran gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ koT shi ka rigs
283a1(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di nyan pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
283a2(brgyad stong): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
283a3(brgyad stong): ngag ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 
283a4(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'den pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
283a5(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la snga ma'i 'dzam bu'i gleng gi sems can rnams kyi tshul khrims
283a6(brgyad stong): las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung pos brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i char yang / bya
283a7(brgyad stong): stong gi char yang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs su yang / bgrang bar yang dper yang / zlar yang rgyur yang
283a8(brgyad stong): mi bzod ngo // de nas dge slong gzhan dag gis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
283b1(brgyad stong): bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab
283b2(brgyad stong): rnga 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton tu byed par 'gyur ba des zil gyis gnan to// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byir gyis
283b3(brgyad stong): dge slong de la 'di skad smraso// 'phags pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang bdag zil gyis ma dad// gang shes
283b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kur chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa

283b6(brgyad stong): byas rab tu btor lung mnos shing bstar te/ kha ton byas nas/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pa lta ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang de dag ri
283b7(brgyad stong): lnga dang mi dang / lnga pa yid du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnod cing 'gro bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ lnga dang

284a1(brgyad stong): ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas de des thams cad kyang / zil gyis gnod cing 'gro bar 'gyuraro// byang chub

284a6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gang dag tshul khrims yongasu dag cing / tshul khrims kyi phung po pa nyams pa dang / skyor med pa dang / 'dren mar ma gyur pa dang / lgang ma
284a7(brgyad stong): zhugs pa dang / yongasu rdzogs pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub
284a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs shing
284b1(brgyad stong): yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa dag zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar ma zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ zhi ba phun sum
284b2(brgyad stong): tshogs pa/ chung ngu na sdong dum mes tshig pa la gnod pa'i sems mi skyed la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag thams
284b3(brgyad stong): cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag zil gyis gnod cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phur sum tshogs
284b4(brgyad stong): pa zhi ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sems khong khro ba med pa dag zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur par ma zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'
284b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus brtsams pa la le lo med pa/ ma zhus pa'i lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang ldan la
284b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag zil gyis gnod cing

284b8(brgyad stong): ldan pa de dag zil gyis gnod cing 'gro bar ma zad kyi byang chub sems dpa' gang bsam gtan la dga' zhing / bsam gtan la bos pa/ bsam gtan
285a1(brgyad stong): gyi stobs can/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ bsam gtar la dbang ba/ shes rab
285a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag zil gyis
285a3(brgyad stong): gnod cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bstan pa la spyod pa dag ni/ lnga dang mi dang lA ma yid du bcas pa'i
285a4(brgyad stong): 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa car dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa cad thams cad dang / thabs

285a6(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi
285a7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjesu 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di de thams cad bakhyed pa'i rigs mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yi ro// 
285a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs brgyang ring du byed par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
285b1(brgyad stong): chen po 'di ni de ltar nan tan byed// byang chub kyi snying po dang mi mthun par mi byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
285b2(brgyad stong): 'di de ltar slob na/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
285b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'di de ltar slob na byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la pi slob bo// 
285b4(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la mi slob bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i drung du
285b5(brgyad stong): 'jig rten skyong ba'i rgyal po bzhi 'ongs ras 'di skad zer/ rigs kyi bu khyod phyur du byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la spobs
285b6(brgyad stong): shigal gor spobs shig/ gang khrod byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
285b7(brgyad stong): nub dngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na// blang bar bya ba'i lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag yin zhes zer ro// byang chub sems dpa'
285b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' cher po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi pachi bar sems te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang byang chub
286a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i drung du mchi bar sems ma/ lha'i bu gzhan dag lta ci smos/ byang chub sems dpa' sabs dpa' chen po de la de bzhi/ 
286a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang rtag tu dgongs par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
286a3(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa la spyod na/ 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang / pha rol gyi gnod pa gang yang rung ba byung na/ de dag kyang de la yod ye mi 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang
286a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di'i yon tan lag so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ tsa
286a5(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin 'di nyid bdag nyid kyis spobs pas spu 'am/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus smra sa mo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan
286a6(brgyad stong): ba kun dga' bo'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smra so// 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'ad ni sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya
286a7(brgyad stong): 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabasu rig par bya ste/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brtsams te smra ma niso// de nas bcom ldan
286a8(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' ba dza ltar lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin te/ 'di ri de bzhin gshegs pa
286b1(brgyad stong): mtha'// 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bshad yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ 
286b2(brgyad stong): bam po nyi shu pa/ brgya byin gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ ni shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
286b3(brgyad stong): sa/ tshedang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu byan pa
286b4(brgyad stong): la rnal 'byor du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa de'i tshe/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi
286b5(brgyad stong): stong chen po'i 'jig rjen gyi khams kyi bdud de da ga thams cad 'di ltar dogs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di bar ma dor
286b6(brgyad stong): nyan thos kyi sa 'ab/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed dam/ 'on te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
286b7(brgyad stong): 'gyur sna mo// gzhan yang kun dga' bo nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gnas pa'i tshe/ kun dga' bo bdud
286b8(brgyad stong): ngag mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
287a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de che/ bdud sdig can dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'che bar byed do// ci nas byang chub sems
287a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'di zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang / des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang zad
287a3(brgyad stong): par 'gyur snyam ste/ 'jigs pa dag kyang 'byin cing phyog su me thar pa lta bu dag kyang gtong zhing ston to// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
287a4(brgyad stong): thad du bdud sdig can 'tshe bar sems shing mi 'ong ste/ kha cig gi drung du ni 'ong ngo // kha cig gi drung du ni mi 'ong ngo // kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chubs
287a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po ji lta bu'i drung du bdud sdig to can gtse bar sems shing mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
287a6(brgyad stong): gang gis sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa la mos pa'i sems skyeng par ma gyur na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la bdud sdig can gtse bar
287a7(brgyad stong): sems shing 'ongs te/ glags rnyed par 'gyur te/ gzhan yang kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshod pa la/ 'di shes
287a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam ma yin snyam du bcom tha par 'gyur te/ kun dgar ba de ltar the tsom skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des yang dud sdig can gtsa
287b1(brgyad stong): sems shing 'ong ste/ de la glags kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos yongasu
287b2(brgyad stong): zin par gyur la// zab mo zab pa'i gnas dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las bshad pa la mi nyan te/ mnyan pas mi shes// mi shes pas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha
287b3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par bya'o zhes mi 'dri ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la yang bdud sdig can gtse bar sems shing 'ong ste/ de
287b4(brgyad stong): la glags kyang rnyed par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la pa sbyor bar 'gyur te/ 'do na bdag gi grogs po// don bya ba da
287b5(brgyad stong): la yang yong su mi 'dor ro// bdag gi grogs po byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang mang du yod kyang / de dag ni bdag gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed snyam na/ 
287b6(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di la yang ba dang sdig can gtse bar sems shing 'ong ste// glags kyang rnyed par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
287b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la 'di skad ces zer te/ kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
287b8(brgyad stong): pa 'di zab ste khyod la 'di mnyan pas ci zhig bya/ mdo sde dag las de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bshad pa ltar rung sam yang mi byed/ kho bos ni 'di'i gting mi rnyed na/ 
288a1(brgyad stong): / khyod la mtshan pa'am dris pas kyigag blags/ byang chub sams dbang gnan dag kyang kyar dpral bar byedadang/ kun dgang ba byang chub sems dpa 'dal yang bdung rdzog ca
288a2(brgyad stong): gtse bar sems shing 'ong ste/ glags kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kun dga' bo nam byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la brnyas par byed cing / bdag
288a3(brgyad stong): ni dben par spyod pas gnas te/ gzhan dag ni dben par spyod pas mi gnas so// gzhan dag la dben par gnas pa med// sngam na de'i tshe bdud sdig can dga' mgu yid rangs pa
288a4(brgyad stong): gyur cing // rab tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang ying bde ba skyes// sems dga' zhing rab tu tshim pa skyes par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di na blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
288a5(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub rgyang ring du byed sa mo// gzhan yang kun dge' bo nam byang chub sems dpa'i ming nas smos pa 'a ma/ rus nas smos pa 'am/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan yod
288a6(brgyad stong): su brjod pa de'i tshe/ de tsam gyis de ma yin par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges pa dge ba'i chos can dag la brlas par byed de de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
288a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag gi yon tan ci yod pa dang / rnam pa gang yin pa dang / rtags gang yin pa dang mtshan ma gang
288a8(brgyad stong): yin pa de dag med do// de dag de la med bzhin du da'i phyir mi ldog par yin tan rnams la nyon mongs pa skyed de/ ngagang la sdang ba'i chos de dag la khyod ma snang ngo // nas bdas la
288b1(brgyad stong): bstod cing gzhan la slong // de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdud kyi gnas stongs par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po zhig par mi 'gyur/ byol song gi skye
288b2(brgyad stong): gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs zad par mi 'gyur ba lta snyam nas/ bdud sdig can de lta de lta bur byin gyis rlob ste/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' de
288b3(brgyad stong): ngag rmed pa dang / bkur stis non pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur zhing / tshig btsun par 'gyur ba dang / tshig btsun pa des skye bo mang po 'dzin du 'jug ste/ de la skye bo mang po yang
288b4(brgyad stong): ma'anab dang / dad par bya'o snyam du semaso// mthong ngam thas na yang de dag de ltar 'chos shing byed de mthong na sa// de dag de ltar 'chos shing de bzhin du slo'o// de bzhi
288b5(brgyad stong): du nan tan mi byed par 'gyuraro// de dag de ltar de bzhin nyid la mi slob cing / de bzhin nyid la nan tan mi byed pas/ nyon mongs pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// de dag de ltar
288b6(brgyad stong): sems kyi rgyud phyin ci log pas/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las ci dang ci byed pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong bar gyur to// de
288b7(brgyad stong): de ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag zhig par mi 'gyur ro// byol song gi skyes gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / bdud kyi gnas rnams zhig
288b8(brgyad stong): mi 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas/ bdud sdug can dga' mgu yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skyes par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang kun
289a1(brgyad stong): dga' bo nam byang chub sems dpa' gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / 'thab par byed cing rtsod par byed// 'gyed par byed/ gshe zhing spro bar byed/ gnod par sems
289a2(brgyad stong): shing zhe sdang skyed na/ de'i tshe bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyang ring bar byed par 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyang ring du gnas
289a3(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan dang 'thab par byed/ rtsod par byed/ 'gyed par byed/ 
289a4(brgyad stong): gshe zhing spro bar byed/ gnod par sems zhing zhe sdang skyed na/ de la bdud sdig can shin tu dga' mgu yid rang sa shing rab tu dgang ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skyes
289a5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur te// 'di snyam du byang chub tu lung ba snyan pa dang / 'thab par byed/ rtsod par byed/ 'gyed par byed/ gshe zhing skye bar byed// gnod par sems shing zhe sdang
289a6(brgyad stong): skyed la/ sems la gnod pa byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' des/ gal te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma btang na/ sems bskyed pa dang / sems bskyed pa de srid kyi bskal
289a7(brgyad stong): bar go cha bgo dgos so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa de dag la
289a8(brgyad stong): 'thung bar 'gyur ba gang yang mchis sam/ 'on te bskal pa de snyed du byang chub sems dpa' des gdon mi 'tshal bar go cha bgos pa 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
289b1(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag la/ ngas 'thung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan to// de la kun dga' bo gang
289b2(brgyad stong): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag dang / 'babs shing rtsod de bkye nas gshe shing spros/ gnod par bsams zhe sdang bskyed nas mthol tshangs mi byed phyis sdom pa ma
289b3(brgyad stong): 'dzin khon du 'dzin cing khon du bzung nas/ 'dug na kun dga' bo gang zag de la 'byung ba yod par nga mi smra ste/ kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos yang bskal pa de seng du gdon mo
289b4(brgyad stong): za bar go cha bgos so// kun dga' bo gang zag pa nga chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang / gang zag byang chub sem sa dpa'i theg pa can dang 'thabs shing rtsod pa bkye nas
289b5(brgyad stong): gshe zhing spros gnod par sems// zhe sdang bskyed nas/ 'thol 'tshangs byas nas/ byis kyang sdom pa 'dzin la sems 'di ltar skyed de/ ci nas bdag gis sems can
289b6(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi rtsod pa gcad par bya ba yin la/ bdag nyid rtsod par byed pa dang / smras pa la yang bdag slar smra ba ni ma snyed pa ste/ rnyed pa ni maM yin no ngan pa rnyed // legs par ma
289b7(brgyad stong): rnyed do// bdag gis ci nas sems can thams cad kyi zam pa lta bur 'gyur bar bya ba yin la/ bdag pha rol la khyod ces tshig tu smra ba 'am/ tshig rtsub pos lan 'debs shing
289b8(brgyad stong): smra bar mi bya ste/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams la bdag ni glen pa dang / 'on pa dang / lkugs pa dang / 'dra bar bya'o// pha rol gyis ngan du smras
290a1(brgyad stong): ba dang / ngan du brjed pa dang / ngan du zer ba rnams smra ba thes kyang / gnan la ngan sems mi ba'o// pa rol gyi nyes pa dang / skyen bdag gis shes par bya ba 'di
290a2(brgyad stong): ni bdag la legs pa ma yin te/ bdag gis mi bya'o// bdag gis gzhan gyi nyes pa'i skyen mi mnyan te// snyam du bsams pa 'di ni bdag gi ba'i snya sa// de cir por zhe na/ 
290a3(brgyad stong): bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa 'khrug par mi ba ste/ ci ras bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mengon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ser thams ca
290a4(brgyad stong): bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde bar sbyar to// yongasu mya ngan las 'das par ba ning bdag gis ci gnod sems bskyed dam/ pha rol la nyes pa chen po byas pa la yang
290a5(brgyad stong): bdag gis gnad sems mi ba na// de la bdag 'khrug saM bor lta ga la ba ste/ de ltar bdag gis mi bya'o// bdag gis brtul ba brtan pas brtul bar ba'i sreg gi bA
290a6(brgyad stong): chang bad pa la yang dag 'khrugs par mi bya'o// bzhin la khro gnyer mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i 'byung ba yin
290a7(brgyad stong): par nges pa shed // kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams la yang de ltar gnas par bya ste/ ci ras
290a8(brgyad stong): sems can su ma pa'i khrugs par po'o chu ba de ltar sems can thams cad la gangs par bya'o// kun dga' ba byang chub sems dpa' sang mtshan pag/ ga
290b1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan dag ji ltar gnas par ba zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ ston pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
290b2(brgyad stong): rnams kyang ston pa'o zhes de ltar gnas par ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bdag dang theg pa gcig le zhugs// bang chub sems dpa'
290b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bdag dngo lam gcig tu zhugs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bdag dang bsapa po 'thun pa'o// byang chub
290b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bdag dang theg pa 'thun pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ gang la 'di dag gis bslab par bya ba de la bdag gis kyang
290b5(brgyad stong): bslab par bya'o// 'di dag gis ji ltar bslab bar bya ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang bsdu ba bar bya'o// gal te 'ang ngag 'dres par spyod cing gnas par rgyu
290b6(brgyad stong): na yang bdag gis ni 'dres par spyad pas gnas par bya'o// gol te 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i yid lo byed pas ma 'dres par spyod cing gnas na// bdag gis kya
290b7(brgyad stong): de bzhin du gnas par ba'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lhor sleb pa la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bar chad med pa
290b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa'o// 
291a1(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa zang pa la
291a2(brgyad stong): slob pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// bcom ldan 'das gal te mi 'byung ba la slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// gal te bcom ldan 'das 'gag pa ma mchis pa la slob
291a3(brgyad stong): na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / na mkha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang
291a4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan las 'das pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom
291a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la sla ba na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
291a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gang 'di skad du ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zad pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
291a7(brgyad stong): slob 'byung ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / dben pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / na mkha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / ma
291a8(brgyad stong): ngan las 'das pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur zhes zer ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
291b1(brgyad stong): cing gang gis de bzhir gshegs pa'o zhes rab tu 'byed pa de zad par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
291b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das zad pa ni zad par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das zad pa ni mi zad pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin
291b3(brgyad stong): nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes rab tu 'byed pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ skye bar 'gyur ram/ dngos por

291b6(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang
291b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// de bzhin nyid mi zad ngo zhes de ltar slob ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem
291b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa/ 
292a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyis la slob bo// stobs dag la slob bo// pi 'jigs pa dag la slong bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos dag la slang bo// thams ca
292a2(brgyad stong): mkhyer pa'i ye shes la slob bo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slong na/ bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjesu thob par 'gyur ro// 
292a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor tam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lnga dag gis rdzi bar mi nus so// rab 'byor
292a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyis rjesu thob par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
292a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ myur du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'gyur// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
292a6(brgyad stong): slob na/ rang gi spyod yul la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ mgon por 'gyur ba'i chos ngag la slob bo// byams
292a7(brgyad stong): pa chen po la slob bo// snying rje chen po la slob bo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bzlas te/ 
292a8(brgyad stong): rnam pa bcu gnyis su rab tu bskor ba la slob bo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ sems can gyi khams bri bar yang mi bya'o/ 
292b1(brgyad stong): zhes slob bo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mi 'chad par bya ba la slob bo// rab 'byor byang chub
292b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ bdud rtsi'i dbyings dbye'o zhes slob bo// rab 'byor bslab pa rlabs po che 'di ni/ sems stobs zhan pas slob mi nus
292b3(brgyad stong): shing / bslab pa 'di la mthu chung ngus mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang slob pa de dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong ngo // rab 'byor
292b4(brgyad stong): de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi mgon no// gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de dag ni/ sems can thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa thob par 'dod pa
292b5(brgyad stong): yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba dag tu mi skye/ byol song gi skye gnas
292b6(brgyad stong): ngag tu mi skye/ yi dgas kyi yul rnamasu mi skye/ lha ma yin gyi lus su mi skye/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i nang du mi skye/ gdol pa'i rigs su mi skye/ bya'i rigs su mi
292b7(brgyad stong): sku rngon pa dang / nyab dang / shan pa'i rigasu mi 'gyur/ de lta bu'i rigs ngan pa/ las ngan pa/ sten ngan pa'i rigs gzhan du yang mi skye'o// rab 'byor bya
292b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ long bar mi 'gyur/ 'on par mi 'gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur/ chur por mi 'gyur
293a1(brgyad stong): theng por mi 'gyur/ zha bor mi 'gyur/ grum por mi 'gyur/ blur por mi 'gyur/ lkug par mi 'gyur/ brkam par mi 'gyur/ yar lag nyam par mi
293a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ yar lag ma chang par mi 'gyur/ yan lag mi sdug par mi 'gyur// mdog mi sdug par mi 'gyur/ dbyibs mi sdug par mi 'gyur/ dbang po nyams par mi
293a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ dbang po la tshang bar mi 'gyur/ dbang po'i rnam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ dbyangs phur sum tshogs par 'gyu ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
293a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ srog gcod par mi 'gyur/ ma byin par len par mi 'gyur// 'dod pas log par g.yem par mi 'gyur/ brdzur du smra bar
293a5(brgyad stong): mi 'gyuraro// pra ba smra bar mi 'gyur/ tshigs rtsub po smra bar mi 'gyu ra/ tshig khyal ba slu bar mi 'gyur// brnab se mas cad du mi 'gyur/ gnod sems cad du mi 'gyur/ 
293a6(brgyad stong): log par lta bar mi 'gyur/ log par 'tsho bas 'tshe bar mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa 'i lnga tshe ring po'i nang du pi ste/ 
293a7(brgyad stong): ngan pa'i drang tshul can du yongasu mi 'dzin/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos yongasu mi 'dzin/ bsam gtan dang stobs par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe / de la
293a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ lha tshe ring po'i nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs mkhas pa de la yod de/ rab 'byor
293b1(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas
293b2(brgyad stong): bsam gtan la yang snyoms par 'jug la/ bsam gtan gyi dbang gis kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bur thabs mkhas pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// rab 'byor
293b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ stobs yongasu dag par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa yongasu dag par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su dag
293b4(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
293b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos gang gis stobs yongasu dag par 'a gyur/ mi 'jigs pa yongasu dag par 'gyu ra/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su dag par 'gyur
293b6(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhi'o// de de bzhiran te/ de ci'i phyir zhemar
293b7(brgyad stong): 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhir gyis yongasu dag pa yin te/ de ltar chos thaMd yongasu dag pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
293b8(brgyad stong): tu phyid pa la slob pa dag mi zhum mi 'gong na/ rab 'byor de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo dag chos 'di dag de ltar ma shes ma
294a1(brgyad stong): // mthong bas/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid mi shes mi mthong ste/ rab 'byor sems cad de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bad cing brtsod
294a2(brgyad stong): 'grus rtsom te/ bdag cag shes pas sems can rnams shes par bya'o// bdag cag mthong bas sems can rnams bstan par bya'o// zhes bslab pa 'di la slob bo// 
294a3(brgyad stong): bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ stobs rnams rjesu thob par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa rnams rjesu thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
294a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol dag gi spyod pa dang / g.yos pa rnams kyi pha rol tu 'gro'o// 
294a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po'i phyogs gang na rdob med pa dang / gang na gser dang / sa le sbrub dang / dngul dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i nyung gi
294a6(brgyad stong): sa chen po la sa phyogs gang tsha rgo can dang / gram dang / rtswa dang sdong du pa dang / tsher ma sna tshogs kyis gang ba de lta bu ri shin tu mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhir du ser gyi ris
294a7(brgyad stong): na gang dag 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i bslab pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ri nyung ngo // sems cad
294a8(brgyad stong): gyi ris na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa'i sems cad de dag ni shin tu mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gyi risar 'khor lo
294b1(brgyad stong): sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i srid thob par 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gi/ sems can gyi ris na/ mkhar gyi rgyal srid thob
294b2(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gyi ris na/ bla na med pa yang dag par
294b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes/ lam chen po 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
294b4(brgyad stong): dpa' de dag ni shin tu nyung ngo // sems car gyi ris na gang nyar tho sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa de lta bu ri shir tu mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
294b5(brgyad stong): dper na/ sems car gyis ris na/ sems cad gang dag brgya byi na nyid 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blang sa te gnas pa de dag ri nyung ngo // sems nur gyi ris
294b6(brgyad stong): ra sems can gang dag lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de dag ri shi ra tra mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can gyi ris na
294b7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag ni nyung ngo // rab 'byor sems can gyi ris ra/ sems cad gang nyar thos dang rang sangs rgyas
294b8(brgyad stong): kyi bslab pa la slob pa de dag ni shin tu mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can gyi ris ro/ sems cad gang dag tshangs pa nyid 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs
295a1(brgyad stong): / te gnas pa de dag ri nyung ngo // ser gyi ris ra/ sems can gang dag tshangs pa'i 'khor du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de dag ri shiratra
295a2(brgyad stong): mang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du sems cad gyi ris ra/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de dag ni nyung ngo // 
295a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor sems cad gyi ris ra/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de dag ri shing tha rang ngo // rab 'byor
295a4(brgyad stong): de lta bas ra sen gyi ris na/ sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ri nyung ngo // rab 'byor de bas kyang de bzhin du
295a5(brgyad stong): nan tar byed pa shin tu nyung ngo // rab 'byor nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ba de bzhin du rang tar byed pa'i rang ra gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ra
295a6(brgyad stong): nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la slob pa nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung ba de bas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher
295a7(brgyad stong): po gang bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de dag ni shin tu nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung ngo // rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sengs
295a8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung ba'i phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi grangasu bgrang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tra phyir
295b1(brgyad stong): pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gnod
295b2(brgyad stong): sems kyi tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ the tshom dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ gser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ ngang tshul ngang pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi
295b3(brgyad stong): skyed/ gnod sems dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ g.yeng dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ 'chal pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i sems
295b4(brgyad stong): skyed de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa tha~Md yang dag par bsdus shing
295b5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad bzung bar 'gyu ro// pha rol tu phyi na pa thams cad yong su shes par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rjesu song bar 'gyuraro// pa
295b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa thams cad nang du 'dus par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i nang du lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis 'dus te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du
295b7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa slob pa'i rang du/ pha rol tu phyin pa tha~Md 'dus par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu'i
295b8(brgyad stong): srog gi dbang po'i nang du/ dbang po thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
296a1(brgyad stong): // chen po'i dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po 'gags na dbang po thams cad 'gags pa de bzhin
296a2(brgyad stong): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad 'gags par 'gyur zhing / pha rol tu par pa thams cad
296a3(brgyad stong): 'dus par gyur to// yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de lta bsar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu gzung bar 'dod pas/ 
296a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob ra/ sems cad thams cad
296a5(brgyad stong): kyi mchog tu slob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong ched po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sem sa can ji snyed yod pa dag thams cad sor du bsdus
296a6(brgyad stong): na/ sems can de dag mang ba yir ram/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can yang mang na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
296a7(brgyad stong): khams kyi sems cad lta ci spos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam 'tshe ba'i bar du 'dug cing sems cad de
296a8(brgyad stong): ngag thams cad la gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde ba'i tshegs chas thams cad kyis rim gror byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sem
296b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de'i bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // 
296b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chung ngu se gol tog pa'i srid du bsgom na/
