296b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nang na bla na med pa yang dag par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur par 'dod pa dang / sangs
296b7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi yul rjesu thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa rjesu thob par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rtse bar 'dod pa dang / sangs
296b8(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sgra sgrogs par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs pa rjesu thob par 'dod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams ches
297a1(brgyad stong): / kyi gtam byed par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
297a2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa des gang ma bslabs par 'gyur ba'i phur sum tshogs par 'gyur ba de yang dag par rjesu ma bathong // 
297a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci nyan thos kyi phur sum tshogs pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po nges bslabs pa lags sa pa/ bcom ldan
297a4(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bslab par 'gyur la byang chub sems dpa'
297a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phur sum tshogs pa la gnas par bya'o zhes mi slob/ bdag la nyan tho sa kyi phur sum tshogs pa yod par 'gyur zhes mi slob
297a6(brgyad stong): slob par mi byed/ rab 'byor nyan thos kyi ston gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu shes te/ de la yang mi gan so// 'di ltar rnab par spyod cing 'gal bar mi byed/ bdag
297a7(brgyad stong): gis nyan thos kyi ltor 'di dag kyang bshad par bya'o// rab tu bstar par bya'o zhes slob bo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po de ltar sle na/ lnga dang mi
297a8(brgyad stong): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rter gyi sbyin pa'i gnasu 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ de ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i gangs car thos
297b1(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa thams cad zil gyis gnor te// de thams cad mkhyen pa la nye bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
297b2(brgyad stong): chen po de ltar slob ra/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dor ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral ba ste/ 
297b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid las yongasu mi nyams pa'i chos can du rig par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
297b4(brgyad stong): kyis yang ring du byed// bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar 'gyuraro// gal te byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di sapa du 'di ra
297b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa 'di thob par byed pa'o snyam du sems shing de ltar shes shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod
297b6(brgyad stong): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phrin pa de yang / yang dag par mi shes la/ 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha
297b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa yongasu sdud do// zhes rab 'byor/ de ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar yang dag par mi shes/ yang dag
297b8(brgyad stong): par rjesu mi mthong ra/ rab 'byor gal te de ltar spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheran po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// myur ba'i le'u zhes bya ste
298a1(brgyad stong): rtsa lnga pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa// bam po nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byir 'di snyapa du sems
298a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa nyid kyang sems cad thams cad 'di ltar zil gyis gnor na/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
298a3(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas par gyur pa lta ci spos/ sems can gang dag thams cad mkhyed pa nyid du sems 'jug pa de dag ri rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yi/ sems can
298a4(brgyad stong): de dag ni 'tsho ba yang legs par 'tsho ba yin na/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta ci spos/ sems cad dam pa gang bla ra med pa
298a5(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni re bar bya'o snyam du bas pa so// de ras lha'i dbang po
298a6(brgyad stong): brgya byir gyis me tog man da ra ba dag mngon par sprul nas/ me tog snyim par thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
298a7(brgyad stong): gtor nas/ tshig tu yang 'di skad ces smraso// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang
298a8(brgyad stong): par 'gyi'o// zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gi 'tshal ba dang / yongasu bsam pa dang / yongasu gzung ba'i sems bskyed pa
298b1(brgyad stong): rnams 'byor par gyur cig/ de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yong su rdzogs par gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i chos de dag yong su rdzogs par gyur
298b2(brgyad stong): cig rang byung gi chos de dag yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ mi 'phrogs pa'i chos de dag yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'
298b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi skye'o// bco
298b4(brgyad stong): lngar 'das bdag ri byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa las slar ldog par
298b5(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi skye te/ 'khor ba ra mchis pa 'i sdug bsngal rnams mthong bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu srer lam rgya
298b6(brgyad stong): cher skyed par 'gyu ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang sems bskyed pa 'di lta bu 'di dag dang ldan pa dag/ ci nas bdag brgal pas se bsgral bar bgyi/ grol bas dgrol
298b7(brgyad stong): bar bgyi/ dbugs dbyung bas dbugs phyung bar bgyi/ yongasu mya ngar las 'das pas yongasu mya ngan las bzlo bar bgyi'o zhes/ de ltar sems bskyed ras gnas pa
298b8(brgyad stong): ngag snying rje cher po de dor du 'tshal ba dag/ sbar bar 'tshal ba dang / lha dang mi dang lnga pa yid du bcas pa'i 'jig rted la snying brtse bar bgyid pa lag so// byang chub
299a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la dang por zhugs pa dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la rje su yi rang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
299a2(brgyad stong): spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la yang rjesu yi rang ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i
299a3(brgyad stong): chos nyid la yang rjesu yi rang bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol
299a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka ri rab ri'i rgyal po srang grangasu gcal ba'i rang ri gzung bar nu/ 
299a5(brgyad stong): kyis/ ko'u shi ka rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems pa skyed pa'i bsod nams de'i tshad ni gzung ba ra mi nu so// ko'u shi ka yang gling cheran po bzhi pa'i
299a6(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams srang grangasu bcal ba'i chang ni gzungs par nus kyi/ ko'u shi ka rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod rams kyi tshad ni gzung
299a7(brgyad stong): bar mi ru so// ko'u shi ka yang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams srung grangasu bcal ba'i chang ni gzung bar nus kyi/ ko'u shi ka rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems
299a8(brgyad stong): bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni gzung bar mi nuso// yang ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams srang grangs gcal ba'i tshad ni gzung bar nas
299b1(brgyad stong): kyi ko'u shi ka rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi chang ni gzung bar mi nuso// ko'u shi ka yang stong gsum gyi sdong cher po'i 'jig rter gyi khams
299b2(brgyad stong): srang grangasu gcal ba'i tshad ri gzung bar nus kyi/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjesu yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod
299b3(brgyad stong): rabs kyi tshad ni gzung bar mi nuso// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcopa ldan 'das ser gang
299b4(brgyad stong): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
299b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyi rjesu yi rang ba tshad ma mchis pa dang / ldar pa'i sems de lta bu la/ bsod nams la gus par mi 'ang dam pa 'tshal rje su yi rang ba mi
299b6(brgyad stong): sems pa de dag ri bdud kyis byir gyis brlabs par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sems cad gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rnams kyi sems
299b7(brgyad stong): bskyed pa 'di la rjesu yi rang bar mi bgyid pa de dag ri bdud kyi phyogasu gyur pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rnams kyi sems
299b8(brgyad stong): bskyed pa 'di la rje su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud kyi garas ras shi 'phos pa lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe ma bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa mngor par
300a1(brgyad stong): / bsgrub pa 'di dag ni bdud kyi gnas 'jig par bgyid pa lag so// gang gis 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu bsngos pa 'am/ 
300a2(brgyad stong): yi rang ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni rjesu yi rang bar bgyid pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis/ bla ra med pa
300a3(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
300a4(brgyad stong): gang gis de bzhir gshegs pa yongasu ma gtang ba dang / chos yongasu ma gtang ba dang / dge 'dud yongasu pa gtang ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu po de dag gis
300a5(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa 'di la rjesu yi rang bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// 
300a6(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu ma gtang ba dang / chos yongasu su btang ba dang / dge
300a7(brgyad stong): 'dun yongasu ma btang ba de dag gis/ sems bskyed pa la rje su yi rang bar bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'ang/ rang sangs
300a8(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag gis/ sems bskyed pa 'di la rje su yi rang bar byas na/ de dag myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
300b1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ de ltar rjesu yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis/ gang
300b2(brgyad stong): dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der bkur sti byas par 'gyur/ gtso bor byas pa dang / ri mor byas pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phu dung du byas par 'gyur te/ 
300b3(brgyad stong): de dag yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs mthong bar mi 'gyur/ de dag yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du dri yang ma yino// ro yang ma yi'o// de dag gis
300b4(brgyad stong): yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya la reg par mi 'gyur ro// de dag ngan song du mi skye bar rig par bya'o// de dag mtho ris skye bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
300b5(brgyad stong): sems cad de dag gis sems can grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba la rjesu yi rang ba'i phyi'o// gsol pa/ 
300b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang gis mos pa bskyed de/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjesu yi rang bar bgyis pa/ de dag gi
300b7(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa de dag kyang rnam par 'phel bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyid par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
300b8(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa yongasu mya ngar las 'da' bar bgyid par 'gyur
301a1(brgyad stong): // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ ko'u shi ka de bzhir gshegs pa'i mthus khyod kyis tshig ji skad spras pa de nga ba'i'o// de de bzhir te/ ka'u shi ka rigs
301a2(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes yi rang bar byas pa/ ko'u shi ka rna pa grangs
301a3(brgyad stong): 'dis rigs kyi bu 'pha/ rigs kyi bu mo des gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes yi rang bar byas ras/ sems cad
301a4(brgyad stong): grangs med dpag tu med pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom lngar 'das sems bskyed pa sgra la lta bus ji ltar bla na med pa yang
301a5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor 'di jis paradu sems/ khyod kyis
301a6(brgyad stong): sems snu ba lta bu yang dag par rjes mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
301a7(brgyad stong): ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis smra ba yang dag par rjesu mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ri pa lags te/ bcom lngan 'das bdag gis smra
301a8(brgyad stong): dang / sems sgyu ba lta bur yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sgyu pa yang ma yin/ sems
301b1(brgyad stong): smra ba lta bu yang ma yin/ sems sgyu ma lta bu las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de yang
301b2(brgyad stong): reg par rjes mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ri ma lag so// bcom lngar 'das bdag gis sgyu ba 'am/ sems sgyu ma lta bu las gung na
301b3(brgyad stong): chos gang bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjesu ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
301b4(brgyad stong): chos gzhan yang dag par rjes ma mthong na mchis pa'o zhe 'am/ ma mchis pa'o zhes gang zhig brjod par bgyi/ chos ni shing khwa dben pa lags te/ de mchis pa'o zhe 'am
301b5(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'o zhes brjed du ma pa ris/ chos gang shing tu ber pa de ni bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya
301b6(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos pa mchis pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya'o// bcom lngar 'das
301b7(brgyad stong): lta bas ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa lags te/ chos gang shin tu dber pa'i chos de ni bsgom par bgyid pa ma lags te/ de chos gang yang thob par
301b8(brgyad stong): bgyid pa 'am/ spang bar bgyid pa pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa shin tu dben pa la brtar ras/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
302a1(brgyad stong): // dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
302a2(brgyad stong): chub kyang shin tu dper ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shin tu dper ba lags la/ blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
302a3(brgyad stong): byang chub kyang shis rnga dber pa lags ra/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar dben pas/ dber pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/ de sad ces gsol pa dang / 
302a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor legaso le gso// rab 'byor de de bzhi do// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab
302a5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'o// rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa yin te/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes
302a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pas/ de'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub shin tu dben par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gal
302a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dper par yang dag par mi shes na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yino// rab 'byor de
302a8(brgyad stong): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
302b1(brgyad stong): rgya ste/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brjen par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// dper pas dben
302b2(brgyad stong): pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang yang rgya ste/ 
302b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
302b4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni dor zab po la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhi no// de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po ri don zab po
302b5(brgyad stong): la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dor zab mo la yang spyod la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar dor de
302b6(brgyad stong): mngon sum du mi byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa yi ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i dor bdag gis
302b7(brgyad stong): 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa yang ma lag so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang mngon sum du bgyid pa de nyid kyang
302b8(brgyad stong): mi dmigs/ gang mngon sum du bgyid pa'i chos de yang mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'di bshad pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
303a1(brgyad stong): // dpa' chen po mi zhum mi 'gong mi sreg mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te spyod do snyam du yang dag par
303a2(brgyad stong): rjesu mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu che bar gyur tos pa du de ltar yang dag
303a3(brgyad stong): par rjesu mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bdag gis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rgyang ring du bsring so snyam du de ltar yang mi sems na
303a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag kha cig dang ni nye'o// kha cig dang rgyang ring ngo snyam
303a5(brgyad stong): du ser so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das na mkha' la rna ma par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
303a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang / bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / 
303a7(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du mi sem so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i
303a8(brgyad stong): sla du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di snyam du sgyu ma byed pa ni bdag dang nye'i/ skye bo'i tshogs gzhan 'dus pa ni bdag dang rgyang ring
303b1(brgyad stong): ngosam du mi ser so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'i skyes bu la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhir du zang
303b2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang / bdag dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nye bar gyur
303b3(brgyad stong): te/ nyar thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du mi ser so// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtogs
303b4(brgyad stong): pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs brnyan ni 'di snyam du dmigs pa gang gis gzugs brnyad du 'byung ba de ni bdag dang
303b5(brgyad stong): nye ba yin gyi/ gang dag le long ngam sdong chus bkang ba de'i drung du 'ongs pa de dag ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyad du mi seras te/ de ci'i sla du zha ra/ bcom ldan 'das
303b6(brgyad stong): gzugs brnyar la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
303b7(brgyad stong): pa yang 'di snyapa du bdag ri bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ri bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du ser po
303b8(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du 'ar/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper ra/ de bzhir gshegs
304a1(brgyad stong): // pa ni su la yang sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug pa pa mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhir gshegs pas rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i slad du ste/ 
304a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang su la yang sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug pa ma mchi so// de
304a3(brgyad stong): ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du bcom lngan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
304a4(brgyad stong): phyir pa yang rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thad spangs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
304a5(brgyad stong): rgyas kyis sprul pa gang mngon par sprul pa de 'di sku ma du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs
304a6(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du mi sem so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
304a7(brgyad stong): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar
304a8(brgyad stong): gyur te/ nyan thos kyis dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis ni bdag dang rgyang ring ngo snyam du mi sem so// de ci'i slangad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
304b1(brgyad stong): rtog pa chis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sprul pa de bgyi ba gang gi slad du sprul pa'i bgyi ba de yang bgyid la/ sprul pa de yang rnam par rtog
304b2(brgyad stong): pa par chiso// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ sprul pa de la rngam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang
304b3(brgyad stong): bgyi ba gang gi slang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i bgyi ba de yang bgyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rnam par rtog pa ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du
304b4(brgyad stong): zhen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la rngam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i sla du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na shing mkhar mkhas pa 'am/ shing mkhar gyi
304b5(brgyad stong): slob pas shing las byas pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bud med kyi 'khrul 'khor sbyar ba bgyis nas/ de bgyi ba gang gi dor du bgyis pa'i ngor bgyid kyang / shing gi tshog
304b6(brgyad stong): nga rngam par rdeg pa ma mchi so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shing gi tshogs de la rngam par rtog pa pa maris pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
304b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po yang bgyi ba gang gis don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i bgyi ba de yang bgyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rnam par rtog pa
304b8(brgyad stong): pa mchis// de ci'i slad du 'ir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa pa mchis pa'i sra du'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// 
305a1(brgyad stong): // de ras tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
305a2(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ri snying po la spyod pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras
305a3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni snying po pa yin pa la spyod do// de nas 'dod par
305a4(brgyad stong): spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang po rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 
305a5(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing / de ltar spyod kyang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang dag pa'i mtha'
305a6(brgyad stong): mngon sum du mi byed pa'i son de dag ni phyag bya ba yino// gang chos rnams kyi chos nyid la spyod kyang / chos nyid mngon sum du mi byed na/ rnam grangs 'dis byang chub sems
305a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dka' ba byed pa yin par rig par bya'o sapa ste/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang po de dag
305a8(brgyad stong): gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ 'dod par spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag mang po de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag yang dag pa'i mtha' de mngon sum du mi byed
305b1(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni dka' ba spyod pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i bu rnams gang sems can tshad med grangs med pa rnams yong su mya ngan las
305b2(brgyad stong): bzla bar bya'o snyam du go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin/ mchog tu dka' ba byed pa yin te/ seMn rnams ri
305b3(brgyad stong): dben pa'i phyir/ sems can de dag kyang shin tra yang dag par med/ yang dag par med pas dmigasu med de/ yang dag par med pas dmigasu med do// de ltar gdul
305b4(brgyad stong): bar bya ba rnams shin tu yang dag par med nga migasu medo// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can dag gdul bar bya'o snyam
305b5(brgyad stong): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'o// lha'i bu dag gang sems can rnams gdul bar bya'o snyam du sems pa
305b6(brgyad stong): de ri na mkha' gdul bar bya'o snyam du ser so// lha'i bu dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na mkha' dben pa'i phyir sems cad dber bar rig par bya'o// lha'i bu dag byang chub sem
305b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams yang dag par med cing / dmigasu med pa rnams kyi phyir/ ge cha bgos ra rdam grangs 'dis dka' ba byed pa yi'o// lha'i
305b8(brgyad stong): bu dag gang sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos par bya'o snyam du sems pa ni dmakha' dang rjod par bya'o snyam du sems pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
306a1(brgyad stong): bya// ngos sems cad rnams kyi phyir gocha bgos pa 'di sems can de dag shes tung darig su med par de ba'i gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rjes
306a2(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs te/ de yang sems can dben pa'i phyir de lta bur rig par bya'o// de ltar gdul bar bya ba dper ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dben par
306a3(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// gal te 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhub par ma gyur ra/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po de ni shes
306a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems cad dper ba'i phyir gzugs dberan par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du sems can dab
306a5(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rna mas dang / rnam par shes pa dben par rig par bya'o// de ltar sems can dben pa'i phyir chos thams cad
306a6(brgyad stong): kyi bar du dben par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu dag gal te de ltar chos thams cad dben pa nyid du bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par mi
306a7(brgyad stong): byed na/ 'di ltar zhum par mi byed pa de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyer bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka'
306a8(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad dben pa nyid du bshad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhum par mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
306b1(brgyad stong): bcom lngar 'das dben pa'i slad du zhum par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dben pa nyid du bshad
306b2(brgyad stong): pa la zhub par mi bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang zhum par 'gyur ba mchi so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de ni gang yang
306b3(brgyad stong): dmigasu pa mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang gis chos gang zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de yang dmigasu ma mchi so// gal te de sang brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / bsnga
306b4(brgyad stong): pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ra po zhum par mi 'gyur/ yi mi gsod/ yid gsod par mi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur/ yang dag par 'a/ 
306b5(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub
306b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la dbang por bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag par bcas pa dang / dbang ldan dang bcas pa rnams
306b7(brgyad stong): rgyang pa ras thal po sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa mdur ra 'dor dang tshangs pa kur 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshang
306b8(brgyad stong): seng 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che dang / 'du shes med pa'i ser rngams nga
307a1(brgyad stong): mi che ba dang li gdung ba dang / gya rom sdang ba dang / shing tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po
307a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'jig rter gyi khams grangs meng nang med pa dag ra/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
307a3(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bco pa lngar 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la
307a4(brgyad stong): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi spyar gyis gzigs te/ rab 'byor de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po shes rab tu
307a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la par 'dogs shing dgongs par mdzad do// rab 'byor byang chub se pas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol
307a6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dang de dag la de ba'ir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams phan 'dogs shing dgongs pa mdzad de/ rab 'byor
307a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir pa ldog par gzung bar bya'o// de dag la bdud
307a8(brgyad stong): ngam gzhan dag gis bar chad byed par mi 'gyuro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams ra sems cad ji srid yod pa de da
307b1(brgyad stong): thams cad bdud sdig can du gyur la/ bdud de dag re res kyang de snyed kyi bdud kyi sde mngon par sprul kyang / rab 'byor bdud sdig can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
307b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bar chad bya bar
307b3(brgyad stong): ri ru so// rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bdud sdig can du gyur pa lta zhog gi/ rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi
307b4(brgyad stong): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sem sa can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can du gyur la/ bdud sdig can de dag re res kyang / bdud kyi
307b5(brgyad stong): sde de snyed mngon par sprul kyang / rab 'byor bad nga sdig can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing shes
307b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa de la/ bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bar chad bya bar mi nuso// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
307b7(brgyad stong): cher po chos gnyis dang ldan na/ bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lnga rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin te/ gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ seMn thams cad
307b8(brgyad stong): yongasu ma btang ba yin/ des chos thams cad stong par brtags pa yin te/ rab 'byor chos de gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud
308a1(brgyad stong): sdig car rnams dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yid// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis po
308a2(brgyad stong): gzhar dang ldan na/ bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin te/ gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad spras pa de bzhir
308a3(brgyad stong): byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de gnyis dang ldan pa ni
308a4(brgyad stong): bdud sdig can rnams sam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yino// rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lnga
308a5(brgyad stong): rnams kyang nye bar 'ong bar sems dpar 'gyur/ nye bar 'ongs nas kyang dri bar bya bar sems/ yo ngasu dri bar bya bar sems/ bsnyed bkur bya bar ser so// 
308a6(brgyad stong): de la spro ba yang skyed par byed de/ rigs kyi bu khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyis
308a7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de lta bas na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid kyis gnas par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod de ltar gnas pa
308a8(brgyad stong): nyid kyis gnas shing / de ltar spyod na/ sems can mgor med pa rnams kyi mgon du 'gyur/ sems can gzhi med pa rnams kyi bzhir 'gyur/ sems cad gnas med
308b1(brgyad stong): pa rnangs kyi garas 'gyur/ sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabasu 'gyur/ sems can dpung gnyer med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyer du 'gyur/ gling med pa rdabs
308b2(brgyad stong): kyi gling du 'gyur/ sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur/ sems cad dbus long rnams kyi sdang ba chen por 'gyu ro zhes/ lnga'i bu de dag de ltar byang chub
308b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la spro ba skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ri 'di ltar gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
308b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa 'dis gang sa pa de dag la 'jig rter gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom lngar 'das de dag dge
308b5(brgyad stong): slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdur du bdar cing bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da nga
308b6(brgyad stong): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ltar dang rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ ji phyir pa'i yed
308b7(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa de dag gi ling dang gzugs dang rus dang kha dog rnams yongasu brjod cing chos stor te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rer po de la ched du brjod pa yang
308b8(brgyad stong): ched du brjod do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ring po che tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
309a1(brgyad stong): chen po gtsug pud car dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gang dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
309a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi spyod pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa dag gi ming dang rus dang kha dog dang / gzugs yongasu brjod cing chos stor te/ ched du brjod pa yang
309a3(brgyad stong): ched du brjod pa bzhin du rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang da ltar nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ra/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po gang dag tshangs
309a4(brgyad stong): par spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang rus dang kha
309a5(brgyad stong): dog dang gzugs yongasu brjod cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas
309a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi ming dang rus dang / kha dog dang gzugs yongasu brjod cing ches stor te/ ched brjod
309a7(brgyad stong): pa'ang ched du brjod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
309a8(brgyad stong): chen po de dag thams cad kyi ming dang / rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs yongasu brjod cing chos ston pa dang / cheng du brjod pa ched du brjod pa ma yi no// rab 'byor sangs
309b1(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming dang / rus dang kha dog rnams dang / gzugs rnams yongs
309b2(brgyad stong): brjod nas chos 'chad cing ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom lngar 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
309b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams ma gtogs par de pa lags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi ming dang rus dang / kha dog dang
309b4(brgyad stong): gzugs rnams yongasu brjod cing chos ston pa dang / ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mchis sa pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
309b5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams pa gtogs par sangs rgyas bco pa lngar 'das de dag gi ming dang / rus dang kha dog dang gzugs rnam
309b6(brgyad stong): yongasu brjod cing chos stor pa dang / ched du brjod pa yang che du brjod pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yod// yang de dag gang zhe na/ gang da ltar de ba'i ngag
309b7(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom lngan 'das mi bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjesu slob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyad
309b8(brgyad stong): rjes spyod pa'i tshul du gnas pa rnams te/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po phyir mi ldog pa rnams pa gtogs par sangs rgyas
310a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis ming dang / rus dang kha dog dang gzugs yongasu brjod cing chos ston pa dang ched du rjod pa yino// rab 'byor de dag ni
310a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gi byang chub sems dpa'i rjes slob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ rjesu spyod pa'i tshul du gnas pa rnams te/ ra
310a3(brgyad stong): 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po phyir me ldog pa rnams ma gtogs par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ming dang / rus pa
310a4(brgyad stong): kha dog dang gzugs yongasu brjod cing chos ston pa dang ched du brjod pa yino// gzhan yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
310a5(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod tsang / chos thams cad mi skye ba'o zhes de ltar mos la da dung mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / chos thams
310a6(brgyad stong): cad zhi ba'o zhes mos la/ chos thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob pa ma nor pa dang / rab 'byor gnas pa de lta bus gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
310a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming dang rus dang kha dog dang / gzugs kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongasu brjed cing chos ston te cheng du brjed pa yang
310a8(brgyad stong): ched du brjod do// rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gi ming dang / rus dang kha dog dang gzugs
310b1(brgyad stong): yongasu rjod cing chos ston pa dang / ched du rjod pa ched du rjod par mdzad pa de dag ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs te de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sa la
310b2(brgyad stong): re bar byas te/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldanar 'das rnapas
310b3(brgyad stong): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag gis ming dang / rus dang / kha dog dang / gzugs rnams yongasu
310b4(brgyad stong): rjod ras chos ston te/ ched du rjod pa yang ched du brjod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
310b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa thos nas mos par byed cing rmongs par mi 'gyur/ de pa rur mi byed// the tsom mi za
310b6(brgyad stong): ste ji ltar de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa de bzhi no zhes rgyas par nyar cing 'di snyam du bdag gis shes
310b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa dang / gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der tshangs par spyod
310b8(brgyad stong): pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag las kyang rgyas par nyan to snyam du sems bskyed do// de dag gi drung du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnya
311a1(brgyad stong): pas mos par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bos shing / de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar gsungs pa bzhir du mos pas phyir mi
311a2(brgyad stong): ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa thos pa yang gces spras byed par bstar na/ gang mos par byed cing mos ras kyang
311a3(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing de bzhin nyid la bsgrubs nas gnas te/ de bzhin nyid la gnas nas thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du chos ston
311a4(brgyad stong): pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin nyid ma gtog par chos gzhan gang yang dmigs pa mchis na/ chos gang zhig/ 
311a5(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang zhig chos
311a6(brgyad stong): 'di stor par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gang 'di skad du gang de
311a7(brgyad stong): lngar de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang yang dmigasu ma mchis na/ chos gzhan gang zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur/ gang zhig bla na med pa yang
311a8(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang zhig chos ston par 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par
311b1(brgyad stong): chos gzhan gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang dmigasu med do// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dmigasu med ra/ gang de bzhin nyid la gnas par
311b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/ rab 'byor chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par
311b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de ni gang
311b4(brgyad stong): yang dmigasu med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni chos mi stor to// rab 'byor gang yang bstar par bya ba'i chos de yang dmigs med do// de ras bcom ldan 'as
311b5(brgyad stong): la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ro la tra phyir pa ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das gang bla ra red
311b6(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' ba bgyid pa lag so// de ci'i
311b7(brgyad stong): sladu zhe ra/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid la gang yang gnas pa ma mchis la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba gang yang
311b8(brgyad stong): ma mchis chos sdon pa gang yang ma mchis pa 'di la zhub par mi 'gyur/ re rur mi bgyid/ rmongs par mi 'gyur ba'i slanga'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
312a1(brgyad stong): lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces spraso// ko'u shi ka gang 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo 'di lta bu bshad pa la ne ma rung mi byed pa dang / rmongs
312a2(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' char po dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o zhes zer ba/ ko'u shaM ka chos thams cad stong par 'di la su zhig nem nur
312a3(brgyad stong): byed cing rmongs par 'gyur/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis gang bshad pa de dang de ni stong pa nyid las brtsams te bshad pa ci la yang
312a4(brgyad stong): thogs pa medo// 'di lta ste dper na khar snang la mnga' 'phangs na ci la yang thogs pa med/ de bzhin du 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis chos bstan pa ci la yang thogs
312a5(brgyad stong): pa me 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dang nga po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// com ldan 'das bdag gis garas brtan rab 'byor la
312a6(brgyad stong): brtsams te/ 'di skad bshad cing 'di skad du bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhir smras pa lags sam/ chos smra ba 'am/ chos dang rjesu 'thur pa'i
312a7(brgyad stong): chos lung ston pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka khyod kyis 'di skad
312a8(brgyad stong): du bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhir smra ba yino// chos smra ba yi'o// chos kyi rjesu 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka garas
312b1(brgyad stong): gar rab 'byor gang dang gang spobs par 'gyur ba de ri stong pa nyid la brtsams te spob so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor ri shes rab kyi pha rol tu
312b2(brgyad stong): phyir pa yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong zhing mi dmigs ra/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ga la yod/ byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang
312b3(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba
312b4(brgyad stong): lnga ga la yod/ de bzhin nyid mi dmigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mi skye ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mi skye ba nyid mdzod du

312b7(brgyad stong): chos nyid kyang mi dmigs ra/ gang chos spen par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ ko'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor ni chos thams cad dben par gnas pa dang / chos thang
312b8(brgyad stong): mi dmigs par gangs pas gnaso/ ko'u shi ka gang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos thams cad dben par gnas pa dang / chos thams cad dmigasu med pa
313a1(brgyad stong): gnas pa'i gnas pa 'di ra/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i brgya'i char yang
313a2(brgyad stong): nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi chang yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya'i chur yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//

313a8(brgyad stong): bor phyin par 'dod pa dang / phul du phyin par 'dod pa dang / rab du phyin par 'dod pa dang / mchog rab tu phyin par 'dod pa dang / gya nom par byed par 'dod pa dang / bla/ 
313b1(brgyad stong): mar phyin par 'dod pa dang / bla na med par phyin par 'dod pa dang / gong na med par phyin par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos byang chub sems dpa' sems
313b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la spyod cing gnas pa 'dis gnas par bya'o// snying po'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa bdur pa'o// 
313b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ de ras lha'i bu gzhar zhig sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / me tog mar da ra ba dang / mar
313b4(brgyad stong): nga ra ba chen po dag thogs ras bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe na dge slong drug stong 'khor der 'dus te 'khod par gyur nas/ de dag kyang stan las
313b5(brgyad stong): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tra gzar nas/ dbus po g.yas pa'i lnga nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs thal po sbyar te phrag
313b6(brgyad stong): 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag gi snyim pa me tog man da ra ba dang / mar da ra ba chen pos gang bar gyur nas/ de dag gis me tog man nga ra ba dang / man dar
313b7(brgyad stong): ba chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bre rab
313b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i dam pa 'dis gnas par bgyi'o// de ras bcom
314a1(brgyad stong): // ldan 'das de'i tshe na 'dzum pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ chos nyid kyis 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog dum

318a3(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu ma btang ba dang / chos yongasu ma gtang ba dang / dge 'dun yongasu ma btang ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma byor pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
318a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongasu ma ba tang ba des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongasu mi gtang bar bya ste/ 'di ni nga'i rjesu bstan
318a5(brgyad stong): pa'o// kun dga' bo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rna pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu
318a6(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang / 'chad pa dang / kha ton du byed pa des 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub yongasu bzung
318a7(brgyad stong): bar 'gyuro// kun dga' bo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu 'jig pa'i tshe rjesu bzung na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
318a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang yongasu bzung bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang
318b1(brgyad stong): chub ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa las skyes te/ kun dga' bo gang 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
318b2(brgyad stong): de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skye so// kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus ra 'byung ba'i de bzhin
318b3(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
318b4(brgyad stong): skye'o// kur dga' bo gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas sangs rgyas bcom lngar 'das da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i
318b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa las skyeso// kun dga' bo
318b6(brgyad stong): nga'i bla ra red pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyeso// kur dga' bo de lta bas ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
318b7(brgyad stong): cher po bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes
318b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'di nying gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kur chub par bya/ rab tu gdor bar bya/ bstar par bya/ bshad par bya/ kha tor du bya'o// 
319a1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya/ rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang
319a2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum ste bskyed pa 'byin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyid pa drug las bla
319a3(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyes pa dang / skye ba dang skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas
319a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslabs pa yino// de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brter ras pha rol tu phyin pa drug las skyeso// de ci'i phyir
319a5(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes te/ blar med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed
319a6(brgyad stong): pa'o// kun dga' bo de lta bas ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar lar ga'i su khyod la yongasu gtang ngo do// rjesu gtang ngo // kun
319a7(brgyad stong): dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod mi zad pa'o// de ci
319a8(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang 'das pa'i dus kyi thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba na sems cad rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bshad pa yang 'di
319b1(brgyad stong): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'di las bshad do// kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba na sems can rnams la
319b2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos 'chad par 'gyur ba de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 'chad
319b3(brgyad stong): kur dga' bo da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos ston pa'i
319b4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod pa sgrags pa 'di nyid las chos bshad par
319b5(brgyad stong): gyur to// kur dga' bo de lta bas na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdzod de ni mi zad pa'i chos kyi mdzod do// kun dga' bo gal te khyod
319b6(brgyad stong): kyis gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la nyan thos kyi sa'i chos bshad par gyur la/ chos bshad pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag
319b7(brgyad stong): sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas par gyur na des kyang nga'i nyan thos rnams la/ nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par mi
319b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur// kur dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig cig tsam yang
320a1(brgyad stong): / bshad dam rab tu bstan na/ des ni khyod kyis nga la mnyes par byas par 'gyu ro// sngor gyi chos bshad pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po
320a2(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa
320a3(brgyad stong): de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod
320a4(brgyad stong): nams bya ba'i dngos po'i bsod nams kyi phung po de mang ba yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / 
320a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag pas gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
320a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa 'di ches bsod nams mang du bskyed ngo // kun dga' bo de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
320a7(brgyad stong): gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la tha na nyin cig tsam yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos stor na de'i bsod nams ches mang
320a8(brgyad stong): du bskyed// kun dga' bo nyi ma gcig lta zhog gi/ tha na snga dro tsam 'am/ kun dga' bo snga dro lta zhog gi/ tha na chu tshod cig gam/ kun dga' bo chu tshod cig lta zhog gi
320b1(brgyad stong): tha ra thang cig gam/ kur dga' bo thang cig lta zhog gi/ yud tsam cig gam/ kun dga' bo yud tsam cig lta zhog gi/ tha na skad cig tsam du yang kun dga' bo byang chub
320b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ 'di ni de
320b3(brgyad stong): bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'dis ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag
320b4(brgyad stong): thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis ga nor to// kun dga' bo de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan
320b5(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa ni gnas med skabs med/ 'di ni
320b6(brgyad stong): gnas ma yi no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
320b7(brgyad stong): bsnyed dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang / lnga dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi
320b8(brgyad stong): dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dge
321a1(brgyad stong): slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu zab mo'i nang na/ 
321a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon dang ldan pa dang / thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ 
321a3(brgyad stong): dbang dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas/ khur bor ba/ 
321a4(brgyad stong): bdag gi don rjesu thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dang
321a5(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu son pa rnams kyi yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad
321a6(brgyad stong): pa mngon par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de dag slar brtul to// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa
321a7(brgyad stong): de slar brtul nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'ang mi snang bar gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
321a8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lAm
321b1(brgyad stong): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gi mig lam du mi snang bar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin pa
321b2(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul bar gyur pas/ de rnams de dag gi mig lam du mi snang ba
321b3(brgyad stong): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ltar chos thams cad ni mig lam du'ang snang bar mi 'gyur
321b4(brgyad stong): ti chos rnams la chos rnams snang bar mi 'gyur/ chos rnams kyis chos rnams mi mthong / chos rnams kyis chos rnams mi sheso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kur dga'
321b5(brgyad stong): bo chos thams cad ni shes pa po ma yin/ mthong ba po ma yin dgos pa byed nus pa ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bor mkha' byed pa med pa'i phyir
321b6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad g.yo ba med de gzung du med do// ku na dga' bo chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bsam gyis mi khyab bo// kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni dngos
321b7(brgyad stong): po med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba po ma yi ro// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos gang
321b8(brgyad stong): la yang mngon par zher pa med do// kur dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// chos thams
322a1(brgyad stong): cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la bslab par bya'o
322a2(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di ri bslab pa thams cad kyi dpa pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// mchog rab ces
322a3(brgyad stong): bya'o// gya rim pa zhes bya'o// bla pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad la bar pa thob par byed pa'o// 'jig cher
322a4(brgyad stong): la bde ba thob par byed pa'o// mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa'o// skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabasu gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis gnang zhing sangs rgyas
322a5(brgyad stong): kyis bsngags pa ste/ kur dga' bo bslab pa la de la bslabs shing bslab pa 'di la gnas na sa/ de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
322a6(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas rabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhabs kyi mthe bong gcig gis bteg ste sbar ba'ag kyang / sems can de nga
322a7(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di brtag pa 'am bzhag par mi ser so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni grangs
322a8(brgyad stong): med gzhal du med pa'i ston dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la bslabs ras/ 
322b1(brgyad stong): 'das pa dang pa 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa nyid rjes brnyes so// kun dga' bo 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar zung ba'i dus kyi
322b2(brgyad stong): bslab pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di ni dang pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// mchog dang / 'chog
322b3(brgyad stong): rab dang / gya rnam pa dang / bla ma dang / bla ra med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad dam/ mtha' pa gzung bar sems
322b4(brgyad stong): pa de ri namapa'i tshang dang // mtha' ma gzung bar ser so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med ngo // kur dga' bo shes rab kyi
322b5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyir pa ri mtha' ba med do// kun dag 'bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad dang mtha' pa ni ma bshad de/ kur dga' bo ping gi tshogs dang / 
322b6(brgyad stong): tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs dpas la ri rang chad pa yod kyi/ kur dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la ni chang chang pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi tshogs
322b7(brgyad stong): dang tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs ri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ kur dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chang dang ldan pa pa yi'o// kur dga'
322b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhal du med pa'o// kur dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
323a1(brgyad stong): / tshad ma gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi bzad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas tshang ma
323a2(brgyad stong): bstar to// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chad ma brjod do// kun dga' bo dben pa'i chos la dben pa dmigasu med
323a3(brgyad stong): de'i tshad lta ga la yod/ kun dga' bo de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu med pa'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o// kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin
323a4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin yang
323a5(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad zin pa 'am/ zad pa 'am/ zad par 'gyur ba ma yi no// kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin pa
323a6(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu 'byed
323a7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur yang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zad zin pa 'am/ zad pa 'am zad par 'gyur ba ma yin// kur dga' bo da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams chad
323a8(brgyad stong): med grangs med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang kun dga' gro
323b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yir yang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zang zin pa 'am/ zad pa 'am/ zad par 'gyur
323b2(brgyad stong): ba ma yino// kun dga' bo da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga yang / kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
323b3(brgyad stong): phyir pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin yang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zad zir pa 'am/ zad pa 'am/ zad par 'gyur ba ma yino// de ci'i phyir
323b4(brgyad stong): zhe na kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa zad par sems pa de ni na mkha' zad par bya bar sems te/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha
323b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyir pa ri mi zad pa'o// de nas tshe dang lnga na pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin ga shegs pas gsungs pa'i gnas 'di ni zab mo'i g.yin
323b6(brgyad stong): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis gnas 'di zhu'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
323b7(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste na mkha' zad pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
323b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa yang zad pare // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
324a1(brgyad stong): galtar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bco pa ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gzugs zad pa med
324a2(brgyad stong): par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
324a3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin du zad pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher
324a4(brgyad stong): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma rig pa mi zad par shes rab kyi pha
324a5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher pos de ba'i da du 'du byed mi zad pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi zad
324a6(brgyad stong): pa dang / ming dang gzugs mi zad pa dang / skye mched drug mi zad pa dang / reg pa mi zad pa dang / tshor ba mi zad pa dang / sred pa mi zad pa dang / len pa mi zad pa dang / srid pa mi zad
324a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / skye ba mi zad pa dang / rga shi mi zad pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mi zad pas shes rab kyi pha rol
324a8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba mtha' gnyis spangs
324b1(brgyad stong): pa'o rab 'byor de ltar rnam par lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mtha' dang dbus med par rnam pa lnga ste/ gang chen
324b2(brgyad stong): cing 'brel par 'byung ba la de ltar lta ba 'dir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos so// rab 'byor
324b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rter cing 'brel par 'byung ba blta ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems
324b4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'dis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par ltar
324b5(brgyad stong): 1 thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid la ga ras par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
324b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de dag thams cad ni yid la byed pa 'di dang thabs mkhas pa
324b7(brgyad stong): 'di la ma rten pas mi shes// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas/ shes rab
324b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bsgrub par bya/ ji ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la
325a1(brgyad stong): rnam par lta zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
325a2(brgyad stong): log pa dang / phyir ldog pa dang / phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni thabs mkhas pa 'di la ma brten pas phyir log go phyir ldog go// phyir ldog
325a3(brgyad stong): par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma log pa dang / phyi
325a4(brgyad stong): mi ldog pa dang / phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas phyir ma log go// phyir mi ldog go// phyir ldog
325a5(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyuro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la spyod pas mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas ten
325a6(brgyad stong): cing 'brel par 'thung ba la rnam par blta'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rten cing 'brel par 'thung ba la rnam par lnga pas chos
325a7(brgyad stong): gang kyang rgyu med par 'byung bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // chos gang kyang rtag pa 'am/ ther zug tu yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // chos gang yang byed pa po
325a8(brgyad stong): 'am/ tshor ba po yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha
325b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas mngon par bsgrub cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'gyur ba la rnam par lta ba yi

325b3(brgyad stong): rnam par lta ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yang dag par rjesu mi mthong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnab par

325b6(brgyad stong): ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'drug pa yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo zhes yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan

325b8(brgyad stong): par rjesu mi mthong ste/ rab 'byor 'di ri byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor nam byang chub sems dpa'
326a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig to car mya ngar gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyu ro// rab 'byor 'di la sde'i
326a2(brgyad stong): zhig pa ma 'chi ba'i dus su gyur ra/ shing tra pra ngar gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba de bzhing du/ rab 'byor rapa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
326a3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig car yang shing dpya ngar gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyu ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig car
326a4(brgyad stong): gcig cig mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur rab/ 'o te bdud mang po shir tu bya ngar gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'od te stong gsum gyi stong cher po'i 'jig rten
326a5(brgyad stong): gyi khams ra bdud sdig car ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad bya ngar gyi zug rngu dang ldan par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
326a6(brgyad stong): tshedang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor dang byang chub sems dpa' sems nga pa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas
326a7(brgyad stong): spyod pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams na bdud sdig cad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad shir rnga mya ngar gyi zug rngu dang ldan par gyur te/ rang ra
326a8(brgyad stong): gau stan la 'dug tu'ang nyams mi dga' bar 'gyu ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 'phyin pa la gnas pas spyod pa
326b1(brgyad stong): la ni lnga dang mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bdag cag gis 'di bzung la mtho brtsam mo snyam 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

326b6(brgyad stong): spyod pa de la bdud kyi las gang ci dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'byung ba'i tshe rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ rab tu shes nas rnam par spong bar 'gyur ro// 
326b7(brgyad stong): 'byor thabs mkhas pa thams cad yongasu gzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// shes

327a1(brgyad stong): / pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par byed pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rter gyi khangs grangs med dpagang med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

327a3(brgyad stong): de ltar bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang 'di snyam du ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang dag rjesu brnyas
327a4(brgyad stong): pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos de dag rjes thob par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rab 'byor bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
