330b8(brgyad stong): pa'i chos nyid do// gzugs raM mu med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir stong pa'o// tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa re pA med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyi
331a1(brgyad stong): // stong pa'o// gzugs ni mu med pa'o// gzugs ri sems kyi spyod pa skye'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mu med
331a2(brgyad stong): pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni sems kyi spyod pa skye'o// gzugs ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / maM dmigs pa'i bar du'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
331a3(brgyad stong): dang / rnam par shes pa ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / mi dmigs pa'i bar du'o// gzugs kyang mi 'khrugs pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
331a4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'ang mi 'khrugs pa'o// gzugs ni seng ge'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni seng
331a5(brgyad stong): ge'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshun chad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa nyid la sgra dang g.yo thams cad rnam par
331a6(brgyad stong): spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / le lo thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / rlom sems thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / bdag
331a7(brgyad stong): la bstod pa rnam par spangs pa yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la spod pa rnam par spangs pa yid la byed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa rnam par spangs pa yid la byed pa dang
331a8(brgyad stong): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshig sra bcad pa rnam par spangs pa yid la byed pa dang / sgrib pa lnga rnam par spangs pa yid la byed pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna rnam
331b1(brgyad stong): par spangs pa yid la byed pa dag gis rjes rig par byed pa dang / rnam par spyod pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rtog par byed pa dang / sems pa dang / yongasu rtogs par
331b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon thams cad yongs rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa rnams yongasu rdzogs pa rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyu ro// / 
331b3(brgyad stong): rjesu rig par bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa// gzhar yang rab
331b4(brgyad stong): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcod pa yang dag
331b5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa 'i drung ra tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongasu btsal ba de bzhin du btsal bar bya'o// de skad
331b6(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom lngar 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
331b7(brgyad stong): ga tu ngus/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol bar ji ltar yongasu btsal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ro dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
331b8(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du sngor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang rol bar lus la ched reng po byed/ srog la mi lnga
332a1(brgyad stong): rjed pa dang / bkung bsti nga/ tshigasu bcang pa dag la mi gnas par yongs btsal lo// shes rab kyi pha rol 'a phyin pa yongasu tshol zhing 'brog dag
332a2(brgyad stong): pa zhig tu phyin pa ra bar snang las sgra thos par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogasu seng shig/ shes rab kyi pha rol te phyir pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ji ltar lus ngal
332a3(brgyad stong): ba yid la byed pa pi skyed pa dang / gting dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa pi sbed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa po bskyed pa
332a4(brgyad stong): dang mtshar mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa pi bskyed pa dang / tshab yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de
332a5(brgyad stong): ltar song shig/ nang ngam phyi rol 'ang la yang sems spong par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu ga yas g.yor du ma lta bar song shig/ rab dang byang dang / 
332a6(brgyad stong): steng dang 'og dang / phyogs mtshabs 'ang ma lta bar song shig/ rigs kyi bu ci ras 'jigs tshogs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yos
332a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / ci nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang pa g.yos pa de ltar song shig/ gang 'di las g.yos pa de rnam par
332a8(brgyad stong): nyams par 'gyuraro// ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur
332b1(brgyad stong): ba de ni 'khor ba la spyod do// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjesu mi 'thob bo// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
332b2(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'di sang ches smra so// de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni sems can thams cad la snang bar byed par 'dong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos thar
332b3(brgyad stong): cang bsgrub par 'dong ngo do// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra nges byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu legaso
332b4(brgyad stong): legaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang thos te/ 'di skad du rig sa kyi bu yang khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
332b5(brgyad stong): slong pa med pa'i chos ngag la mos pa skyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma yong su spang ba dang / dngos po yongs
332b6(brgyad stong): su spang ba dang / sems can du lta ba yongasu spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang stong pa nyid dang / 
332b7(brgyad stong): mtshan pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'phags pa'i chos rngams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya/ bsten par bya// 
332b8(brgyad stong): bsnyer bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na/ ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i
333a1(brgyad stong): // lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed
333a2(brgyad stong): par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa bzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te
333a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
333a4(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyer bkur bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba
333a5(brgyad stong): rnams skye bar 'gyur//  khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur// la ba phran sum nogs pa thob pa ra 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu phyur yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs
333a6(brgyad stong): rtogs la/ dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten pa'i zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis
333a7(brgyad stong): dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'o// khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos 'dod pa dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis
333a8(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las rnams tshogs par bya ste// rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dring
333b1(brgyad stong): dang / reg pa dag bsnyen pa dag bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar sgrub ste/ de dag des zil gyis mnan nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing sten pa dang / 
333b2(brgyad stong): bsnyen par byed pa yang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra ba de la ma dad pa skyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du rwa sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs
333b3(brgyad stong): mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/ 'di ni thabs mkhas pas rab tu sheso// 'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis/ sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bzung ba'i chos 'di dag la

333b5(brgyad stong): de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu cho sa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thad
333b6(brgyad stong): kun ras nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rngam par byang ba ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o// chos thams cad ni sems can med pa/ 
333b7(brgyad stong): srog med pa gso ba med pa/ skyes bu med pa/ gang zag med pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ brag cha lta bu/ mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang
333b8(brgyad stong): dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na/ ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
334a1(brgyad stong): khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig/ rigs kyi bu ci ste chos smra ba dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed
334a2(brgyad stong): cing mi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brdo bar mi bya ste/ gzhar du na chos 'dod pa nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos sba
334a3(brgyad stong): ba'i phyi bzhir 'brang bar bya'o zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ sgra de las de lta bur bstan pa blangs nas/ shar phyogs
334a4(brgyad stong): ga la ba der song ba dang / ring po ma byin par 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snya ma nas/ de sa phyogs de nyid du ngu
334a5(brgyad stong): zhing cho nges 'debs te/ smre zhing 'du'o/ des sa phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag gcig gi bar dunyir mtshan 'das pa ra byed/ nyin mtshan gnyis sam/ gsum pa
334a6(brgyad stong): bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun 'das kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du/ lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ rmugs pa dang ga
334a7(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa mi skyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ mtshan mor yid la byed pa mi skyed/ nyid por yid la byed pa mi skyed/ grang
334a8(brgyad stong): ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sdug bsngal
334b1(brgyad stong): ba dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par/ yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang ri
334b2(brgyad stong): 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam
334b3(brgyad stong): pa ma gtogs par/ yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheran po rtag tu ngu/ de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i

334b7(brgyad stong): 'dod pa 'di lta bu la rjesu 'brang zhing / shar phyogs nyid du song shig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan/ spos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun
334b8(brgyad stong): las byas pa'i ra ba bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba/ mchur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du nga gi
335a1(brgyad stong): / tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ grong bar gyi srang mnyal zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri
335a2(brgyad stong): mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dag bar bar dag tu zab pa btags pa/ grong khyer gyi khor yug tu/ zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las
335a3(brgyad stong): legs par byas shing skor la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ri 'dzam bu'i nu bo gser las byas pa mtho zhing rang dang ldan pa/ pada' yab tham
335a4(brgyad stong): cad kyi rtse po las kyang / ring po che sna bdur gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad
335a5(brgyad stong): las kyang rin po che'i thag gu zung bas/ mnga' yab gnyis pa ga zhar dang 'brel pa/ grong khyer de thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khebs te/ 
335a6(brgyad stong): gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing skar la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste dper ra/ yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo'i tshogs
335a7(brgyad stong): pa rol mo mkhar mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan la yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yer ka de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra
335a8(brgyad stong): 'jam zhing snyad pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing kun tu spyod do// grong khyer de khor yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing / chu ha cang
335b1(brgyad stong): yang mi grang / bcang yang ma rlobs gang bdag yod de/ chude la sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa/ rin po me sna bdu gyi grang sa med de// der sengs cad dag zhugs
335b2(brgyad stong): rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgya'o// chu de thams cad kyang me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dag gis khebs pa/ me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la dri zhib po'i
335b3(brgyad stong): ngang dang ldan pa gzhang dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las ded med pa gang yang med do// 
335b4(brgyad stong): grong khyer de'i nang ra bskyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ bskyed pos ral
335b5(brgyad stong): de dag re re na yang rdzing bu kho ra yug tu rgyang grangs kyi tshad tsar lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas/ rin po che sna bdur gyi
335b6(brgyad stong): me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka rnam par bkra zhing blta ra sdug pa dag skye te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing / me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang
335b7(brgyad stong): pun da ra~M ka de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i 'khor lo tsa pa te/ mthing ka kha dog mthing ka/ mthing kar stor pa 'thing kar snang ba/ ser po kha dog ser po/ ser po
335b8(brgyad stong): stor pa/ ser por sdang ba/ dpar po kha dog dpar po// dbar por ston pa/ dmar por snang ba/ dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar por stor pa/ dkar por snang ba dag yod do/ 
336a1(brgyad stong): rdzing du de dag thams cad dang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / ka ran d+ha ba dang / sa ra sa sgra 'byin pa dag yod do// bskyed mos la de dag thams cad kyang / 
336a2(brgyad stong): 'ir bya ba med cing / ris su bcad pa med de/ 'di ltar yur ring por sems can dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyod cing / yun ring por ches zab mo la
336a3(brgyad stong): mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi ba'i mdor/ byang chub sems dpa'
336a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' cher po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdur las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsa pa rnam par bkra zhing bltar sdug pa ra ba bdun dang / 
336a5(brgyad stong): ta la'i phreng ba bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa der khang pa'i longs spyod du// rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i bskyed pas tshal dang / mya ngan med
336a6(brgyad stong): pa zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i bsring mos ral dang / bsteng pos ral bzhi yang de bskyed pos chal de ngas
336a7(brgyad stong): na yang / rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bder chog ces bya ba
336a8(brgyad stong): dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba dang / brgyad brgyad yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser las byas/ ngos gnyis par dngul las byas/ ngos gsum
336b1(brgyad stong): pa ri bai DUR+Ya las byas/ ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/ nang gi sa gzhi ri ke ke ru la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la yang themasas theb pa rin po che sna tshog
336b2(brgyad stong): rnam pa tha dad pas brgyad pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar ras kyang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser gyi shing ngag skyeso// rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni/ me

336b4(brgyad stong): shing rngam pa sna tshogs skyes te shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i rang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu de thams cad kyi chu yang tsan dar gyi drir phyogs shing kha
336b5(brgyad stong): dog dang ldan dro dang ldan ro// der byang chub sems pa pa' sems dpa' cher po/ chos 'phags 'khor rang bcas pa/ bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang ldar cig

336b7(brgyad stong): tshal lam/ rdzing bu dgar rtag tu dga' zhing / 'dod pa'i snor lnga dang ldan pas/ dbang du gyur te rtse dga' kun tu spyod do// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
336b8(brgyad stong): 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' kun tu spyod cing der dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stor to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos lngar na
337a1(brgyad stong): 'khod pa de dag kyang / grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po res 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul
337a2(brgyad stong): gyi rang pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing ngal bting ba sar par tshangs cad gang ga steng seng po can du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i gos bting ba
337a3(brgyad stong): 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod par bshams te/ steng du gos kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres shing / de ltar chos la gus par byed pas/ sa phyogs de kho ra yug kyang

337a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' cher po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu ser sa rban de dag ri de la bur gus par byed cing / byang
337a6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyar to// der gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po/ sreg
337a7(brgyad stong): chags stong phrag pang po/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ri lung rong / la la ri kha tor byed la la ri yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhir yid
337a8(brgyad stong): la byed pas rtogs par byed de/ sems cad de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
337b1(brgyad stong): pa yi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song shig dang de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyuraro// 
337b2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po ras khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston to// yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug
337b3(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yino// rigs kyi bu des kyang sngor da ltar khyod tshol ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
337b4(brgyad stong): phyir pa yongasu btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu nyid mtshar du yid la byed pa rgyun ma bcad par song shig dang / ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos
337b5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur// de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ de thos ras dga' bgu yid rangs la/ rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid
337b6(brgyad stong): bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis pog ra/ yid la byed pa gzhar mi skyed kyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par
337b7(brgyad stong): byed pa/ zug rngu 'byir pa'i spar pa bdag gis ram rnyeng snyam sems pa de bzhir du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rtag tu ngu yang / gang bdag shes rab kyi pha
337b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyir pa de thos par byed cing / chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis ram mthong snyam sems
338a1(brgyad stong): / pa ma gtogs par/ chos gang yang yid la mi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thams
338a2(brgyad stong): cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thang
338a3(brgyad stong): kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba
338a4(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar bye/ da pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu na pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / chos
338a5(brgyad stong): thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / me tog bkrams pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
338a6(brgyad stong): dang chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bsgrub
338a7(brgyad stong): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sems can thams
338a8(brgyad stong): cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sna dang tshig dang / 'bru sna tshogs
338b1(brgyad stong): sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ma khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rang bzhin rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa
338b2(brgyad stong): thob pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
338b3(brgyad stong): rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir dang / ra mkha' dang batshungs pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / 
338b4(brgyad stong): rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul nye bar sel ba zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces
338b5(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byir pa sbyir pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir dang / seng ge mngon
338b6(brgyad stong): par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / sems cad thams cad zil gyis gnor pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzir dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / kur ra
338b7(brgyad stong): nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir dang / re ba nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes song ba
338b8(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya
339a1(brgyad stong): // ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang
339a2(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyi bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnab par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir dang / mun pa dang bral
339a3(brgyad stong): ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
339a4(brgyad stong): de bzhir gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos zab po 'ong 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
339a5(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / ri rab dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'a khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
339a6(brgyad stong): ting 'dzir dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir dang / 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / de bzhir gshegs pa mthong ba
339a7(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin rnams mngor du gyur te/ de ting 'dzin de dag la gnas pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag
339a8(brgyad stong): tu med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu stong pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhir gshegs pa de dag gis
339b1(brgyad stong): leg so zhes bya ba byir ras/ dbugs dazung ba mdzad de tshig 'di skad kyang gsung so// rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab
339b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal to// yongasu tshol ba na yang ting 'dzin 'di dag thob ste tingange 'dzin 'di dag thob nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong
339b3(brgyad stong): du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to// nged kyis ting 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhir la ltas ra/ gang mnyam par
339b4(brgyad stong): gzhag pa 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'ang/ byang chub tu spyad pa 'am/ gang bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de
339b5(brgyad stong): ngag kyang yang dag par rjes ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yid te/ rigs kyi bu chos gang gis kyang rlob sems sa pa
339b6(brgyad stong): rlob sems med par mi byed pa la garas ras/ nged kyi 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha de ba lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu cher po'i mtshar sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad
339b7(brgyad stong): bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dor gang ba dang / sangs rjes kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzir bla ra rang
339b8(brgyad stong): pa dang / lhor thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyir pa rjes thob ste yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de bzhir gshegs pa dag gis kyang chang gzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstar pa
340a1(brgyad stong): // mi rus ra/ ra thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis 'a chi spos/ rigs kyi bu de lnga bsar/ khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu dong du gnyer ba dang / 'a
340a2(brgyad stong): pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyi dor du gzeng ba dang / 'dod pa la ri bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rjed par dka' ba
340a3(brgyad stong): yi'o// khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyer la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o// pangs par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zir pa'i// byang chub sems
340a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de
340a5(brgyad stong): ngag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi dge ba 'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis de la
340a6(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po ras/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs
340a7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par byas shing yongasu bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir ba dang thabs mkhas pa la bslab so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod kyi dge ba'i
340a8(brgyad stong): bshes gnyen yongasu 'dzin pa yir te/ des khyod la ci bsgo ba bzhin du zung shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po
340b1(brgyad stong): chos 'phags la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa gnyis sam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thong bzhin du thogs shing bde ba
340b2(brgyad stong): yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dr-i dang / ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag
340b3(brgyad stong): thams cad phul yang / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis lar lon pa yi no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyi 'di lta bu'i ting 'dzin rnams rnyed par gyur te/ shes
340b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par gyur to// de ras de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ byang chub
340b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung ras mi sdang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting 'dzin de dag las langs te/ langs ras yang
340b6(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du ser so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang ras byor/ de bzhir gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud sA ma ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag pa mthong bas
340b7(brgyad stong): rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes
340b8(brgyad stong): pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngor gyi rgyal ba rngams la bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyer yongasu 'dzin pa/ yun ring po nas des bdag gi ngor byas pa yin gyis/ 
341a1(brgyad stong): // bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du bangod par song ste/ nye bar phyir nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang ras byed
341a2(brgyad stong): de bzhir gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
341a3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mo dang / gus par bya ba nye bar gzhag nas 'di snyam du semaso// bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur stir bya bas/

341a6(brgyad stong): me tog gam/ spos sam/ phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ gdugs de lta bu yang bdag la med la/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
341a7(brgyad stong): 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/ bdag gis mi rigs par byas par gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am/ rangs pa yang mi skye'o snyam du semaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
341a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ de lta bu'i yon dang / bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas/ song nas mthar gyis grong khyer gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / 
341b1(brgyad stong): de'i grong bar gyi dbus su de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
341b2(brgyad stong): la bkur bsti bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong tsam zhig zad de btsong so// 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems
341b3(brgyad stong): car dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang / 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir ni ma yi ro sa pa mo// 
341b4(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar du 'dug ste/ mi su 'dod mi su 'dod ces sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis bos so// de nas bdud

342b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la yong su rdzogs par gyur to snya pa nas/ de sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' ba
343a1(brgyad stong): gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smra so// bram ze'i khye'u nga'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di skad ces spra so// rigs kyi

343a4(brgyad stong): pa'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'jug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag rdza du/ brla sha med par bangos
343a5(brgyad stong): nas/ rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir/ bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i

343a7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag tu ngul 'di skad ces sbas// rigs kyi bu khrod ci'i phyir/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i mtsha ngag byed/ khrag dang / rus pa dang /

343b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o// de nas tshong dpor gyi bu mo des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad
343b2(brgyad stong): ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang rkang yang btsongs te 'jigs kyi bu de la bkur bsti bya bar 'dod pa khyed la yon gyi
343b3(brgyad stong): rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyurangs de la sbas pa/ bu mo rigs kyi bu des gang la ngas bslab par bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dag
343b4(brgyad stong): snar par 'gyur te/ de la ngas bslabs na/ bla na med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can tha~Md kyi rten du
343b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur/ skye sa bu chen po'i mtshar sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang 'ong 'dem gang ba dang / 'od
343b6(brgyad stong): zer mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhid
343b7(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis pa khyab pa dang / ting 'dzin rnam par
343b8(brgyad stong): dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla ra med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye
344a1(brgyad stong): kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu bgo bar bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu thob
344a2(brgyad stong): par 'gyuraro// de nas tshong dpor gyi bu mo des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces spra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di
344a3(brgyad stong): ngag yongasu brjod pa ni ngo mtshar te/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongasu btang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos
344a4(brgyad stong): te/ de tsam du khyod kyis 'di dag rgya cher yongasu brjod ra/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bsti bya ba'i gser
344a5(brgyad stong): ram nor bu 'am mu tig gam/ bai DUR+Ya 'am/ dngul lam me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gos sam/ gang ga
344a6(brgyad stong): sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de dang de khyod la sbyin gyis/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ kho bo yang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
344a7(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thos par bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskur bar bya'o// de ras
344a8(brgyad stong): lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyi lus su/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdud du
344b1(brgyad stong): 'dug nas 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yi dam la brtan pa ni leg so leg so// 'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pa/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
344b2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang / sngor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol ji phyir pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs rjem
344b3(brgyad stong): par bya ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// rigs kyi bu nga la snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang gis bya ba red
344b4(brgyad stong): kyi nga khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis/ rigs kyi tha khyod kyis mchog stsol cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la ra cho ga ji lta bu sbyin par bya/ des de la sbas pa/ 
344b5(brgyad stong): phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag la stsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di ri nga'i yul du gyur pa ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs rgyas
344b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ mchog gzhan gsol cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs rdzogs par bya ba'i
344b7(brgyad stong): gnas 'di la ni/ lha'i dbang po brtsod pa chung bar gyis shig/ lha'i dbang po bdag nyid kyis/ bden pa'i byir gyis brlabs bya'o// lha'i dbang po bder pa gang gis bdag
344b8(brgyad stong): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis wa
345a1(brgyad stong): / bstar cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i bsapa pa g.yo med par mkhyer cer/ bder pa de dang / bderan pa'i rig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig ces byas
345a2(brgyad stong): pa dang / skad cig yung tsam thang cig de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi bathu dang / ldag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du lus sngo
345a3(brgyad stong): gyi bzhir du gnas par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byir spobs pa red par gyur ras/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag dra ngul lar glan par spobs
345a4(brgyad stong): pa ma skyes nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpor gyi bu mo des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi ba khyod
345a5(brgyad stong): tshur shog/ kho mo'i khyim gang na yod pa der 'dong ste/ kho mos pa ma la ror blangs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa de'ang mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
345a6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'ang bdur bas bya ba spyi'o// de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpor gyi bu po de 'grogs nas/ de rang gi khyim
345a7(brgyad stong): ga la yod pa der dong ngo // de nas tshong dpor gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smra so// yab yum gser dang / dngul dang ring po che dang / nor bu dang / 
345a8(brgyad stong): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dar dang rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag bdag
345b1(brgyad stong): la stsol cig/ bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal pa'i g.yog mo lnga brgya po 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tra ngu dang bdag cag
345b2(brgyad stong): 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mara'o// de'ang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyuraro// de ras bu mo de'i
345b3(brgyad stong): pa ra sa bu mo de la 'di skad ces spra so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag du nge su zhig/ bu mo rigs kyi bu deng lha ga na 'dug/ bu mos spras pa/ rigs
345b4(brgyad stong): kye bu dang lnga'o skol gyi sgo drung rapa nges te rigs kyi bu de ri lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste
345b5(brgyad stong): sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar par gyi bar 'tshal bas de chos 'tshal ba'i slang du/ bdag nyid btsongs la shes
345b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol daphyin pa la ba ded pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur mi bgyi bar 'am
345b7(brgyad stong): na de'i lus nyob su yang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas/ mi dga' bar sems shing mchis te/ nges nga'i lus btsong bar 'dod ra/ lus leb pa rnyed
345b8(brgyad stong): zhes dgyes pa dang / brgya byir brang ze'i khye'u'i gzugs bskur te/ de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus btsong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang rtag tu
346a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur bstir bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas
346a2(brgyad stong): kyi chos rngams ni de la rag las pas 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyi ro zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u yi gzugasu bsgyur pas 'di skad ces smraso// khyod ring po
346a3(brgyad stong): 'dod de nga mchod spyir zhig byed pas/ der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu de yi ma bsad par de la 'di skad du
346a4(brgyad stong): spyiro zhes spras nas de mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag gi lag pa phug pa nas khrag gzugs/ brla'i sha btogs te rus pa gcog tu song nas/ rus pa dang rkang spyir snyam ras/ 
346a5(brgyad stong): de khrag gzag pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do// mi de ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la ra tsha bgyid snyam ste/ 
346a6(brgyad stong): de'i thang du mchis nas 'di skad bgyiso// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyi lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'a des ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / des bdag la

346a8(brgyad stong): la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes smras pa dang / des bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems
346b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya'o zhes mchi nas/ bdag gis de la 'di skad bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu khyod la yor gyi rnam pa 'am/ yor gyi

346b3(brgyad stong): stor par 'gyuro// 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyuraro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyang dga' ba
346b4(brgyad stong): dang rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes ras 'di snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar/ 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa de ni shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa ste
346b5(brgyad stong): ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang yongasu gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la/ ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa mi

347a1(brgyad stong): bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongasu brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos blar med pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o zhes bgyis ra/

348a8(brgyad stong): g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu ring po che bzhi bzhag par gyur te/ de dag sbyor pa'i bya ba byed do// bdug spos kyi sdong dngul

348b3(brgyad stong): gser gyi glegs bal la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de yang ngar gyi chur po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyar to// de ras byang chub

348b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces spra so// lha'i dbang po khyod lnga stong phrag du ma dag dang / ring po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa
348b8(brgyad stong): 'di la ci'i phyir me tog mar da ra ba dang / tsar dar gyi phye ma dag gis mthongar zhing mngon par mthor mngon par rab tu 'thor lnga'i sil skar 'di dag kyang / lha dag par spang
349a1(brgyad stong): / la ci'i phyir rdung / de sad ces spras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byed gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tra ngul 'di skad ces spras// rigs kyi
