349b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ste phyir ras/ chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
349b5(brgyad stong): 'phags la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ba dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshar dang / ba dar dang
349b6(brgyad stong): dar gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog gis gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
349b7(brgyad stong): po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/ me tog gi khang bu brtsegs pa gru bzhir gyur te/ gser dang dngul gyi me tog dag ra mkha' la gzhal meng khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur
349b8(brgyad stong): to/ chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang ring po che sna tshogs kyi sprir gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
350a1(brgyad stong): // t+yangang dang / tshong dpor gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / 
350a2(brgyad stong): cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ngo mtshar to// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
350a3(brgyad stong): zhing 'di ltar mthu che 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par yang rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa
350a4(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam po// de nas cheng dpor gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po
350a5(brgyad stong): de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs
350a6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
350a7(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos gang thob par
350a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur cig/ 
350b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bkur bstir byed pa 'di bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir
350b2(brgyad stong): pa la bkur bstir byed par shog shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhiran du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la chos
350b3(brgyad stong): ston par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yong su
350b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongasu rdzogs par shog shig ces smraso// de nas
350b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod
350b6(brgyad stong): pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa
350b7(brgyad stong): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sem
350b8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na/ sgra thos pa
351a1(brgyad stong): // rigs kyi bu shar phyogs song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur zhes/ bdag gis sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba de log
351a2(brgyad stong): su mchis nas/ 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid gcig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur ba ma
351a3(brgyad stong): dris snyam ste/ des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa
351a4(brgyad stong): ma byung ste/ gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las
351a5(brgyad stong): rnyed par 'gyur ba de sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ 'di skad gsung ngo // 
351a6(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha
351a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'ong ngo zhes gsungs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'di thos nas/ ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du/ shar
351a8(brgyad stong): phyogs ga la de log su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring po zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes te/ dper na
351b1(brgyad stong): dge slong bsapa gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur te/ sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes
351b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so// de nyan pa na ting 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas
351b3(brgyad stong): bcopa lngar 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu leg so leg so// khyod kyi ting 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa
351b4(brgyad stong): yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs par byaso zhes/ de bzhin gshe gas pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs
351b5(brgyad stong): par bstar ras mi sdang bar gyur to// bdag kyang ting la dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang ras byor
351b6(brgyad stong): bzhir gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyamo// de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni sngor gyi
351b7(brgyad stong): rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la shing tra bslabs pa lags te/ de bzhir ga
351b8(brgyad stong): pa de dag gang ras byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhir gshegs pa
352a1(brgyad stong): // de dag gang ras byon pa dang / de bzhir gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag 'drin/ ci ras bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud
352a2(brgyad stong): pa 'tshal cing / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ rtag
352a3(brgyad stong): tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu pa'o// // de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
352a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smra so// rig sa kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du yang ma bzhud de// de bzhin
352a5(brgyad stong): las ma g.yo so// de bzhin nying gang yin pa de ni de bzhin ga/ shegs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ri nga ba'in gshegs
352a6(brgyad stong): pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong
352a7(brgyad stong): ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de
352a8(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs
352b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'gog pa la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ri de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu na mkha'i khams la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ 
352b2(brgyad stong): nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gung rwa med de/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin
352b3(brgyad stong): nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la gnyi su byar med do// rigs kyi bu de
352b4(brgyad stong): bzhir nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste med pa'i phyir gnyis sam/ gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nyi mas gdungs pas dpyid
352b5(brgyad stong): ka'i zla ba tha ma la nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smi ga rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas/ der chu btung ngo zhes de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu da ji snyam du sems/ 
352b6(brgyad stong): chu de gang ras 'ongs/ gang du seng / chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu ngus
352b7(brgyad stong): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu de nyi mas gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab
352b8(brgyad stong): 'chal pa'i rang bzhir can gyis/ smig rgyu mthong nas chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes cing / de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchi so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi
353a1(brgyad stong): du de nge bzhino// de bzhin te/ de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhir gshegs pa la gzugs sapa/ sgrar mngon par chags par byed pa de dag ri/ 
353a2(brgyad stong): bzhir gshegs pa la byor pa 'am bzung bar rtog go// de bzhir gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ri byis pa'i rang ba'i ra can/ shes
353a3(brgyad stong): rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper ra/ skyes bu de chu med pa la chur 'du shes skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi sku
353a4(brgyad stong): mi blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid la ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhir gshegs pa
353a5(brgyad stong): rnams la byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa med do// rig sa kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pas glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam dang
353a6(brgyad stong): du chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
353a7(brgyad stong): skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmil pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa cig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu
353a8(brgyad stong): 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhir gshegs
353b1(brgyad stong): pa de dag gang nas byer gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam na chos gang yang grub pa mi ganga'o// rmi lam ri brdzur te yang dag pa ma lag so// chos 'phags
353b2(brgyad stong): kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu zhes gsung so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thang
353b3(brgyad stong): rmil pa lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni ming dang mtshan gyi sku dang gzugs kyi skur mngon par chags pa de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas
353b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa la byor pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad
353b5(brgyad stong): 'khor ba 'gro ba drug par song ba 'gro ba 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag thaMng ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad
353b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos las ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu zhes yang
353b7(brgyad stong): dag pa ji lta ba bzhir du bstan pa shes pa de dag ni chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go// gang dag chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 
353b8(brgyad stong): skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhir gshegs pas chos nyid du rab tu sheso// gang dag de ba'ir gshegs pa ros nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni
354a1(brgyad stong): // bzhin gshegs pa la byod pa 'am/ bzhud par mi rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs
354a2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod sobs ngor yod par za ste/ de dang
354a3(brgyad stong): ngag re 'jig rten gyi spyir gar so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper da/ rgya mtsho cher po'i rang na ring po che de dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas ma 'ongs/ lho dang rub dang byang dang / phyogs
354a4(brgyad stong): mtshabs dang / steng dang / 'og dang phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi sems can dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rang ras ring po che dag 'thung ste
354a5(brgyad stong): de dag kyang rgyu med par byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen dang ga'i la rag las pa yin te/ brten nas byung ngo // rin po tshe de dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
354a6(brgyad stong): gang du yang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyer de dag yong na rin po che dag rab tu 'byed do// rkyed de dag med na ring po che dag rab tu dbye ba yang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ba'ir gshegs
354a7(brgyad stong): pa de dag gi sku yongasu grub pa yang gang nas kyang ma byor/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang ma bzhud ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med par yang pa yir te/ 
354a8(brgyad stong): sngor gyi spyad pas yongasu grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang byed la rag las pa/ sdod gyi 'phrid las rnam par sbed pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin/ de dag kyang rgyar rnams yod ra/ sku mdze
354b1(brgyad stong): par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med ma su mngon par 'grub pa yang mi sdang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di la ste dper ra/ paM wang gi sgra byung ba'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs
354b2(brgyad stong): pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro/ gang du yang mi 'pho ste/ brten nas 'byung ba/ rgyu la rag las rkyen la rag laso// 'di lta ste dper na/ pi wang gi khog pa la brten/ rgyud la brten
354b3(brgyad stong): shing pu la brten/ rgyud rten la da/ skyes bu de las skyes pa'i rdol ba la brter ras/ pi wang de las sgra 'thung ste/ sgra de yang pi wang gi khog pa las pa zung / lpags
354b4(brgyad stong): pa las pa thung / rgyud las pa zung / shing bu las pa byung / rgyud rten las ma byung ste/ skyes bu de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las smra pa byung lod kyi/ sgra de yang 'gag pa yang
354b5(brgyad stong): gang du yang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgya sa bcom lngar 'das rnams kyi sku yongasu grub pa ya nga / rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa dang
354b6(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongasu grub pa ser te/ rgyu gcig gis pa yin/ rkyed gcig gis pa yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba la yin te/ rtswa med pa
354b7(brgyad stong): yang ma yin// rgyu dang rkyen mang po chags pa las byung ba yin te/ da ni gang nas kyang ma byon to// rgyu dang rkye mtshogs pa med kyang gang du yang mi bzung ngo de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
354b8(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byod pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis de ba'ir pa khong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyi
355a1(brgyad stong): // bu khyod gang tshuran chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshur chad khyed bla na med pa yang dag par
355a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa byor pa dang bzhud pa med pa
355a3(brgyad stong): 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong cher po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yas/ rab tu g.yos
355a4(brgyad stong): kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ che ma che ra rab tu chem che ma/ kun tu rab tu chem cher// 'khrugs rab
355a5(brgyad stong): tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ bdud kyi gnas tham sa cad kyang dkrogs shing spa skong bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rteran gyi khams
355a6(brgyad stong): rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / slar dang / nags tshul ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de log su rab tu 'dra
355a7(brgyad stong): par gyur to// ngus pa yin pa'i me tog kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing me tog gi char dag bab bo// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang
355a8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po rtag tu ngu la/ lha'i tsan dar gyi phye ma dang / lnga'i me tog gi 'thor mngor bar 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing / tshig 'di skad zer
355b1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyed kyi dathus deng bdag cag gis kyang don dam pa las byung ba'i gtar 'jig rten thams cad dang pi 'thun pa/ gang 'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad dang
355b2(brgyad stong): paM mthur pa bstan pa thos so zhes 'dzer to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
355b3(brgyad stong): dus 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bus g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyed gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
355b4(brgyad stong): rnams ri ma byor pa bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstan pas srog chags brgya stong mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / srog chags bye ba khrag
355b5(brgyad stong): khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu seras skyed pa dang / srog chags stong drag drug cu rtsa bzhi ros rnams la chos kyi rig
355b6(brgyad stong): rdul red cing dri ba med pa rnam par dag par gyur // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ 
355b7(brgyad stong): bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byod pa dang / bzhud pa med par bstan pa 'di dris pas/ sems cad 'di sed kyi der byas
355b8(brgyad stong): par gyur pa/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bar chog gis
356a1(brgyad stong): / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tsom mi bya'o// bdag ra the tso pa med par de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcol pa yang dag par rdzogs
356a2(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs pa de dang ldan pas/ ta la bdud tsam du rnam pa' la 'phags nas/ ta la bdud tsa pa ra 'dug ste/ bdag dmakha'
356a3(brgyad stong): la 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bsti bya'o snyam du ser so// de ras lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
356a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis shes ras/ de la lha'i re log par nga rab dag byir te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi ngu me tog 'a
356a5(brgyad stong): ngag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bsti gyis shig/ 'di ni ngas khyod yongasu bzung ba yer te/ rigs kyi brtsod
356a6(brgyad stong): kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i ngor byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sen thams cad kyi phyir/ ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par
356a7(brgyad stong): spro bar byed cing khur chen po khyer bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smra so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lnga'i dbang po brgya
356a8(brgyad stong): byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bdag gi lus
356b1(brgyad stong): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang / zham ring bgyi ba'i
356b2(brgyad stong): slad du bdag gi lus khyod la dbul lo// de bdag gi lus phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go// 
356b3(brgyad stong): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang
356b4(brgyad stong): khyod la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag dang ldan pa thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhar cig tu yang dang du sangs rgyas rnams dang
356b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur bstir bgyi bla mar bgyi/ de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher
356b6(brgyad stong): po rtag tu ngus/ tshong dpor gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smra so// bu mo dag khyed nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed/ nga la lhag pa'i ba
356b7(brgyad stong): pas bdag nyid byin cig dang bu mo khyed ngas spang ngo // bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjesu 'thur par 'jug go// khyod la lhag
356b8(brgyad stong): pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid dbu'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshong dpor gyi bu po la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de
357a1(brgyad stong): // dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyadan te/ shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la brel / rag
357a2(brgyad stong): kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rnga lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongasu longs spyod pa'i phyir khyod la 'bu'o// de ras lnga'i dbang po brgya byir gyis/ rigs kyi drang la
357a3(brgyad stong): leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu leg so leg so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtang bar bya'o// yongasu
357a4(brgyad stong): gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rje gas pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas na
357a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa nyar nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis
357a6(brgyad stong): kyang / sngor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta bu'i tshul dang gtong ba la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs
357a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongasu dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ tshong dpor gyi bu mo la
357a8(brgyad stong): sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bskyang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs ras
357b1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngul byi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur
357b2(brgyad stong): te/ de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag nga du 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa 'ang nyal bar byed pa
357b3(brgyad stong): ni bdag gi mi cha la 'di ni ma legs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston pa'i phyir ma byang gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang
357b4(brgyad stong): 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snya re// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'a phags lo bdun gyi bar du tingange 'dzin gcig
357b5(brgyad stong): la snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzir grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa dang / thabs mkhas pa
357b6(brgyad stong): las zang ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rtog pa
357b7(brgyad stong): ma byung / rnam par 'tsho ba'i reg pa pazung zo la brnam pa ma byung ste/ ga'ang dur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po chos 'phags shing 'dzir las nam ldang
357b8(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug das chos stor par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri
358a1(brgyad stong): // bshams na/ bdag gis phyogs 'dir chag chag btab kyis/ legs par byugs la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa'
358a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byugs par bya'o snya mo// tshong dpon
358a3(brgyad stong): gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo de dag lnga brgya yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de
358a4(brgyad stong): bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjesu 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lnga'i sgra thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
358a5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdud ra ting 'dzin 'di la sa ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus 'jug ste// chos ston par 'gyur zhes grag nas/ byang chub sem
358a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu ming rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs
358a7(brgyad stong): pa bu mo lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po thams cad kyis spras pa bsham so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de/ stan gang la byang
358a8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
358b1(brgyad stong): dus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dong na/ bdud sdig car gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
358b2(brgyad stong): du chu ma rnyed nas/ yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de yang mi mdzes par
358b3(brgyad stong): bya ba'i phyir/ chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/ kun tu chu btsal na/ chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te
358b4(brgyad stong): bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di na rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas/ byang
358b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi
358b6(brgyad stong): lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni bla'i// nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na 'khor zhing / bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su
358b7(brgyad stong): zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo// de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mtshon rdor po blangs te/ bdag gi lus kun tu phug nas/ rang gi
358b8(brgyad stong): khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btab bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjesu slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa
359a1(brgyad stong): // bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshor rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug ras rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/ gang
359a2(brgyad stong): de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i glags pa rnyed par 'gyur bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo
359a3(brgyad stong): nga dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ji tsam du chos 'dod pa
359a4(brgyad stong): dang / ji tsam du yi dam la brtan pa dang / ji tsam du go chachen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang
359a5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
359a6(brgyad stong): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can thar par bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam du semaso// de nas lha'i dbang po
359a7(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa phyogs de khor
359a8(brgyad stong): khor yug dpag tshad brgyar tshang bar dris khyab bo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smraso// 
359b1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu legaso leg so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo// khyod kyis chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongasu tshol ba bla na med pa'o// rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin
359b2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa
359b3(brgyad stong): 'di lta bus/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi byang
359b4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi stad ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ri byas/ chag chag ni bdab na/ bdag gis me tog gang dag gis/ sa
359b5(brgyad stong): phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de gang nas rnyed par 'gyur
359b6(brgyad stong): sAm du se so// de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag rnga ngul 'di skad ces spra so// rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog mar dar ba 'a
359b7(brgyad stong): ngag long la/ khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog dgram pa gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug
359b8(brgyad stong): pa la yang gtor cig ces/ nges de la lha'i me tog man nga ra ba khal stong byi no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog de dag blangs te/ 
360a1(brgyad stong): // me tog kha cig gis sa phyogs der me tog dgram pa byaso// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la ga
360a2(brgyad stong): to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting 'dzin de las langs te/ chos kyi skar gang ra yod pa der 'ongs ras
360a3(brgyad stong): stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
360a4(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu/ 'di lta ste dper na/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhug
360a5(brgyad stong): pa'i dge slong rtse gcig pa yid la byed pa ba zhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo// de ras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
360a6(brgyad stong): ston pa 'di lta ste/ chos thaMng mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par nyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dber pa nyid do// 
360a7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do// chos thaMd rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems
360a8(brgyad stong): med pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
360b1(brgyad stong): phyir pa ro gcig pa nyid ngo do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyi pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha
360b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// nam mkha' bu med pa nyid pas shes
360b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rbab snga tshogs nyid yid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
360b4(brgyad stong): tra phyin pa sna tshogs nyid do// namakha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs mu red pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
360b5(brgyad stong): nga mu red pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa mu med pa nyid
360b6(brgyad stong): sa'i khams pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma med pa nyid ngo // de bzhir du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
360b7(brgyad stong): phyir pa mu byed pa'ang ngo // rangakha' mu med pas/ shes rab pha rol du phyir pa ru med panying ngo do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam
360b8(brgyad stong): nga ngo // chos thad ma 'dres pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid ngo // chos thams cad dmig su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigasu
361a1(brgyad stong): med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed
361a2(brgyad stong): pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do// ros thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsam gyis mi khyab
361a3(brgyad stong): pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzir skyes par
361a4(brgyad stong): gyur to/ chos thams cad dper bzhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang chos thams cad rdzob sems med pa zhes bya ba'i
361a5(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ji 'dzin dang / chos thams cad pu med pa zhes bya ba'i
361a6(brgyad stong): ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dziran dang / ra mkha' mA med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang
361a7(brgyad stong): rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / na mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gzugs pa red pa zhes bya ba'i ting
361a8(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu red pa zhes bya ba'i nge 'dzin dang / chu
361b1(brgyad stong): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ra mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzir dang / 
361b2(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rang bzhir dmigasu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa
361b3(brgyad stong): nyid ces bya ba'i tinge 'dzir dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba'i tingange 'dzin rab tu thob par
361b4(brgyad stong): gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ de la sogs pa'i ting 'dzir gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu rab tu thob par gyur to// chos 'phags
361b5(brgyad stong): kyai le'u zhes bya ste sub cu gcig pa'o// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong drug cu
361b6(brgyad stong): thob ma thag tra shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rter gyi khamra
361b7(brgyad stong): gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed ra/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dur gyis bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdur du
361b8(brgyad stong): dngar te/ tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad par thong ngo // 'di lta ste dper gad ltar nga stong gsum bya
362a1(brgyad stong): / stong cher po'i 'jig der gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bsor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdur du bangar te/ rdul 'di
362a2(brgyad stong): dang ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chang pa bzhi ro// de rang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par
362a3(brgyad stong): gyur te/ bar skyes pa thams cad du yang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur na/ skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom lngar 'das rnams mngor sum du
362a4(brgyad stong): gyur pa de dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom lngar 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// de sa mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs/ ngal ba pu
362a5(brgyad stong): sum tshogs pa ni bsgrub so// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thams
362a6(brgyad stong): cad mkhyer pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yino// rab 'byor de lta bas ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ 
362a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// de ras bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kur dga' bo shes rgyab kyi pha rol tu phyin
362a8(brgyad stong): 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag par yongasu gzung ba'i phyir zung shig/ chongs shig/ ldogs shig/ kur chub par gyis shig/ gzhan la sa
362b1(brgyad stong): rgya cher rab tu stor cig kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar
362b2(brgyad stong): bya klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gdon par bya/ lung rong par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha tor du bya/ de bzhir gshegs pa'i byir gyis brlabs kyis/ glegs bam cher po la
362b3(brgyad stong): yi ge gsal zhing rab tra gsal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
362b4(brgyad stong): ba dar dang / khor yug tra mar me'i phreng ba dang / ratshong pan ma pa mang pos bkur bstir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ rjed par byasagasol bar bya ste/ kur
362b5(brgyad stong): dga' bo 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyed pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// kAr
362b6(brgyad stong): dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi stor pa yir rang/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom lngan 'das bdag gi stor pa lagaso// bde bar bcu
362b7(brgyad stong): pa bdag gi stor pa lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom lngar 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kur dga' bo khyed kyis
362b8(brgyad stong): ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la/ kur dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byabs pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byabs pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byangs pa
363a1(brgyad stong): // yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas te/ de lta bas ra kun dga' bo nga ltar nga bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mor bya ba
363a2(brgyad stong): de bzhin du// nga 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' bo ci ras shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod
363a3(brgyad stong): skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar/ khyod la lar gnyis lan gsum du yongasu gtang ngo // rjesu gtang ngo // kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
363a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rjer ra ji srid du spyod pa de srid du// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kur dga' bo de srid du de bzhir gshegs pa chos ston pa
363a5(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tra phyin pa 'di nyid nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 
363a6(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / kha tor byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / dri dang / byug pa dang / 
363a7(brgyad stong): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dar dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur bstir byed/ bla bar byed/ 
363a8(brgyad stong): mor byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed pa dang / gsol bar byed pa'i sems cad de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang pa bral ba dang / 
363b1(brgyad stong): dge 'dun la rim gror byed pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// kur dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung nga spyod par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan
363b2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA
363b3(brgyad stong): ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / pi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
363b4(brgyad stong): par bstod do// yongasu gtang pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan 'anges pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa brgyad
363b5(brgyad stong): stong pa rdzob so// / rgya gar gyi mkhar po shAkya sa na dang / dzA ra sid dri dang / zhu cher gyi lo ts+tsha ba bar d+he d+harma tA shI la la sogs pas
363b6(brgyad stong): bsgyur cing zhus te gtangar la phab pa'o// slad kyi lha btsar po bkra shis lde btsar gyi bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su b+ha'i ta dang sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong
363b7(brgyad stong): rin cher bzang pos 'grel pa dang 'thur par bsgyur ba las slar yang paN Di ta cher po d+hi paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba/ dge slong rim chen bzang pos
363b8(brgyad stong): yul dbus kyi pe dang gtugs nas bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o// dus phyis lo nA dge slong blo lngar shes rab kyis khe che dang yul dbus kyi dpe du ma sogs
